T07TD4091E:149a-24: phreng ba 'dzin dang rtag myos dang //
T07TD4091E:149a-25: rgyal chen bzhi ba'i lha rnams so //
T07TD4091E:149a-26: dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag tu rim bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:149a-27: rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag bdag nyid so sor gnas pa de'i 'khor rnams te /
T07TD4091E:149a-28: de'i phyir de dag tu rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:149a-29: ji ltar bang rim bzhi dag la rgyal chen bzhi ba'i lha rnams gnas pa bzhin du /
T07TD4091E:149a-30: ri ni bdun po dag la yang //
T07TD4091E:149a-31: mu khyud 'dzin la sogs pa dag la'o //
T07TD4091E:149a-32: de'i phyir lha'i ris de ni thams cad pas che'o //
T07TD4091E:149a-33: ri rab rtsen sum cu gsum //
T07TD4091E:149a-34: bang rim dang ri rab kyi tshad ji tsam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:149a-35: de ni stong phrag nyi shu yin //
T07TD4091E:149b-0: phyogs bzhi ngos bzhi la ngos re re zhing yang dpag tshad nyi @149b khri ste /
T07TD4091E:149b-1: khor ra khor yug tu ni brgyad khri'o //
T07TD4091E:149b-2: phyogs mtshams brtsegs pa bzhi la ni //
T07TD4091E:149b-4: ri rab kyi rtse mo ni phyogs mtshams kyi gra de dag las gang dag la gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba gnas ba dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad tsam gyis brtseg spa bzhi gyen du 'phags so //
T07TD4091E:149b-5: ri rab kyi rtse mo nyid kyi //
T07TD4091E:149b-7: ngos la nyis stong lnga bcu pa //
T07TD4091E:149b-8: dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa yi //
T07TD4091E:149b-9: grong khyer blta na sdug ces pa //
T07TD4091E:149b-10: gzhi bkra gser las byas mnyen pa //
T07TD4091E:149b-11: ngos la nyis stong lnga brgya pa //
T07TD4091E:149b-12: zhes bya ba ni ngos re re zhing yang dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya yin no //
T07TD4091E:149b-13: dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yin no zhes bya ba ni grong khyer de'i 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis te de ni lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yin no zhes grag go //
T07TD4091E:149b-14: de na rnam par rgyal byed de //
T07TD4091E:149b-15: ngos la nyis stong lnga bcu pa//
T07TD4091E:149b-16: grong khyer gyi dbus na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba'i ngos ngos kyi srid du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu yod do //
T07TD4091E:149b-17: 'di ni re zhig nang gi gnas so //
T07TD4091E:149b-18: de'i phyir shing rta sna tshogs dang //
T07TD4091E:149b-20: grong khyer de'i phyi rol na /
T07TD4091E:149b-21: ngos bzhi dag na lha rnams kyi rtsed mo'i gnas skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de /
T07TD4091E:149b-22: 'di lta ste skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can dang /
T07TD4091E:149b-26: de dag gis grong khyer de'i phyir rol brgyan to //
T07TD4091E:149b-27: nyi shus bcad pa'i ngos bzhin //
T07TD4091E:149b-28: sa gzhi bzang po gzhan yod de //
T07TD4091E:149b-29: skyed mos tshal de dag gi ngos bzhi dpag tshad nyi shus bcad pa na /
T07TD4091E:149b-30: lha rnams kyi rtse ba'i gnas gzhi bzang po bzhi yod do //
T07TD4091E:149b-31: grong khyer gyi phyi rol gyi ngos //
T07TD4091E:149b-32: byang shar mtshams na yongs 'du ste /
T07TD4091E:149b-33: grong khyer gyi byang shar phyogs mtshams na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba mchog gi gnas shing yongs 'dus brtol zhes bya ba yod de /
T07TD4091E:149b-34: lho nub mtshams na chos bzang ngo //
T07TD4091E:149b-35: lho nub kyi mtshams na gang du lha rnams 'khod na bya ba mi bya ba bgrod par byed pa'i lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba yod do //
T07TD4091E:150a-0: @150a * // re zhig sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi snod kyi gnas pa ni de lta bu'o //
T07TD4091E:150a-1: de steng gzhal med khang gi lha //
T07TD4091E:150a-6: tshangs pa la gnas kyi bye brag bcu drug tu 'gro ba rnams te /
T07TD4091E:150a-7: gang dag gi gnas mngon par ni mdor bsdu na /
T07TD4091E:150a-8: lha'i ris nyi shu rtsa gnyis po de dag yin no //
T07TD4091E:150a-9: 'dod pa spyod pa drug yin no //
T07TD4091E:150a-11: rgyal chen bzhi pa nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha ris drug na 'dod pa yongs su spyod kyi lhag ma rnams ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:150a-13: gnyis kyis gnyis dang 'khyud pa dang //
T07TD4091E:150a-14: lag pa 'brel pa dang dgod pa dang //
T07TD4091E:150a-15: bltas pa yis ni 'khrig pa yin /
T07TD4091E:150a-16: gnyis gnyis kyis 'khrig pa ni sa dang 'brel bar gnas pa rgyal chen bzhi pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams te mi ji lta ba bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:150a-17: de dag kyang khu ba med pa'i phyir rlung yongs su btang bas yongs su gdung ba dang 'bral ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:150a-18: 'khyud pas 'khrig pa ni 'thab bral rnams te /
T07TD4091E:150a-19: 'khyud pa tsam gyis yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:150a-20: lag pa 'brel bas ni dga' ldan pa rnams kyi'o //
T07TD4091E:150a-21: dgod pas ni 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi'o //
T07TD4091E:150a-22: bltas pas ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi'o //
T07TD4091E:150a-23: lha'am lha mo'am gang pang du gzhan gzhon nu lha'i bu mo skye ba de ni de gnyis kyi bu'am bu mo yin no //
T07TD4091E:150a-24: bong tshod ji tsam skye zhe na /
T07TD4091E:150a-25: byis pas lo lnga lon pa nas //
T07TD4091E:150a-26: lo bcu lon pa lta bu'i bar //
T07TD4091E:150a-28: lha'i ris drug dag tu grangs bzhin du de dag kyang myur ba nyid skye'o //
T07TD4091E:150a-30: lus rdzogs gos dang bcas pa nyid //
T07TD4091E:150a-31: gzugs can spyod pa'i lha rnams lus rdzogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:150a-33: lha thams cad ni 'phags pa'i skad du smra'o //
T07TD4091E:150a-35: 'dod pa skye ba gsum po ni //
T07TD4091E:150a-36: 'dod pa dang lha mir bcas rnams //
T07TD4091E:150a-37: 'dod pa'i khams su rig par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:150a-39: sems can 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa rnams 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa dag la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de //
T07TD4091E:150a-41: mi rnams dang lha kha cig go //
T07TD4091E:150a-42: de rnams kyang lha'i ris rnams so //
T07TD4091E:150b-0: sems can yod pa sbrul @150b zhing 'dod pa la dbang phyug la dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de /
T07TD4091E:150b-1: 'di lta ste 'phrul dga' ba rnams so //
T07TD4091E:150b-2: sems can 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul te /
T07TD4091E:150b-3: gzhan gyis sprul pa'i 'dod pa la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de /
T07TD4091E:150b-4: 'di lta ste gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams so //
T07TD4091E:150b-5: de ltar de dag ni ji ltar skyes pa'i 'dod pa la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4091E:150b-6: bdag ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sprul nas yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir dang /
T07TD4091E:150b-7: ji ltar 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul pa la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir 'dod pa skye ba gsum zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:150b-8: gzugs kyi khams dag na ni /
T07TD4091E:150b-9: bde ba skye ba gsum po ni //
T07TD4091E:150b-10: bsam gtan gsum las dgu yin //
T07TD4091E:150b-11: de ni bde ba skye ba gsum yin te /
T07TD4091E:150b-12: lha de dag ni bde ba las skyes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:150b-13: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i bde bar gnas so //
T07TD4091E:150b-14: gang dag lha de dag gi gnas nyi shu rtsa gnyis su bshad pa de rnams la /
T07TD4091E:150b-15: 'og ma nas gong mar thag ji tsam zhig ce na /
T07TD4091E:150b-16: de dag thams cad kyi dpag tshad kyi grangs yongs su bgrang bar ni sla ba ma yin mod kyi /
T07TD4091E:150b-18: gnas nas gnas 'og ji srid par //
T07TD4091E:150b-19: steng du'am der de tsam mo //
T07TD4091E:150b-20: 'dzam bu'i gling nas gnas 'og mar ji srid par de'i 'og mar yang /
T07TD4091E:150b-21: de nas gnas 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid pa de srid de /
T07TD4091E:150b-23: 'di nas dpag tshad bzhi khri na rgyal po chen po bzhi rtse ba'i gnas bang rim bzhi yod pa ltar /
T07TD4091E:150b-24: de'i gong ma sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi gnas su yang de'i 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid pa de srid do //
T07TD4091E:150b-25: de nas kyang 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par gong ma 'thab bral ba rnams kyi gnas su yang de srid do //
T07TD4091E:150b-26: de nas 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par gong ma dga' ldan pa rnams kyi gnas su yang de srid do zhes bya ba ste /
T07TD4091E:150b-27: de bzhin du rgya cher thams cad go rims dang mthun par shin tu mthong nas 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid pas /
T07TD4091E:150b-28: gong ma 'og min pa rnams kyi de yang de srid do //
T07TD4091E:150b-29: de'i gong na ni gnas gzhan med pas /
T07TD4091E:150b-30: de'i phyir de ni thu bor gyur pa'i phyir 'og min zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:150b-31: yang cig nas 'og mar skyes pa'i gong ma'i gzhal med khang dag tu 'gro zhing mthong ngam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:151a-2: de dag gong mar 'gro ba med //
T07TD4091E:151a-4: gal te rdzu 'phrul can gzhan la brten nas sam /
T07TD4091E:151a-5: de pa'i lhas khrid na ni sum cu rtsa gsum yang 'thab bral ba'i nang du 'gro bar 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:151a-6: lhag ma brgyad kyang de bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:151a-7: yang 'thab bral ba rnams la sogs pa de dag gi gzhal med rnams kyi tshad ji tsam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:151a-8: re zhig kha cig na re rgyal chen bzhi rnams kyi ni ri rab kyi rtse mo'i tshad tsam mo zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:151a-9: gzhan dag na re nyis 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:151a-10: bsam gtan dang po ni gleng bzhi pa tsam mo //
T07TD4091E:151a-11: gnyis pa yang ni stong chung du'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo //
T07TD4091E:151a-12: bzhi pa ni stong gsum pa tsam mo //
T07TD4091E:151a-13: yang stong chung du'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ci stong gnyis pa'am /
T07TD4091E:151a-14: stong gsum pa ni ci zhig ce na /
T07TD4091E:151a-15: gling bzhi pa dang nyi zla dang //
T07TD4091E:151a-16: ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang //
T07TD4091E:151a-17: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni //
T07TD4091E:151a-18: stong ni chung du dag tu 'dod //
T07TD4091E:151a-21: nub gyi [*kyi] ba lang spyod dang /
T07TD4091E:151a-22: byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang /
T07TD4091E:151a-24: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar stong dang /
T07TD4091E:151a-25: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong gang yin pa 'di ni stong chung du'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:151a-26: de stong la ni stong gnyis pa'o //
T07TD4091E:151a-27: bar ma'i 'jig rten khams yin no //
T07TD4091E:151a-28: stong chung du'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag stong la ni stong gnyis pa'i bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams yin no //
T07TD4091E:151a-29: de stong la ni stong gsum mo //
T07TD4091E:151a-30: stong bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag stong la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yin te /
T07TD4091E:151a-31: de ni 'di ltar cig car du //
T07TD4091E:151a-33: mnyam du 'jig pa la yang mnyam du 'byung ste chags zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07TD4091E:151a-34: yang snod rnams kyi tshad kyi dbye ba ji lta ba de bzhin du de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshad kyang dbye ba yod dam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:151a-37: de la re zhig /'dzam bu'i gling gi tshad dag ni //
T07TD4091E:151a-38: khru bzhi pa dang phyed dang bzhi //
T07TD4091E:151b-0: 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni phal cher bru @151b bzhi pa ste /
T07TD4091E:151b-1: la la ni khru phyed dang bzhi yang yod shar dang ba lang spyod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:151b-3: shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:151b-4: ba lang spyod pa rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:151b-5: byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams ni rim bzhin khru brgyad pa dang /
T07TD4091E:151b-6: bcu drug pa dang nyi shu bzhi pa'o 'dod pa'i lha'i 'phel pa /
T07TD4091E:151b-7: rgyang grags kyi ni bzhi cha nas //
T07TD4091E:151b-8: rgyang grags phyed dang gnyis kyi bar //
T07TD4091E:151b-9: rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha zhes bya ba ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha ste /
T07TD4091E:151b-10: rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi tshad ni de tsam mo //
T07TD4091E:151b-11: de bzhin du rgyang grags bzhi chas klags na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi rgyang grags phyed dang gnyis so //
T07TD4091E:151b-12: gzugs can dang po dpag tshad phyed /
T07TD4091E:151b-13: gzugs can gyi lha rnams kyi gnas dang po la tshangs ris pa rnams kyi tshad ni dpag tshad phyed do //
T07TD4091E:151b-15: de yan chad du phyed phyed 'phel //
T07TD4091E:151b-16: gnas gsum dag tu tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams kyi ni phyed dang gnyis so //
T07TD4091E:151b-17: 'od chung ba rnams kyi dpag tshad gnyis so //
T07TD4091E:151b-18: 'od chung gi ni ltag yan chad //
T07TD4091E:151b-20: sprin med dpag tshad gsum 'dor ro //
T07TD4091E:151b-21: tshad med 'od pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi'o //
T07TD4091E:151b-22: 'od gsal ba rnams kyi ni brgyad do //
T07TD4091E:151b-23: de bzhin du dge rgyas pa rnams kyi drug cu rtsa bzhi yin pa'i bar du nyis 'gyur gyis bskyed do //
T07TD4091E:151b-24: sprin med pa rnams kyi ni nyis 'gyur du bsgyur nas de las dpag tshad gsum por nas dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T07TD4091E:151b-25: de yan chad bsod nams skyes la sogs pa nas 'og min gyi bar du nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur du byas nas /
T07TD4091E:151b-26: lus dpag tshad khri drug stong yin no //
T07TD4091E:151b-27: ci de ltar tshang 'thad pa rnams kyi tshe yang dbye ba yod dam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:151b-30: sgra mi snyan na tshe stong ste //
T07TD4091E:151b-32: gnyis pa phyed phyed spangs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:151b-33: gling gnyis pa la ni phyed phyed spangs pa ste /
T07TD4091E:151b-34: ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi ni lnga brgya'o //
T07TD4091E:151b-35: shar gyi lus 'phags rnams kyi ni nyis brgya lnga bcu'o //
T07TD4091E:151b-37: 'dzam bu'i gling na ni res 'ga' ring por 'gyur res 'ga' ni thung ngur 'gyur bas tshe la nges pa med de /
T07TD4091E:152a-1: lo zhes bya ba ni lo yin no //
T07TD4091E:152a-2: tha ma tshe thung du'i tshe ni lo bcur 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:152a-4: bskal pa dang po ba rnams tshe ni stong zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yongs su bzung bar mi nus pas dpag tu med pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:152a-5: mi rnams kyi bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:152a-6: lha rnams kyi bshad par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:152a-7: de yang nyin zhag rnams par gzhag na brjod par nus pas /
T07TD4091E:152a-8: re zhig de nyid rnam par gzhag bya ste /
T07TD4091E:152a-9: mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu la //
T07TD4091E:152a-10: lha dag gi ni nyin zhag gcig /'dod pa'i 'og ma'i rnams kyi yin //
T07TD4091E:152a-11: mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de dag ni /
T07TD4091E:152a-12: 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'og ma rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin te /
T07TD4091E:152a-13: de na tshe lo lnga bcu'o //
T07TD4091E:152a-14: de ba'i nyin zhag des na de rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni nyin zhag gsum cu la zla ba /
T07TD4091E:152a-15: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya thub bo //
T07TD4091E:152a-17: lha gong ma rnams ni nyin zhag dang tshe gnyis ka nyis 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:152a-19: mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig ste /
T07TD4091E:152a-20: des na de rnams kyi tshe ni lo stong ngo //
T07TD4091E:152a-21: de bzhin du mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya dang /
T07TD4091E:152a-24: stong drug brgya la nyin zhag gcig tu byas la /
T07TD4091E:152a-25: des na tshe rnams kyi tshe'i tshad lha'i lo stong dang /
T07TD4091E:152a-27: brgyad stong khri drug stong ste /
T07TD4091E:152a-28: 'thab bral ba rnams dang go rims bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:152a-29: 'dod pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:152a-30: gzugs can rnams la ni nyin mtshan med ni bskal par rang lus mnyam //
T07TD4091E:152a-31: gang dag gi lus dpag tshad phyed yin pa de dag gi tshe ni bskal pa phyed yin no //
T07TD4091E:152a-32: gang dag gi dpag tshad yin pa de dag gi bskal pa ste /
T07TD4091E:152a-33: de bzhin du 'og min par rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bskal pa khri drug stong yin pa'i bar du lus kyi tshad dpag tshad ji tsam mo //
T07TD4091E:152a-34: gzugs med bskal pa stong phrag ni //
T07TD4091E:152a-35: nyi shu lhag pa lhag par ro //
T07TD4091E:152a-36: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshed [*tshad] ni bskal pa nyi khri'o //
T07TD4091E:152a-37: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched pa rnams kyi ni de las nyi khris lhag go //
T07TD4091E:152b-0: ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa rnams @152b kyi de las nyi khris lhag go //
T07TD4091E:152b-1: 'du shes med 'du shes med min pa'i skye mched rnams kyi ni de las nyi khris lhag ste /
T07TD4091E:152b-2: de ltar na tshe'i tshad bskal pa nyi khri dang /
T07TD4091E:152b-5: brgyad khri ste rim pa bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:152b-6: 'dir bskal pa gang zhig yin par rig par bya //
T07TD4091E:152b-10: bskal pa chen po yang zhe na /
T07TD4091E:152b-11: 'od chung la sogs chen po ste //
T07TD4091E:152b-12: de yi 'og ma phyed yin no //
T07TD4091E:152b-13: 'od chung la sogs pa'i tshe ni bskal pa chen por rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:152b-14: de'i 'og ma tshangs chen la sogs pa'i tshe'i tshed [*tshad] ni bskal pa chen po'i phyed la bskal par byas nas rnam par gzhag ste /
T07TD4091E:152b-16: gang yang 'jig rten chags pa bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu dang /
T07TD4091E:152b-17: gang yang chags nas 'dug pa'i bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu dang /
T07TD4091E:152b-18: gang yang 'jig pa'i bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu ste /
T07TD4091E:152b-19: bar gyi bskal pa drug cu po de dag la tshangs pa chen po'i bskal pa phyed dang gnyis su bshad de /
T07TD4091E:152b-20: de ltar na bskal pa chen po'i bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu la bskal bar byas nas de dag tshe'i tshad du bshad pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:152b-21: da ni ngan 'gro ba rnams kyi brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:152b-22: de la re zhig /'dod lha'i tshe dang nyin zhag mnyam //
T07TD4091E:152b-23: yang sos dag tu rim bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:152b-24: lha drug po de dag gi tshe ji tsam bshad pa de dang ni rim bzhin yang sos dang /
T07TD4091E:152b-30: dmyal ba drug dag gi nyin zhag dang mnyam par rig par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:152b-31: de na de dag rnams kyi tshe //
T07TD4091E:152b-33: da ni rang nyin zhag de na /
T07TD4091E:152b-34: de dag gi ni rim bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du rig par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:152b-36: rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad gang yin pa de ni /
T07TD4091E:152b-37: dmyal ba chen pa yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la /
T07TD4091E:152b-38: nyin zhag des de pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshed [*tshad] ni zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig /
T07TD4091E:152b-39: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig pa'i lo lnga brgya thub ste /
T07TD4091E:152b-40: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang rim bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T07TD4091E:152b-41: rab tu tsha ba phyed yin no //
T07TD4091E:152b-42: sems can dmyal ba rab tu tsha ba'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa phyed do //
T07TD4091E:152b-43: mnar med pa ni bskal pa gcig / dud 'gro rnams ni nges pa med de /
T07TD4091E:153a-1: 'gro mchog tu ring ba ni bskal ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:153a-2: dud 'gro mchog tu tshe ring ba bskal ba'o //
T07TD4091E:153a-3: de yang klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo la sogs pa ste /
T07TD4091E:153a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag klu dang klu chen po brgyad po 'di dag ni /
T07TD4091E:153a-5: bskal par gnas pas 'dzin pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4091E:153a-6: yi dags rnams zla ba nyin zhag lo lnga brgya /
T07TD4091E:153a-7: mi rnams kyi zla ba yang yin pa de ni yi dags rnams kyi nyin zhag yin la /
T07TD4091E:153a-8: nyin zhag des na de dag gi tshe'i tshad lo lnga brgya'o //
T07TD4091E:153a-9: grang ba'i dmyal ba dag ni tshe'i tshad ji tsam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:153a-10: til sbyangs nas ni lo brgya zhing //
T07TD4091E:153a-11: til gcig phrad nas zad 'gyur ba //
T07TD4091E:153a-12: chu bur can gyi tshe yin te //
T07TD4091E:153a-13: gzhan gyi tshe ni nyi shu bsgyur /
T07TD4091E:153a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyi dpe tsam du bka' stsal pa ni /
T07TD4091E:153a-16: dper na yul ma ga dh'a'i til gyi sbyangs khal nyi shu pa cig til gyis dgang ste /
T07TD4091E:153a-17: de nas la la zhig gis lo brgya brgya 'das shing /
T07TD4091E:153a-18: til re re bor nas dge slong dag rim pa des na yul ma ga dh'a'i til gyi sbyangs khal nyi shu pa de ma lus par 'gyur ba ni ches myur gyi /
T07TD4091E:153a-19: chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe yongs su gtugs par ni nga mi smra'o //
T07TD4091E:153a-20: dge slong dag chu bur can ji lta ba de bzhin du chu bur rdol ba'i tshe gcig go zhes bya ba nas /
T07TD4091E:153a-21: yang dge slong dag padma ltar gas pa'i nyi shu ji lta ba de bzhin du padma ltar gas pa chen po'i tshe gcig go zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher gsungs te /
T07TD4091E:153a-22: ci tshe de lta bu dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams tshe yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor 'chi ba yod dam /
T07TD4091E:153a-25: sgra mi snyan ma gtogs par 'chi ba yod do //
T07TD4091E:153a-26: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi sems can gyi tshe ni nges kyi gzhan dag ni ma nges so //
T07TD4091E:153a-27: gang zag rnams las bar ma dor 'chi ba med pa mang ste /
T07TD4091E:153a-29: byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan na bzhugs pa rnams skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:153a-31: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:153a-33: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhums su bltams pa'i yum dang /
T07TD4091E:153a-34: de la sogs pa rnams so //
T07TD4091E:153a-35: de ltar na dpag tshad dang rgyang grags kyi tshad kyis gnas rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:153b-1: lo'i tshad kyis tsha yang bstan na /
T07TD4091E:153b-2: de gnyis kyi tshad ni ma bstan pas brjod par bya la /
T07TD4091E:153b-3: de dag thams cad kyi rnam par gzhag pa yang ming yin pas de'i phyir de'i mtha' yang brjod dgos te /
T07TD4091E:153b-4: de rnams yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dang po'i rim pa tsam mo //
T07TD4091E:153b-5: gzugs dang ming dang dus mtha' ni //
T07TD4091E:153b-6: phra rab rdul yig skad cig go //
T07TD4091E:153b-7: gzugs kyi nang na phra ba'i mtha' ni rdul phra rab bo //
T07TD4091E:153b-8: dus kyi mtha' ni skad cig go //
T07TD4091E:153b-9: ming gi mtha' ni yi ge'i 'bru ste dper na pa zhes pa'o //
T07TD4091E:153b-10: de yang skad cig ma'i tshad ji tsam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:153b-11: rkyen rnams tshogs nas ji srid du chos kyi bdag nyid du thob pa'o //
T07TD4091E:153b-13: phra rab dang rdul phran dang /
T07TD4091E:153b-14: de bzhin lcags kyu ri bong dang //
T07TD4091E:153b-15: lug dang glang dang nyi zer rdul //
T07TD4091E:153b-16: sro ma de las byung dang nas //
T07TD4091E:153b-17: de bzhin sor mo'i tshigs zhes bya //
T07TD4091E:153b-18: gong nas gong du bdun 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:153b-19: rdul phra rab la sogs pa 'di dag ni gong nas gong du bdun 'gyur du rig par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:153b-20: rdul phra rab bdun la ni rdul phran no //
T07TD4091E:153b-21: de bdun la lcags rdul lo //
T07TD4091E:153b-22: de bdun la ni chu rdul lo //
T07TD4091E:153b-23: de bdun la ni ri bong rdul lo //
T07TD4091E:153b-24: de bdun la ni lug rdul lo //
T07TD4091E:153b-25: de bdun la ni glang rdul lo //
T07TD4091E:153b-26: de bdun la ni nyi zer ro //
T07TD4091E:153b-27: de bdun la ni sro ma'o //
T07TD4091E:153b-28: de bdun la ni de las byung ba ste /
T07TD4091E:153b-29: sro ma las byung ba ni shig ces bya ba'i don to //
T07TD4091E:153b-31: nas bdun la ni sor mo'i tshigs so //
T07TD4091E:153b-32: sor mo'i tshigs gsum la ni sor mor grags pas 'di ni ma bshad do //
T07TD4091E:153b-34: sor tshigs nyi shu bzhi la khru //
T07TD4091E:153b-35: khru bzhi la ni gzhu yin no //
T07TD4091E:153b-36: gzhu 'dom zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07TD4091E:153b-37: de dag lnga brgya rnams la ni //
T07TD4091E:153b-38: rgyang grags de la dgon par 'dod //
T07TD4091E:153b-39: gzhu lnga brgya la ni rgyang grags te /
T07TD4091E:153b-40: grong nas rgyang grags tsam gyi thag la dgon par 'dod do //
T07TD4091E:153b-41: de brgyad dpag tshang ces bya'o //
T07TD4091E:153b-42: rgyang grags de brkyang dpag tshad ces bya'o //
T07TD4091E:153b-43: dpag tshad kyi tshad bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:153b-44: da ni lo brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:153b-45: skad cig ma brgya nyi shu la /
T07TD4091E:153b-46: de'i skad cig / skad cig ma brgya nyi shu de'i skad cig go //
T07TD4091E:153b-48: drug cu la ni thang cig go //
T07TD4091E:153b-49: de'i skad cig ma drug cu la thang cig ces bya'o //
T07TD4091E:153b-50: yud tsam nyin zhag zla gsum ni //
T07TD4091E:154a-2: thang cig sum cu la ni yud tsam /
T07TD4091E:154a-3: yud tsam sum cu la ni nyin zhag ste /
T07TD4091E:154a-7: nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba'o //
T07TD4091E:154a-8: zla ba bcu gnyis dag la ni //
T07TD4091E:154a-9: lo gcig zhag ni shol dang bcas //
T07TD4091E:154a-10: dgun gyi zla ba bzhi dang /
T07TD4091E:154a-11: dpyid kyi zla ba bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:154a-12: zla ba bcu gnyis po de dag shol zhag dang bcas pa la lo gcig go //
T07TD4091E:154a-13: lo la zhag gi shol drug dor te /
T07TD4091E:154a-15: dgun dang dpyid dang dbyar rnams kyi //
T07TD4091E:154a-16: zla ba phyed dang gnyis 'das nas //
T07TD4091E:154a-17: zla ba phyed ni len pa'i tshe //
T07TD4091E:154a-18: mkhas pa rnams kyis zhag shol dor //
T07TD4091E:154a-21: da ni bskal pa brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:154a-22: bskal ba rnam pa mang bshad pa //
T07TD4091E:154a-28: 'jig pa'i bskal pa dmyal ba yi //
T07TD4091E:154a-29: srid pa med nas snod zad pa //
T07TD4091E:154a-30: dmyal ba dag ni sems can mi srid pa nas snod zad pa'i bar gyi dus de la ni 'jig pa'i bskal pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:154a-31: chags pa dang po rlung nas ni //
T07TD4091E:154a-32: dmyal ba'i srid pa'i bar du'o //
T07TD4091E:154a-33: dang po rlung nas bzung ste /
T07TD4091E:154a-34: dmyal bdag ni sems can mi srid pa'i bar gyi dus de la chags pa'i bskal pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:154a-35: bar gyi bskal pa dpag med nas //
T07TD4091E:154a-36: tshe lo bcu pa'i bar du'o //
T07TD4091E:154a-37: 'jig rten chags pa nas mi rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i bar gyi bskal pa bcu dgu 'das par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:154a-38: tshe lo dpag tu med pa nyid nas 'grib ste /
T07TD4091E:154a-39: tshe lo bcu'i bar du gyur pa de ni chags nas gnas pa'i bar gyi bskal pa dang bo yin no //
T07TD4091E:154a-40: de nas yar skye mar 'grib pa'i //
T07TD4091E:154a-41: bskal pa gzhan ni bco brgyad do //
T07TD4091E:154a-42: bar gyi bskal pa yar skye ba bco brgyad dang mar 'grib pa bco brgyad du 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:154a-44: tshe lo bcu pa de dag las yar skye ba na rim gyis tshe lo brgyad khri'i bar 'gyur la /
T07TD4091E:154a-45: de nas yang mar 'grib pa na tshe lo bcu par 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:154a-46: 'di ni bar gyi bskal pa gnyis pa ste /
T07TD4091E:154a-47: de lta na bco brgyad dang yar skye ba gcig / bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu pa gcig ni yar skye ba nyid de mar 'grib pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:154a-48: yang yar skye ba de dag ji tsam gyi tshad du yang skye bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T07TD4091E:154b-0: de dag @154b tshe ni brgyad khri bar //
T07TD4091E:154b-1: de las yar ni mi skye'o //
T07TD4091E:154b-2: bar gyi bskal pa gzhan dag gi yar skye ba dang mar 'grib ba ji srid par dang po'i mar 'grib pa'i dus dang /
T07TD4091E:154b-3: tha mar yar skye ba'i dus kyang de srid do //
T07TD4091E:154b-4: de ltar thams cad du mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:154b-6: gnas pa bskal pa nyi shu yin //
T07TD4091E:154b-7: de ltar na bar gyi bskal pa'i tshul des 'jig rten 'di bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu chags nas gnas so //
T07TD4091E:154b-9: chags dang zhig nas 'dug pa dang //
T07TD4091E:154b-10: de bzhin 'jig pa dag mnyam mo //
T07TD4091E:154b-11: bar gyi bskal ba nyi shu kho nar chags so //
T07TD4091E:154b-13: gal te yang yar skye ba dang mar 'grib pa mi 'jug tu zin kyang dus ni mnyam par yongs su brtsi'o //
T07TD4091E:154b-14: nyi shu phrag bzhi po de dag ni brgyad cur 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:154b-15: de dag bskal chen bskal chen te //
T07TD4091E:154b-16: bskal pa chen po'i tshad ni de yin no //
T07TD4091E:154b-17: bskal pa grangs med pa dag gis sangs rgyas nyid thob bo zhes gsungs pa'i bskal pa'i bskal pa de dag gang zhe na /
T07TD4091E:154b-18: bskal pa chen por bshad pa gang yin pa ste /
T07TD4091E:154b-19: de grangs med gsum las sangs rgyas 'byung ngo //
T07TD4091E:154b-20: ci sangs rgyas yar skye ba'i tshe 'byung ngam 'on te mar 'grib ba'i tshe zhe na /
T07TD4091E:154b-22: brgya yi bar la de 'byung ngo //
T07TD4091E:154b-23: skye dgu rnams ni tshe lo brgyad khri mar 'grib par brtsams pa nas tshe lo brgyad pa'i bar der sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:154b-24: yang rang sangs rgyas rnams gang gi dus la 'byung zhe na /
T07TD4091E:154b-25: rang sangs rgyas rnams gnyi ga la //
T07TD4091E:154b-26: yar skye ba dang mar 'grib pa'i tshe gnyi ga la yang 'byung ngo //
T07TD4091E:154b-27: rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T07TD4091E:154b-28: tshogs shing spyod pa rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:154b-29: bse ru lta bu rnams so //
T07TD4091E:154b-31: bse ru bskal pa brgya yi rgyus //
T07TD4091E:154b-32: bskal pa brgyar byang chub tshogs la yang yongs su spyod pas bse ru lta bur 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:154b-33: bstan pa med par bdag gis so sor sangs rgyas pas na rang sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:154b-34: yang 'khor los sgyur ba rnams nam 'byung zhe na /
T07TD4091E:154b-36: stong phrag brgyad cu las mi 'phyi //
T07TD4091E:155a-0: mi rnams kyi tshe lo dpag tu med pa dang nas brgyad khri'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ba rnams @155a * //
T07TD4091E:155a-3: de dag kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:155a-4: 'khor lo gser dngul zangs dang lcags //
T07TD4091E:155a-5: de dag la gser dngul dang zangs dang lcags kyi 'khor lo yod de /
T07TD4091E:155a-6: de dag gi dang po ni mchog yin no //
T07TD4091E:155a-7: gnyis pa ni nye ba'i mchog yin no //
T07TD4091E:155a-10: de dag gling gcig gling gnyis dang //
T07TD4091E:155a-11: gsum dang bzhi la mas rim bzhin //
T07TD4091E:155a-12: btags pa las ni de ltar bstan to //
T07TD4091E:155a-13: mdo las ni gtso bo smos pa'i phyir gser gyi 'khor lo 'ba' zhig tu bshad do //
T07TD4091E:155a-14: de lta bu'i 'khor los sgyur ba de dag 'byung ba ni //
T07TD4091E:155a-15: lhan cig gnyis min sangs rgyas bzhin //
T07TD4091E:155a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ji lta bar 'khor los sgyur ba yang de bzhin no zhes mdo'i tshig las 'byung ngo //
T07TD4091E:155a-17: yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de dag dang gser la sogs pa'i 'khor los sa las rgyal ba na ji ltar rgyal bar byed ce na /
T07TD4091E:155a-19: phas bsu ba dang rang 'gro dang //
T07TD4091E:155a-20: g-yul bshams pa dang mtshon brtsams dang //
T07TD4091E:155a-22: gang gi gser gyi 'khor lo yin pa de ni khams kyi rgyal phran rnams rang bsu zhing 'di dag ni lha'i 'bangs so zhes bya ba ji skad du mdo las 'byung ba dang /
T07TD4091E:155a-24: gang du 'dul gyi rgyu yin pa de ni bdag nyid de dag gi gnas su 'gro zhing phyis 'dud par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:155a-25: gang gi zangs kyi rgyu yin pa de ni bdag nyid de dag gi gnas su song nas g-yul bsham pa las phyis rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:155a-26: gang gi lcags kyi rgyu yin pa de ni de dag gan du song phan tshun mtshon brtsams pa las phyis 'dud par byed do //
T07TD4091E:155a-27: 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyis kyang gnod pa med pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:155a-28: mtshon chas rigs kyang gnod pa mi 'jug go //
T07TD4091E:155a-29: ci 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gzhan las khyad par de 'ba' zhig yod dam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:155a-31: de dag las skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod de /
T07TD4091E:155a-32: dper na sangs rgyas bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:155a-34: thub pa'i mtshan rnams 'phags pa dang //
T07TD4091E:155a-35: yul na gnas shing gsal la rdzogs //
T07TD4091E:155a-36: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yul na gnas shing gsal bar kun rdzogs pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:155b-0: de dag ni khyad @155b par de yin no //
T07TD4091E:155b-1: yang ci bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyang rgyal po dang bcas par gyur tam zhe na smras pa /
T07TD4091E:155b-3: ji ltar gzugs can sems can bzhin sngar 'gyur //
T07TD4091E:155b-4: bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams ni gzugs na spyod pa'i sems can bzhin du gyur to //
T07TD4091E:155b-5: de nas rim gyis rol ni //
T07TD4091E:155b-6: chags shing snyom las phyir bsags shing //
T07TD4091E:155b-7: 'dzin bcas rnams kyis zhing dpon bkur //
T07TD4091E:155b-8: de dag de bzhin du byung ba rnams la sa'i ro sbrang rtsi'i ro bro ba byung bar gyur pa las /
T07TD4091E:155b-9: sems can brkam pa'i rang bzhin can gang yang rung ba zhig gis dri bsnams shing ro myangs nas zos pa dang /
T07TD4091E:155b-10: de nas sems can gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du byed par 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:155b-11: kham gyi zas kyi rtsom pa de yin no //
T07TD4091E:155b-12: de dag kyang kham gyi zas de la goms pa'i phyir lus rtsub pa nyid dang /
T07TD4091E:155b-13: lci ba nyid du gyur cing 'od kyang nub pa dang //
T07TD4091E:155b-14: de nas mun pa byung ba'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang byung ngo //
T07TD4091E:155b-15: de dag gi sa'i ro la chags pa rnams la rim gyis nub par gyur nas de nas sa zhag byung ngo //
T07TD4091E:155b-16: de la chags pas de yang nub pa dang myu gu'i tshal byung bar gyur to //
T07TD4091E:155b-17: de la chags bas de yang nub par gyur pa dang ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras s'a lu byung bar gyur nas de za ba'i tshe na ni de ches rags pa yin pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi gcin dang phyis dang /
T07TD4091E:155b-18: pho dang mo'i dbang po dang bcas pa dang /
T07TD4091E:155b-19: dbyibs tha dad pa yang byung bar gyur nas //
T07TD4091E:155b-20: de dag phan tshun mthong ba dang sngon goms pa'i dbang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i gdon gyis zin par gyur pa rnams 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyes pa'i phyir log par zhugs te /
T07TD4091E:155b-21: 'dod pa rnams 'dod pa'i 'byung po'i gdon gyis bab pa'i rtsom pa ni de lta bu yin no //
T07TD4091E:155b-22: yang de dag nang bza' ba'i 'bras s'a lu nang blangs /
T07TD4091E:155b-23: nub za ba yang nub len pa las sems can le lo'i rang bzhin gang yang rung ba zhig gis bsags pa dang /
T07TD4091E:155b-24: sems can gzhan dag kyang sogs par byed de /
T07TD4091E:155b-25: de dag de la bdag tu 'dzin pa skyes pa dang 'bras bu bsdus shing brdas pa dang mi skye bar gyur to //
T07TD4091E:155b-26: de nas zhing rnams bgos te /
T07TD4091E:156a-0: bdag gir kun du bzung nas @156a * //
T07TD4091E:156a-1: gzhan gyis 'phrog par rtsom pa'i dang po de yin no //
T07TD4091E:156a-2: de nas de dag gis de dag chad pas gcad pa'i phyir 'dus nas gang yang rung ba'i mi zhig zhing rnams kyi dbon por byed pa'i phyir drug chas bstabs te /
T07TD4091E:156a-3: zhing rnams kyi dpon de la rgyal rigs zhes bya ba'i ming byung ngo //
T07TD4091E:156a-4: skye bo'i tshogs phal po ches bkur ba dang skye dgu kun gyis dga' bar byas pas rgyal po mang pos bkur zhes pa'i ming byung ste /
T07TD4091E:156a-5: rgyal po gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rtsom pa de yin no //
T07TD4091E:156a-6: de nas gang yang rung ba'i rgyal po zhig ba gam pa'i phyir bsgo bar ma byas pas sems can rkun po mang po byung ba dang /
T07TD4091E:156a-7: des de dag la mtshon gyis gsod par byed do //
T07TD4091E:156a-8: de nas gzhan zhig dag kyang bdag gis ma byas so zhes brdzun smra bar brtsams so //
T07TD4091E:156a-9: de nas las kyi lam lhag pas //
T07TD4091E:156a-10: tshe thung lo ni bcu dag go //
T07TD4091E:156a-11: de nas de ltar las kyi lam rnams 'phel ba na mi rnams kyi tshe khad kyis thung ngur gyur pa dang /
T07TD4091E:156a-12: tha mar tshe lo bcu pa dag tu gyur te /
T07TD4091E:156a-13: mi rnams kyi tshe lo bcu ba na bar gyi bskal pa'i tsha sar phyin pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:156a-14: ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:156a-16: bskal pa mtshon dang nad dang ni //
T07TD4091E:156a-17: mu ge dag gis tshar phyin to //
T07TD4091E:156a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad mtshon dang nad dang mu ge dang gsum gyis bskal pa'i tshar phyin to zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4091E:156a-19: yang mtshon chas gsod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:156a-21: mu ge dag sems can rnams la ji srid cig 'byung zhe na /
T07TD4091E:156a-22: zhag la bdun dang zla ba dang //
T07TD4091E:156a-23: lo rnams dag ste go rims bzhin //
T07TD4091E:156a-24: mtshon chags gsod pa dang nad dang mu ge rnams yin no //
T07TD4091E:156a-25: 'jig pa'i bskal pa dmyal ba yi //
T07TD4091E:156a-26: srid pa med nas snod zad pa //
T07TD4091E:156a-27: zhes bshad pa la yang 'jig rten 'jig pa du zhig yin /
T07TD4091E:156a-28: rtsom pa ni du zhig ce na /
T07TD4091E:156a-29: 'jig pa dag ni gsum yin te //
T07TD4091E:156a-30: me dang chu dang rlung dag gis //
T07TD4091E:156a-31: sems can rnams bsam gtan gcig tu brje bas na 'di ni 'jig rten pa ste /
T07TD4091E:156a-32: nyi ma bdun gyis ni mes 'jig pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:156a-33: char ba'i chus ni chus 'jig pa'o //
T07TD4091E:156a-34: rlung gis rab tu 'khrugs pas ni rlung gis 'jig pa'o //
T07TD4091E:156a-35: yang 'jig pa'i rtse mo gang yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:156b-0: bsam gtan gnyis sogs @156b gsum po ni //
T07TD4091E:156b-1: de dag gi rtse rim bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:156b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du 'jig pa gsungs pa'i 'jig pa'i rtse mo gsum ste /
T07TD4091E:156b-3: gang gi tshe mes 'jig par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig pa'i rtse mo yin no //
T07TD4091E:156b-4: gang gi tshe chus 'jig par 'gyur ba de'i tshe ni dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig pa'i rtse mo yin no //
T07TD4091E:156b-5: gang gi tshe rlung gis 'jig par 'gyur ba de'i tshe ni 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig pa'i rtse mo yin no //
T07TD4091E:156b-6: yang ci bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa rnams me dang chu dang rlung gis 'jig pa na /
T07TD4091E:156b-7: de dang skyon dang chos mthun phyir //
T07TD4091E:156b-8: bsam gtan dang po na ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa skyon yin te /
T07TD4091E:156b-9: de dag kyang yid kyi gdung ba yin pa'i phyir me'i bskal pa'o //
T07TD4091E:156b-10: gnyis pa na ni dga' ba skyon yin te /
T07TD4091E:156b-11: de yang shin tu bsrabs pa dang ldan pas lus mnyen par byed pa'i phyir chu'i bskal pa'o //
T07TD4091E:156b-12: bsam gtan gsum pa na ni dbugs 'byung ba yin pas de dag la ni rlung ngo zhes gsungs te /
T07TD4091E:156b-13: bsam gtan gang la snyoms par 'jug pa'i nang gi skyon ji lta bur bsam gtan de la snyoms par 'jug pa'i skyon yang de lta bu nyid do //
T07TD4091E:156b-14: yang bsam gtan bzhi pa dag na ji ltar 'jig ce na /
T07TD4091E:156b-15: bzhi pa la med mi g-yo'i phyir //
T07TD4091E:156b-16: bsam gtan bzhi pa na ni nang gi skyon dang bral ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis mi g-yo bar gsungs te /
T07TD4091E:156b-17: 'di phyir der phyi'i skyon yang mi 'jug pas 'jig pa med do //
T07TD4091E:156b-18: 'o na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i snod rtag par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T07TD4091E:156b-19: rtag pa ma yin sems can dang //
T07TD4091E:156b-20: gzhal med khang bcas 'byung zhing 'jig / bsam gtan bzhi pa las gcig tu 'brel pa ni ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:156b-22: de ni gnas gzhan du chad pa yin pas de'i phyir sems can de'i gzhal med khang bcas te /
T07TD4091E:156b-24: yang ci sems can 'jig pa'i mjug thogs su chus 'jig pa yin nam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:156b-28: mes 'jig pa bdun pa yin la de nas ni /
T07TD4091E:156b-30: chus 'jig pa'i bdun thal nas yang //
T07TD4091E:156b-31: mes 'jig bdun yin de nas ni //
T07TD4091E:157a-2: phyis ni rlung gi 'jig pa gcig yin no //
T07TD4091E:157a-4: sems can de dag gi snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par lus rnams gnas pa'i khyad par ji lta bar snod rnams kyang de bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:157a-5: de ltar de dag gis mes 'jig pa lnga bcu rtsa drug dang /
T07TD4091E:157a-7: rlung gi 'jig pa gcig tu 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:157a-8: de ltar byas na btags pa las /
T07TD4091E:157a-9: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa bzhi'o zhes bshad pa legs par grangs pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:157a-10: chos mngon pa mdzod kyi bstan bcos 'jig rten bstan pa'i 'grel ba mdo dang mthun pa las 'jig rten bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa'o /
T07TD4091E:157a-12: // / yang sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs bshad pa gang yin pa de sus byas she na /
T07TD4091E:157a-13: sus kyang blo sngon du btang ste byas pa ni med do //
T07TD4091E:157a-14: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4091E:157a-16: las las 'jig rten sna tshogs skyes //
T07TD4091E:157a-17: gal te las las skyes na ci'i phyir sems can rnams kyi las dag gis gur kum dang /
T07TD4091E:157a-18: tsan dan la sogs pa ches dga' dga' lta bu skye bar 'gyur la de dag gi lus ma yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:157a-19: sems can 'dren mar byed pa rnams kyi las de lta bu dag kho nas gang rma lta bur 'gyur ba'i lus dag dang /
T07TD4091E:157a-20: de'i gnyen por 'gyur ba longs spyod dga' dga' lta bu dag skye'i /
T07TD4091E:157a-21: lha 'dren mar byed pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ni gnyi ga yang dga' dga' lta bu dag yin no //
T07TD4091E:157a-22: las de yang gang zhig ce na /
T07TD4091E:157a-23: de ni sems pa dang des byas //
T07TD4091E:157a-24: mdo las las ni gnyis te /
T07TD4091E:157a-26: bsams pa'i las so zhes gang gsungs pa la /
T07TD4091E:157a-27: bsams pa gang yin bde ni sems pas byas pa de yin no //
T07TD4091E:157a-28: las gnyis po de dag ni gsum yin te /
T07TD4091E:157a-29: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams so //
T07TD4091E:157a-30: las 'di dag ji ltar gzhag / ci ste las sam /
T07TD4091E:157a-31: 'on te ngo bo nyid las sam /
T07TD4091E:157a-32: 'on te kun nas slong ba las /
T07TD4091E:157a-33: gal te rten las yin na ni thams cad lus la brten pa'i phyis lus kyi las gcig pur 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:157b-0: gal te ngo bo nyid las yin na ni de dag @157b gi las gcig pur 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:157b-1: gal te kun nas slong ba las yin na ni thams cad kyang kun nas bslang ba'i las gcig pur 'gyur ro zhe na /
T07TD4091E:157b-2: bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re rgyu gsum gyi go rims bzhin du gsum rnam par gzhag go zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:157b-4: sems pa ni yid kyi las yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:157b-5: des skyed lus dang ngag gi las //
T07TD4091E:157b-6: sems pas bskyed pa gang yin pa //
T07TD4091E:157b-7: bsams pa'i las zhes gsungs pa de dag ni lus dang ngag gi las su rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:157b-9: lus dang ngag gi las de dag ni so sor rnam par rig byed dang /
T07TD4091E:157b-10: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dag tu rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:157b-12: lus rnam rig byed dbyibs su 'dod //
T07TD4091E:157b-13: sems kyi dbang gis lus de dang de ltar gnas pa ni lus kyi rnam par rig byed yin no //
T07TD4091E:157b-14: gzhan dag na ni lus kyi rnam par rig byed 'gro ba yin par 'dod de /
T07TD4091E:157b-16: lus g-yo ba nas lus kyi las yin gyi mi g-yo ba ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:157b-17: de la 'gro ba yin par smra ba rnams la dbyibs su smra bas lan btab pa /
T07TD4091E:157b-18: 'gro ba ma yin gang gi phyir //
T07TD4091E:157b-19: 'dus byas skad cig /'dus byas thams cad ni bdag nyid thob pa las phan chad du mi gnas te /
T07TD4091E:157b-20: gang du skyes pa de nyid du 'jig pa de la ni yul gzhan du 'pho bar mi rigs pas /
T07TD4091E:157b-21: de bas na lus kyi rnam par rig byed ni 'gro ba ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:157b-22: gal te thams cad skad cig ma nyid du grub par gyur na ni de bzhin du 'gyur ba zhig na /
T07TD4091E:157b-23: ma grub pa'i phyir ma yin no zhe na /
T07TD4091E:157b-24: de ni grub pa nyid khong du chud par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:157b-26: 'dus byas la ni rgyu med par //
T07TD4091E:157b-28: 'jig pa ni bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'byung ba thams cad ni rgyu med par 'jig go //
T07TD4091E:157b-29: rgyu med par 'jig pa gang yin pa de gal te dngos po byung ba tsam lam yin na ni bye brag med pa'i phyir phyis kyang mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
T07TD4091E:157b-30: de ni mthong ba ste de dag ni skad cig ma nyid du grub bo //
T07TD4091E:157b-31: dngos po rnams rgyu med par 'jig go zhes bya ba 'di gang las she na /
T07TD4091E:157b-33: ji skad du bshad ce na /
T07TD4091E:157b-34: 'jig pa ni bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
T07TD4091E:158a-1: gal te 'jig pa las rgyu can zhig tu gyur na ni skye ba bzhin du 'ga' yang rgyu med par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
T07TD4091E:158a-2: blo dang sgra dang me lce dag gi skad cig ma rnams la rgyu med par 'jig pa yang mthong bas 'di ni rgyu la ltos pa yang ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:158a-3: gal te yang shing la sogs pa me dang 'brel pa'i rgyu can zhig tu 'jig par 'gyur na ni cir 'gyur zhe na /
T07TD4091E:158a-4: chos pa las skye ba bzhin du 'jig pa la yang 'jig pa can du 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:158a-6: gal te shing la sogs pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i me dang 'brel pa'i rgyu can du 'jig par gyur na ni /
T07TD4091E:158a-7: de lta yin na ni tshos pa las skyes pa'i tshos pa dang /
T07TD4091E:158a-9: ches cher tshos pa dag la rgyu nyid 'jig pa por 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:158a-11: me dang 'brel gang ches tshos pa las skyes pa byung ba rnams de nyid las sam de dang 'dra ba las /
T07TD4091E:158a-14: ches cher tshos pa byung na de dag 'jig pas rgyu nyid de dag gi 'jig pa po 'am rgyu bye brag med par 'gyur ba zhig na /
T07TD4091E:158a-15: gang nyid las sam gang dang 'dra ba las skyes pa ni de nyid las sam de dang 'dra ba las med par 'gyur bar rig pa ma yin pas /
T07TD4091E:158a-16: de'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi 'jig pa la rgyu med do //
T07TD4091E:158a-17: bdag nyid 'jig pa yin pa'i phyir 'jig na ni byung ba tsam nyid du 'jig pas 'di dag skad cig mar 'jig par grub bo //
T07TD4091E:158a-18: skad cig mar zhig pa'i phyir 'gro ba med do //
T07TD4091E:158a-19: rtsva med bzhin du yul gzhan du bar chad med par 'byung ba la 'gro ba yin par mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed do //
T07TD4091E:158a-20: 'gro ba med na lus kyi rnam par rig byed ni dbyibs yin par grub bo //
T07TD4091E:158a-21: yang de skad du smra ba dag dbyibs rdzas su smra ba rnams la dpes ston pa dag gis smras pa /
T07TD4091E:158a-22: kha dog la sogs pa las rigs gzhan pa'i dbyibs rdzas ni yod pa ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:158a-23: gal te yod na ni de /
T07TD4091E:158a-25: mig gis mthong na yang ring po'o zhes bya bar rtogs par 'gyur la /
T07TD4091E:158a-26: lus kyi dbang pos reg na yang ring po'o zhes bya bar rtogs par 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:158b-0: de'i phyir 'di ni dbang po nyid kyis 'dzin par @158b 'gyur ba zhig na /
T07TD4091E:158b-1: gzugs kyi skye mched la ni gnyis kyis 'dzin pa med de /
T07TD4091E:158b-2: de bas na dbyibs ni rdzas nyid du med do //
T07TD4091E:158b-3: gang yang chung zad thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs yod pa de ni gdon ma zos par rdul phra mo dag la yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
T07TD4091E:158b-4: ring bo la sogs pa yi dbyibs //
T07TD4091E:158b-6: de bas na mang po de ltar gnas pa nyid la ring po la sogs par gdags so //
T07TD4091E:158b-7: da ni lus kyi 'gro ba dang dbyibs kyang bsal na /
T07TD4091E:158b-8: de la dpe ston pa khyed rnams ci la lus kyi rnam par rig byed du 'dogs she na /
T07TD4091E:158b-9: de dag ni dbyibs nyid la lus kyi rnam par rig byed du 'dogs par byed la rdzas su ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:158b-10: der 'dogs pa na ji ltar lus kyi las su 'dogs par byed ce na /
T07TD4091E:158b-11: lus la brten pa'i las ni lus kyi las te /
T07TD4091E:158b-12: de dang der lus 'jug par byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa'o //
T07TD4091E:158b-13: de bzhin du ngag dang yid kyi las dag la yang ci rigs par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:158b-14: gzhung pa dag na re dbyibs ni rdzas nyid yin la /
T07TD4091E:158b-15: lus kyi rnam par rig byed ni dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can no zhes brjod do //
T07TD4091E:158b-16: ngag gi rnam rig ngag gi sgra //
T07TD4091E:158b-17: ngag gi rang bzhin gyi sgra gang yin pa de nyid dag gi rnam par rig byed yin no //
T07TD4091E:158b-18: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni sngar bshad pa nyid do //
T07TD4091E:158b-19: dpes ston pa dag na re /
T07TD4091E:158b-20: de yang mi bya bar khas 'ches pa tsam yin pa'i phyir rdzas nyid du med do zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:158b-21: gzhung pa dag na re yod do zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:158b-23: rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang //
T07TD4091E:158b-24: 'phel dang ma byas la sogs las //
T07TD4091E:158b-25: mdo las gzugs rnam pa gsum gsungs pa la /
T07TD4091E:158b-26: bstan du yod la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs kyang yod /
T07TD4091E:158b-27: bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs kyang yod /
T07TD4091E:158b-28: bstan du yang med la thogs pa yang med pa'i gzugs kyang yod ces bya ba gnas gsum dag gi gzugs kho nar gzugs bsdu bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:158b-29: zag pa med pa'i gzugs kyang gsungs te /
T07TD4091E:158b-30: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
T07TD4091E:159a-0: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i gzugs gang la rjes su chags pa'am khong khrob mi skye ba nas rnam par shes pa gang @159a * //
T07TD4091E:159a-1: la mi skye ba zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o zhes pa la /
T07TD4091E:159a-2: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs ma gtogs par ni bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'i gzugs kyang med la zag pa med pa yang med do //
T07TD4091E:159a-4: rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun gyi mdo las /
T07TD4091E:159a-5: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams mngon par 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ba nyid do zhes gsungs pa'ang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa las gzhan pa yid kyis ni bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar rung ba ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:159a-6: bdag gis ma byas la gzhan gyis byed du bcug pa'i las kyi lam kun nas ldang ba yang mthong ste /
T07TD4091E:159a-7: de yang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med par mi rigs so //
T07TD4091E:159a-9: dge slong dag chos ni phyi'i skye mched de /
T07TD4091E:159a-10: skye mched bcu gcig gis ma bsdus pa bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'o zhes gsungs kyi gzugs can ma yin pa'o zhes ni ma gsungs pas /
T07TD4091E:159a-11: gal te chos kyi skye mched kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i gzugs ma gzigs na /
T07TD4091E:159a-12: de la dgos pa ci zhig tu 'gyur /
T07TD4091E:159a-13: snyoms par zhugs pa la ngag dang /
T07TD4091E:159a-15: 'tsho ba med pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs par 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad du yang mi 'gyur bas de bas na rnam par rig byed ma yin pas yod pa nyid do //
T07TD4091E:159a-16: gal te yod la de yang 'byung ba chen po rnams rgyur byas pa'o zhes bshad na /
T07TD4091E:159a-17: de ci rnam par rig byed kyi 'byung ba chen po rnams nyid rgyur byas nas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skye'am zhe na /
T07TD4091E:159a-20: tshogs pa de nyid las 'bras bu phra ma dang /
T07TD4091E:159a-21: 'bras bu rags pa de gnyi ga 'byung bar ni mi rung ngo //
T07TD4091E:159a-22: ji rnam par rig byed gang gi dus pa nyid yin pa de'i dus pa nyid kyis 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas ba min nam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:159a-23: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs thams cad ni phal cher de bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:159a-24: da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa cung zad cig ni 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams rgyur byas pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:159a-26: 'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig / phyin chad 'das pa'i 'byung las skyes //
T07TD4091E:159b-0: @159b 'dod gtogs rnam rig min zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'o //
T07TD4091E:159b-1: skad cig phyin chad ces bya ba ni skad cig ma dang po las dus phyi ma'o //
T07TD4091E:159b-2: 'das pa'i 'byung las skye zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams rgyur byas nas skye ba ste /
T07TD4091E:159b-3: de dag ni 'di'i gzhi'i don du 'gyur la /
T07TD4091E:159b-4: da ltar byung ba'i 'byung ba chen po rnams rten gyi don du 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:159b-6: rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir go rims bzhin te /
T07TD4091E:159b-7: 'khor los la 'dril ba'i lag pas phug pa dang /
T07TD4091E:159b-9: yang sa gang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las la gang ba'i 'byung ba rnams rgyur byas pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:159b-10: zag bcas lus dang ngag gi las //
T07TD4091E:159b-11: rang gi 'byung ba rgyur byas pa'o //
T07TD4091E:159b-12: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lus dang ngag gi las ni 'dod pa spyod pa nyid kyi 'byung ba chen po rnams rgyur byas pa yin la /
T07TD4091E:159b-13: de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i bar du yang de'i sa pa nyid rnams rgyur byas pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:159b-14: zag med gang du skyes pa yin /
T07TD4091E:159b-15: zag pa med pa'i lus dang ngag gi las de ni sa gang du skyes par skyed par byed pas de ni sa de pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams rgyur byas pa yin par rig par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:159b-16: khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ba dang /
T07TD4091E:159b-17: zag pa med pa rnams la 'byung ba dag med pa'i phyir ba dang /
T07TD4091E:159b-18: de'i stobs kyis skye ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:159b-19: de la rnam par rig byed dang /
T07TD4091E:159b-20: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i las la /
T07TD4091E:159b-21: rnam rig ma yin rgyu mthun 'byung //
T07TD4091E:159b-22: ma zin sems can zhes bya bar //
T07TD4091E:159b-25: rgyu mthun zin pa'i 'byung las skyes //
T07TD4091E:159b-26: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dang /
T07TD4091E:159b-27: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams nyid rgyur byas nas skye ste /
T07TD4091E:159b-28: mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i sa pa rnams ni de lta'o //
T07TD4091E:159b-30: ma zin 'byung ba gcig las skyes //
T07TD4091E:159b-31: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa bsam gtan dang /
T07TD4091E:159b-32: zag pa med pa'i sdom pa rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni ting nge 'dzin skyes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:159b-33: rgyas pa las byung ba dang /
T07TD4091E:159b-34: ma zin pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams rgyur byas nas skye ste /
T07TD4091E:160a-1: dag rgyur byas nas srog gcod pa spangs pa skye ba de dag nyid las tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i bar du skye'o //
T07TD4091E:160a-3: sems bzhin du 'byung ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:160a-4: so sor thar ba'i sdom pa ni 'byung ba chen po gzhan dang gzhan dag rgyur byas nas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bdun skye'o //
T07TD4091E:160a-5: rnam par rig byed ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba ste /
T07TD4091E:160a-7: de ltar las rnam pa gnyis dang /
T07TD4091E:160a-9: rnam pa lngar bshad bde la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang rnam pa gnyis so //
T07TD4091E:160a-10: lung bstan min rnam rig min med //
T07TD4091E:160a-12: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems ni stobs chung bas de'i phyir gang 'gag kyang de'i rjes su mthun par byed pa'i las stobs dang ldan pa 'phen par mi nus so //
T07TD4091E:160a-14: las gzhan ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang gsum mo //
T07TD4091E:160a-16: rnam par rig byed dang sems pa'o //
T07TD4091E:160a-18: 'dod pa'i mi dge ba'i las ni 'dod pa'i khams 'ba' zhig na yod kyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:160a-19: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:160a-20: ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa sbangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:160a-21: dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa ni ma bkag pa'i phyir thams cad na yod do //
T07TD4091E:160a-22: de la gzugs na'ang rnam rig min //
T07TD4091E:160a-23: yang gi sgras ni 'dod pa na yang yod do //
T07TD4091E:160a-24: gzugs med pa dag ni 'byung ba med pa'i phyir med de /
T07TD4091E:160a-25: gang du lus dang ngag 'jug pa der lus dang ngag gi gi sdom pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:160a-26: rnam rig spyod dang bcas pa yi //
T07TD4091E:160a-28: 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po na yod kyi de yan chad na ni med do //
T07TD4091E:160a-29: 'dod pa na yang bsgribs pa med //
T07TD4091E:160a-30: bsgribs pa'i rnam par rig byed ni 'dod ba'i khams dag na yang med do //
T07TD4091E:160a-31: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'ba' zhig na yod de //
T07TD4091E:160a-32: tshangs pa chen po'i lus dang ngag gi las ni g-yos kun nas bslang ba'o zhes grag go //
T07TD4091E:160a-33: ci'i phyir tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yan chad na /
T07TD4091E:160a-34: rnam par rig byed med la 'dod pa'i khams dag na yang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa med ce na /
T07TD4091E:160b-0: rtog @160b pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed na /
T07TD4091E:160b-1: de yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na med la /
T07TD4091E:160b-2: bsgoms te spang par bya bas yin na /
T07TD4091E:160b-3: bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems de yang 'dod pa'i khams dag na med la /
T07TD4091E:160b-4: mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni kha nang du bltas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:160b-5: yang ci kun nas slong ba'i dbang 'ba' zhig gis chos rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge bar rig par bya ba'am zhe na /
T07TD4091E:160b-10: rang bzhin dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang /
T07TD4091E:160b-12: de la re zhig / thar pa dam pa'i don du dge / sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par zhi ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:160b-13: de ni mchog tu bde ba yin pas don dam par de ge ba ste /
T07TD4091E:160b-16: ngo tsha khrel yod pa bdag nyid kyis //
T07TD4091E:160b-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum dang /
T07TD4091E:160b-19: khrel yod pa ni rang bzhin gyis dge ba ste /
T07TD4091E:160b-20: mtshungs par gzhan gyis kun nas bslang ba la mi ltos pa'i phyir te /
T07TD4091E:160b-22: de dang ldan rnams mtshungs ldan gyis //
T07TD4091E:160b-23: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa de dag nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams ni mtshungs par ldan pas dge ba yin te /
T07TD4091E:160b-24: de dag dang mi ldan pa rnams la dge ba med pa'i phyir sman dang bsres pa'i btung ba bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:160b-25: kun nas bslang bas bya la sogs //
T07TD4091E:160b-26: dge ba'i rtsa ba la sogs pa de dag nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi kun du bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las dang sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams ni kun nas bslang bas dge ba ste /
T07TD4091E:160b-27: sman dang btung ba las byung ba'i 'o ma bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:160b-28: dge ba ji skad du bshad pa de las /
T07TD4091E:160b-29: bzlog pa mi dge / ji lta zhe na /
T07TD4091E:160b-30: 'khor ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad 'jug pa'i bdag nyid kyis mchog tu mi bde ba yin pa'i phyir don dam par mi dge ba'o //
T07TD4091E:160b-31: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa ni rang bzhin gyis so //
T07TD4091E:160b-32: de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams ni mtshungs par ldan pas so //
T07TD4091E:161a-1: kun nas bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las dang /
T07TD4091E:161a-2: thob pa dang skye ba la sogs pa ni /
T07TD4091E:161a-4: nad dang mi 'phrod pa'i sman pa sogs pas dper bya'o //
T07TD4091E:161a-5: gal te de ltar na 'khor ba'i khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pa ni cung zad kyang lung du ma bstan pa'am dge bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T07TD4091E:161a-6: don dam par de skad du bshad kyi rnam par smin pa'i phyir lung dum bstan pa gang yin pa de ni lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya la /
T07TD4091E:161a-7: rnam par smin yid du 'ong ba la ni dge ba zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:161a-8: gal te don dam par lung dum bstan pa tsam la ni de'i phyir don rnam par /
T07TD4091E:161a-9: lung dum bstan bstan pa dag /'dus ma byas gnyis te /
T07TD4091E:161a-10: nam mkha' so sor ma brtags pa'i 'gog pa ni rnam grangs med par lung du ma bstan pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:161a-12: spang bar bya ba'i sems ni rnam par rig byed kyi kun nas slong bar byed pa ma yin no zhes gang bshad pa /
T07TD4091E:161a-13: 'o na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis log par lta ba las ni log par rtog pa dang /
T07TD4091E:161a-15: log pa'i las kyi mtha' la sogs pa 'byung ngo zhes gsungs she na /
T07TD4091E:161a-18: kun slong rnam gnyis rgyu dang ni //
T07TD4091E:161a-19: de yi dus kyi slong zhes bya //
T07TD4091E:161a-20: kun nas slong ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T07TD4091E:161a-21: rgyu'i kun nas slong ba dang /
T07TD4091E:161a-22: dus kyi kun nas slong ba'o //
T07TD4091E:161a-23: dus de nyid du de skye ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:161a-24: gnyis kyi dang po rab 'jug byed //
T07TD4091E:161a-25: gnyis pa rjes su 'jug byed yin //
T07TD4091E:161a-26: rgyu'i kun nas slong ba ni 'phen bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir rab tu 'jug par byed pa'o //
T07TD4091E:161a-27: de'i dus kyi kun nas slong ba ni bya ba'i dus su mthun par 'jug pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug par byed pa ste /
T07TD4091E:161a-29: mthong bas spang bya'i rnam shes ni //
T07TD4091E:161a-31: mthong ste sbang bar bya ba'i sems ni de kun nas slong bar byed pa rtog pa dang dpyod pa gnyis kyi gzhir gyur pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed kyi rjes su rab tu 'jug par byed pa ni yin gyi /
T07TD4091E:161a-32: kha phyir bltas pa'i bya ba'i dus na /
T07TD4091E:161a-33: de med pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug bar byed pa ni ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:161b-0: de'i phyir mdo las rgyu'i kun nas slong ba'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pas 'gal @161b ba med do //
T07TD4091E:161b-2: gnyi ga bsgoms pas spang bya yin //
T07TD4091E:161b-3: rab tu 'jug par byed pa dang //
T07TD4091E:161b-4: rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i rnam par shes pa ni gnyi ga yang bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:161b-5: lnga ni rjes su 'jug byed pa'o //
T07TD4091E:161b-6: rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs ni rjes su 'jug pa nyid do //
T07TD4091E:161b-7: de bas na 'di ni mu bzhir 'gyur te mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa nyid do //
T07TD4091E:161b-8: rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs ni rjes su 'jug par byed pa nyid do //
T07TD4091E:161b-9: yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba ni gnyi ga'o //

T07TD4091E:161b-11: yang ci rab tu 'jug par byed pa ji lta bur rjes su 'jug par byed pa yang de bzhin yin nam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:161b-13: rab 'jug byed dge la sogs la //
T07TD4091E:161b-15: rab tu 'jug par byed pa dge ba la rjes su 'jug par byed pa dge ba dang /
T07TD4091E:161b-16: mi dge ba dang lung dum bstan pa yang yod la /
T07TD4091E:161b-17: mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la yang de bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:161b-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa dang /
T07TD4091E:161b-20: rjes su 'jug par byed pa 'dra ste /

T07TD4091E:161b-23: rab tu 'jug par byed pa lung dum bstan pa de la yang rjes su 'jug par byed par byed pa dge ba yin gyi rab tu 'jug par byed pa dge ba la rjes su 'jug par byed pa lung du ma bstan par ni nam yang mi 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:161b-24: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ston pa ni nam yang zhum par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo //

T07TD4091E:161b-26: rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i yid bsgoms te spang bar bya bar bshad pa de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung dum bstan pa thams cad du rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:161b-27: rnam smin las skyes gnyi ga min //
T07TD4091E:161b-28: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i sems ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa'i phyir rab tu 'jug par byed pa yang ma yin la rjes su 'jug par byed pa yang ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:161b-29: zhar las 'ongs pa'i skabs bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:161b-31: rnam rig min rnam gsum zhes bya //

T07TD4091E:162a-14: dge slong gi sdom pa dang /
T07TD4091E:162a-15: dge slong ma'i sdom pa dang /
T07TD4091E:162a-16: dge sbyong ma'i sdom pa dang /

T07TD4091E:162a-22: ming du ni rnam pa de brgyad yin no //
T07TD4091E:162a-23: rdzas nyid du ni rnam pa bzhi //

T07TD4091E:162a-26: dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang /

T07TD4091E:162a-29: dge slong gi sdom pa las ni dge slong ma'i sdom pa gzhan ma yin la /
T07TD4091E:162a-30: dge sbyong gi sdom pa las ni /
T07TD4091E:162a-31: dge sbyong ma dang dge slob ma'i sdom pa gzhan ma yin la /
T07TD4091E:162a-32: dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa las ni dge ba snyen ma'i sdom pa gzhan ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:162a-34: mtshan las ming ni 'pho ba'i phyir//
T07TD4091E:162a-35: mtshan zhes bya ba ni rtags zhes bya ba ste /

T07TD4091E:162a-37: mtshan las ni dge slong la sogs pa'i ming 'pho bar 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:162a-40: dge slong ni dge slong ma zhes bya la /
T07TD4091E:162a-41: dge slong ma yang dge slong zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:162a-42: dge sbyong ni dge sbyong ma zhes bya la /
T07TD4091E:162a-43: dge sbyong ma dang dge slob ma yang dge sbyong zhes bya'o //

T07TD4091E:162a-45: dge bsnyen ma yang dge bsnyen zhes bya ste /
T07TD4091E:162a-46: mtshan yongs su 'gyur ba las sngon gyi sdom pa gtong ba'i rgyu yang yod pa ma yin la /
T07TD4091E:162b-0: sngon med @162b pa'i sdom pa thob pa yang ma yin pas /
T07TD4091E:162b-1: de bas na sdom pa mang po de dag kyang gsum po las rang bzhin tha mi dad do //
T07TD4091E:162b-2: gang dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa las dge sbyong gi sdom pa blangs la /
T07TD4091E:162b-3: de las yang dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par blangs na /
T07TD4091E:162b-4: ci spong ba'i 'phel ba dang 'brel pa'i phyir sdom pa de dag nyi shu rtsa lnga zhes bya ba dang /
T07TD4091E:162b-5: dong tse gcig dang dong tse gnyis zhes bya ba bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan zhes bya bar de dag thams cad skye'am /

T07TD4091E:162b-10: sdom pa gsum dag la srog gcod pa'i spangs pa gsum nas chang 'thung ba'i bar du mtshan nyid tha dad par skye ste /
T07TD4091E:162b-11: lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:162b-13: de dag gsum char yang lhan cig bar 'gyur gyi /
T07TD4091E:162b-14: sdom pa phyi ma yang dag par blangs pas snga ma gtong ba ni ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:162b-15: dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su btang bas dge bsnyen yang ma yin par 'gyur du 'ong ngo //

T07TD4091E:162b-17: lnga brgyad bcu dang thams cad kyi //
T07TD4091E:162b-18: spangs pa'i spong ba 'dzin pa las //

T07TD4091E:162b-20: dge sbyong dang ni dge slong rnams //
T07TD4091E:162b-21: grangs bzhin du mthun par rig par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:162b-23: ma byin par len pa dang /
T07TD4091E:162b-24: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
T07TD4091E:162b-26: 'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i chang bag med pa'i gnas lnga rnams spang ba'i spong ba yang dag par blangs pa'i ni dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:162b-28: ma byin par len pa dang /
T07TD4091E:162b-29: mi tshangs pa spyod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:162b-32: dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang /
T07TD4091E:162b-33: gar dang glu dang rol mo dang /

T07TD4091E:162b-37: gar dang glu dang rol mo dang /
T07TD4091E:162b-38: dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa 'dir gnyis su byas nas bcur 'gyur te /

T07TD4091E:163a-4: tshul khrims dang ni legs spyad dang //
T07TD4091E:163a-5: las dang sdom pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:163a-6: las mi mnyam pa rnams mnyam par 'jog pa'i phyir tshul khrims zhes bya la /

T07TD4091E:163a-8: tshigs su bcad pa las kyang /
T07TD4091E:163a-9: tshul khrims yang dag blangs pa bde //
T07TD4091E:163a-10: lus la yongs su gdung ba med //
T07TD4091E:163a-12: mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'i phyir legs par spyod pa'o //
T07TD4091E:163a-13: bya ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir las so //

T07TD4091E:163a-20: spangs zhes bya ba'i don to //

T07TD4091E:163b-16: mi lcogs pa med pa la bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang /

T07TD4091E:163b-29: dbang po'i sdom pa yang dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi rang bzhin yin pas /

T07TD4091E:164a-6: skad cig ma gcig phyin cad ni 'das pa dang yang mi ldan no //

T07TD4091E:164a-12: 'phags pa'i gang zag kyang zag pa med pa dang /

T07TD4091E:164a-14: lam ni sngar ma bskyed pa'i phyir skad cig ma dang po la ni 'das pa dang mi ldan no //
T07TD4091E:164a-15: mnyam gzhag 'phags lam gnas de gnyis //
T07TD4091E:164a-16: da ltar dang ldan bsam gtan dang //
T07TD4091E:164a-17: zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dang ldan pa gnyis ni rim pa bzhin du mnyam par gzhag pa dang /
T07TD4091E:164a-18: 'phags pa'i lam la zhugs pa ste /
T07TD4091E:164a-19: da ltar gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ldan pa la langs pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:164a-20: re zhig dang sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas pa rnams ni de ltar bshad do //
T07TD4091E:164a-21: yang da ni bar mar gnas pa la brjod par bya ste /

T07TD4091E:164a-24: / gang sdom pa yang ma yin sdom pa ma yin pa yang ma yin pa la gnas pa de ni bar mar gnas pa ste /

T07TD4091E:164a-26: gang la tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /
T07TD4091E:164a-27: tshul khrims kyi yan lag gis bsdus pa yod pa de ni dang po da ltar gyi rnams dang ldan no //
T07TD4091E:164a-28: da ltar gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa gnyis kyi bar ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:164a-29: phyin chad dus ni gnyis dang ngo //

T07TD4091E:164a-31: ma btang na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T07TD4091E:164b-0: ji sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas @164b pa la yang res 'ga' dge ba'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing sdom pa la gnas pa yang mi dge ba dang ldan par 'gyur ram zhen 'gyur ro //

T07TD4091E:165a-8: byed dang ma rig nyid dang ldan //
T07TD4091E:165a-9: sdom pa yang ma yin sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas pa zhig sems zhan pas dge ba'am mi dge ba zhig byed na /
T07TD4091E:165a-10: rnam par rig byed 'ba' zhig dang ldan gyi /
T07TD4091E:165a-11: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ni ma yin na /
T07TD4091E:165a-12: lung du ma bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T07TD4091E:165a-13: rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i las kyi lam ni ma gtogs so //
T07TD4091E:165a-14: rnam rig bor dang ma skyes pa'i //
T07TD4091E:165a-15: 'phags pa'i gang zag rnam rig min //
T07TD4091E:165a-16: 'phags pa'i gang zag gang zhig tshe gzhan du yongs su gyur nas da dung du rnam par rig byed ma byung ba'am rnam par rig byed rnam par nyams na /
T07TD4091E:165a-17: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa 'ba' zhig dang ldan gyi rnam par rig byed dang ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:165a-19: sdom pa ma yin pa dang /
T07TD4091E:165a-20: bar ma la gnas pa rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:165a-22: sdom pa ma yin pa dang ldan pa rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:165a-23: yang sdom pa de dag ji ltar 'thob ce na /
T07TD4091E:165a-24: bsam gtan las skyes bsam gtan gyi //
T07TD4091E:165a-26: gang gi tshe bsam gtan gyis ba'i sems zag pa dang bcas pa dngos gzhi pa'am /
T07TD4091E:165a-27: nyer bsdogs pa thob pa de'i tshe bsam gtan gyi sdom pa yang 'thob ste /
T07TD4091E:165a-28: lhan cig 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
T07TD4091E:165a-31: bsam gtan gyis de nyid kyi zag pa med pas 'thob pa na zag pa med pa'i sdom pa yang 'thob bo //
T07TD4091E:165a-32: de la zag pa med ba ni /
T07TD4091E:165a-33: bsam gtan gyis drug po bsam gtan bzhi ba dang /
T07TD4091E:165a-34: mi lcogs pa med pa dang /
T07TD4091E:165a-35: bsam gtan khyad par can dag na yod de /
T07TD4091E:165a-36: de ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:165a-38: gzhan gyi rnam rig byed sogs las //
T07TD4091E:165b-0: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni gal te 'di la gzhan gyi rnam par rig byed la 'di yang gzhan la rnam @165b par rig par byed na /
T07TD4091E:165b-1: gzhan gyi rnam par rig byed las 'thob ste /
T07TD4091E:165b-2: de yang dge 'dun nam gang zag las so //
T07TD4091E:165b-3: dge 'dun las ni dge slong dang /
T07TD4091E:165b-5: dge slob ma'i sdom pa rnams so //
T07TD4091E:165b-6: gzhan dag ni gang zag las so //
T07TD4091E:165b-7: rang 'byung la sogs pa las ni sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa yin no zhes rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir sogs pa'i sgra smos so //
T07TD4091E:165b-8: yang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa de de ltar yang dag par len pa na dus ji srid cig gi bar du yang dag par blang bar bya zhe na /
T07TD4091E:165b-9: ji srid 'tsho dang nyin zhag tu //
T07TD4091E:165b-10: sdom pa yang dag blangs pa yin //
T07TD4091E:165b-11: ris bdun gyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yang dag par blangs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:165b-12: bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa ni nyin zhag tu'o zhes bya bar nges so //
T07TD4091E:165b-13: da ni sdom pa ma yin pa'i dus ci zhig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:165b-14: sdom pa min la nyin zhag med //
T07TD4091E:165b-15: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sdig pa'i las khas blangs pa las sdom pa ma yin pa skye'i /
T07TD4091E:165b-16: ji ltar bsnyen gnas pa bzhin du nyin zhag ba ni med do //
T07TD4091E:165b-19: de lta bu len med ces grag / gang gi phyir bsnyen gnas pa ltar bdag ni nyin zhag gcig tu sdom pa la ma yin par gyur cig ces sdom pa ma yin pa yang dag par len par smon pa ni su yang med de /
T07TD4091E:165b-20: dman pa'i las yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:165b-21: yang bsnyen gnas nyin zhag tu len pa na ji ltar blang bar bya zhe na /
T07TD4091E:165b-22: dma' bar 'dug smras blangs pa yis //
T07TD4091E:165b-23: nang par gzhan las blangs pa ni //
T07TD4091E:165b-24: bsnyen gnas yan lag tshang ba dang //
T07TD4091E:165b-25: mi brgyan mtshan mo ma zad par //
T07TD4091E:165b-26: dma' bar 'dug pa'am tsog tsog po'am pus mo btsugs la thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas te /
T07TD4091E:165b-27: nad pa ni ma gtogs so //
T07TD4091E:165b-28: 'bogs pa pos tshig ma smras par sngar yang smra bar mi bya la kha bsdams te smra bar yang mi bya'o //
T07TD4091E:165b-29: nyin zhag gi sdom pa yin pa'i phyir nang par zhes bya ba ni re zhig nyi ma shar ba'i tshe'o //
T07TD4091E:165b-30: gzhan las nod par bya ba'i bdag nyid las ni ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:165b-31: gzhan la ltos pas ni rkyen yod kyang mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:165b-33: yan lag brgyad ril gyis nod par bya'i ma tshang ba ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:166a-2: mtshan mo zad kyi bar du ste /
T07TD4091E:166a-3: ji srid du nyi ma shar gyi bar du'o //
T07TD4091E:166a-4: de lta ma yin par mnos pa ni legs par spyod pa tsam du 'gyur gyi bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:166a-5: ci'i phyir yan lag brgyad nod ce na /
T07TD4091E:166a-7: tshul khrims yan lag bag yod ba'i //
T07TD4091E:166a-8: yan lag brtul zhugs yan lag ste //
T07TD4091E:166a-9: bzhi gcig de bzhin gsum rim bzhin //
T07TD4091E:166a-10: re zhig brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i bar du bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis kha na ma thob spong ba'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:166a-11: tshul khrims kyi yan lag yin no //
T07TD4091E:166a-12: chang 'thung ba spong ba gcig pu ni bag yod pa'i yan lag yin no ;
T07TD4091E:166a-13: / yan lag gsum ni bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba sbong ba'i phyir brtul zhugs kyi yan lag yin no //
T07TD4091E:166a-14: ci bag yod pa'i yan lag dang brtul zhugs kyi yan lag 'di dag ma ma nos na cir 'gyur zhe na /
T07TD4091E:166a-15: de yi dran nyams rgyags 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:166a-16: chang 'thungs pas ni bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa'i dran pa nyams pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:166a-19: gar dang glu la sogs pa bsten pa ni dregs par 'gyur la dregs pa gyur nas ni tshul khrims 'chal ba yang thag mi ring bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:166a-20: dus su za zhing zas nar ma'i dus yongs su spangs pa las ni smyung ba'i dran pa dang /
T07TD4091E:166a-21: yid byung ba nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:166a-22: de med na gnyi ga yang med do //
T07TD4091E:166a-23: yang ci bsnyen gnas 'di dge bsnyen 'ba' zhig gi yin nam /
T07TD4091E:166a-24: 'on te gzhan gyi yang yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:166a-25: gzhan la'ang bsnyen gnas yod mod kyi //
T07TD4091E:166a-26: skyabs su ma song bar min no //
T07TD4091E:166a-27: dge bsnyen ma yin pa yang nyin zhag de la sangs rgyas dang /
T07TD4091E:166a-29: dge 'dun la skyabs su song ste /
T07TD4091E:166a-30: bsnyen gnas nod na de la bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa skye bar 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:166a-31: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:166a-32: ci skyabs su 'gro ba 'ba' zhig gis dge bsnyen par 'gyur ram zhe na /
T07TD4091E:166a-33: rgya gar gyi yul pa rnams na re ni 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:166a-34: kha che rnams na re sdom pa med par ma yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:166a-35: gang yang mdo las 'di skad du ming chen gang gi phyir khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa /
T07TD4091E:166a-36: skyes pa skyes pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa zhig sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro /
T07TD4091E:166b-1: bdag la dge bsnyen par gzung du gsol zhes tshig tu yang smra na /
T07TD4091E:166b-2: de tsam gyis dge bsnyen par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4091E:166b-4: gang gi phyir 'di skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid las /
T07TD4091E:166b-5: dge bsnyen nyid du khas blangs pa las /
T07TD4091E:166b-7: dge bsnyen nyid du khas blangs pa 'ba' zhig gis 'di'i dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa yang skye bar 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:166b-8: gang gi tshe bdag la dge bsnyen phar gzung du gsol zhes khas len pa nyid na'o //
T07TD4091E:166b-9: de phyin chad srog gcod pa spong ngo zhes pa ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T07TD4091E:166b-10: bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:166b-11: sdom pa thob kyang brdas sprad par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa'i gzhi rnams /
T07TD4091E:166b-13: ji ltar dge slong dang dge sbyong sdom pa thob zin kyang /
T07TD4091E:166b-14: brdas sprad par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyi sdom pa ni 'di dang 'di'o zhes yang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams nod du gzhug pa ltar dge bsnyen pa yang de dang 'dra bas sdom pa med par dge bsnyen pa yod do zhes bya ba ni mi rung ngo //
T07TD4091E:166b-15: gal te thams cad bsdams na ni /
T07TD4091E:166b-16: sna gcig spyod la sogs ci ltar //
T07TD4091E:166b-17: gal te dge bsnyen thams cad dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la gnas pa yin na /
T07TD4091E:166b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis sna gcig spyod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:166b-21: yongs su rdzogs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen zhes gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4091E:166b-23: gang phyir de srung ba las gsungs //
T07TD4091E:166b-24: gang zhig bslab pa'i gzhi gang srung bar byed pa de ni /
T07TD4091E:166b-25: spyod pa zhes gsungs kyi thams cad kyang sdom pa la gnas par ni 'dra'o //
T07TD4091E:166b-27: chung la sogs nyid yin ji bzhin /
T07TD4091E:166b-28: chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po nyid ni yang dag par len pa'i sems kyi dbang las te /
T07TD4091E:166b-29: de ltar bshad na dgra bcom pa la yang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa chung du srid la /
T07TD4091E:166b-30: so so'i skye bo la yang chen po srid do //
T07TD4091E:166b-31: yang gang zhig sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro na /
T07TD4091E:166b-32: 'di'i skyabs su 'gro ba ci zhig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:166b-33: sangs rgyas dge 'dun byed pa'i chos //
T07TD4091E:167a-3: de yi skyabs ni gsum yin no //
T07TD4091E:167a-4: gang zhig sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba de ni sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos mi slob pa la skyabs su 'gro ba yin te /
T07TD4091E:167a-5: gtso bo gang dag gis de'i lus sangs rgyas zhes bya bar brjod pa'o //
T07TD4091E:167a-6: gzugs kyi sku ni snga ma dang phyi mar yang bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:167a-7: gang zhig dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bde ni dge 'dun byed pa'i chos slob ba dang mi slob pa la skyabs su 'gro ba yin te /
T07TD4091E:167a-8: gang dag thob pas gang zag brgyad po dbye bar mi nus pa'i phyir mi phyed par 'gyur ba'o //
T07TD4091E:167a-9: gang zhig chos la skyabs su 'gro bde ni so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa mya ngan las 'das pa la skyabs su 'gro ba yin te /
T07TD4091E:167a-10: bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:167a-11: sdug bsngal zhi ba'i mtshan nyid du gcig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:167a-12: yang ci'i phyir sdom pa gzhan dag tu ni mi tshangs par spyod pa spong ba bslab pa'i gzhir rnam par gzhas la /
T07TD4091E:167a-13: dge bsnyen la ni 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spong ba bslab pa'i gzhir rnam par gzhag ce na /
T07TD4091E:167a-14: log g-yem rab tu smad phyir dang //
T07TD4091E:167a-15: sla phyir mi bya rnyed pa'i phyir //
T07TD4091E:167a-16: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa ni gzhan dag gi chung ma sun phyung ba'i phyir ba dang ;
T07TD4091E:167a-17: / ngan song ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten na shin tu smad pa ltar /
T07TD4091E:167a-18: mi tshangs par spyod pa ni de lta ma yin pa'am /
T07TD4091E:167a-19: khyim na gnas pa dag gis 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spong ba srung bar sla'i mi tshangs par spyod pa ni srung bar dka' bas srung mi nus pa'am /
T07TD4091E:167a-20: 'phags pa tshe rabs gzhan dag tu yang bya ba ma yin pa mi spyod pa'i phyir mi bya ba'i sdom pa la 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spong ba thob pas na /
T07TD4091E:167a-21: dge bsnyen la yang mi tshangs par spyod pa spong ba zhes ma smos la /
T07TD4091E:167a-22: de spong ba 'ga' zhig bslab pa'i gzhir rnam par gzhag ste /
T07TD4091E:167a-23: slob pa ches gzhan du gyur na /
T07TD4091E:167a-24: dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa'i yan lag dag la sdom pa ma yin par 'gyur du 'ong ngo //
T07TD4091E:167a-25: bya ba ma yin pa ni mi bya bar ma nges pa'i sdom pa'o //
T07TD4091E:167a-26: gang zhig dge bsnyen par gyur nas chung ma len na de dag gis de dag la yang sdom pa thob bam ma thob ce na thob po //
T07TD4091E:167b-0: de lta ma yin na nyi tshe ba'i sdom pa thob par 'gyur du @167b 'ong ngo //
T07TD4091E:167b-1: ji ltar sdom pa zhig par mi 'gyur zhe na /
T07TD4091E:167b-3: ji ltar khas blangs bzhin sdom pa //
T07TD4091E:167b-4: rnyed de rgyu las ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:167b-5: ji ltar khas blangs pa de bzhin du de dag gi sdom pa rnyed de /
T07TD4091E:167b-6: de dag gis ji ltar khas blangs she na /
T07TD4091E:167b-7: bdag 'dod pas log pa g-yem pa spong ngo zhes khas blangs kyi /
T07TD4091E:167b-8: bdag gi rgyud 'di la mi tshangs par spyod pa mi bya'o zhes ni ma smras so //
T07TD4091E:167b-9: de'i phyir de dag gis de'i gzhi las /
T07TD4091E:167b-10: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i yan lag gi sdom pa 'ba' zhig thob kyi mi tshangs par spyod pa ni ma yin pas /
T07TD4091E:167b-11: chung mar gyur pa la sdom pa zhig pa med do //
T07TD4091E:167b-13: brdzun du smra ba spong ba 'ba' zhig dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la bslab pa'i gzhir byas la /
T07TD4091E:167b-14: phra ma spong ba la sogs pa ni ma yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:167b-15: rgyu gsum po de dag nyid kyi phyir te /
T07TD4091E:167b-16: brdzun du smra ba ni shin tu smad pa yin pa'i phyir ba dang /
T07TD4091E:167b-17: bsrung bar sla ba'i phyir ba dang /
T07TD4091E:167b-18: mi bya ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:167b-19: bslab pa thams cad las 'das pa las //
T07TD4091E:167b-20: brdzun yang zla la smra ba yi //
T07TD4091E:167b-21: bslab pa thams cad du 'das pa la dris pa dang /
T07TD4091E:167b-22: bdag gis de lta bu ma byas so zhes zhar la brdzun smra ba /
T07TD4091E:167b-23: 'di nyes par gnas pa la 'gyur bas /
T07TD4091E:167b-24: de'i phyir brdzun du smra ba spong ba zhes bya ste /
T07TD4091E:167b-27: yang ci'i phyir bcas pa'i kha na mtho ba 'di'i bslab pa'i gzhir ma bzhag ce na /
T07TD4091E:167b-29: bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba //
T07TD4091E:167b-31: ci'i phyir chang 'ba' zhig yin la gzhan gyi ma yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:167b-33: chang 'thung na yan lag gzhan dang gzhan dag mi srung bar 'gyur bas /
T07TD4091E:167b-34: de'i phyir de 'ba' zhig gis bslab pa'i gzhi rnam par gzhag gi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:167b-37: zag pa med pa'i sdom pa gang yin pa gsum po 'di dag /
T07TD4091E:167b-38: ji 'di dag las gcig 'thob pa de las lhag ma rnams kyang 'thob pa ma zhe na /
T07TD4091E:167b-42: 'dod gtogs thams cad gnyi ga dang //
