T07TD4091E:202b-23: de bzhin du 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyang lhag par 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems de dag gi dmigs pa ste /
T07TD4091E:202b-24: sems dgu dang sems bcu gcig gi dmigs pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:202b-25: khams gsum po'i chos rnam pa lnga lnga bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:202b-26: zag med khams gsum mtha' gsum dang /
T07TD4091E:202b-27: zag pa med pa'i spyod yul lo //
T07TD4091E:202b-28: zag pa med pa'i sems ni sems bcu'i dmigs pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:202b-29: khams gsum pa'i tha ma rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4091E:202b-32: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang zag pa med pa'o //
T07TD4091E:202b-33: yang don de dag nyid tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis su 'dug par 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:203a-2: goms pas spang bya dang zag med //
T07TD4091E:203a-3: rnam shes lnga dang brgyad dang ni //
T07TD4091E:203a-4: rnam shes bcu yi spyod yul te //
T07TD4091E:203a-5: 'gog dang lam mthong spang bya kun //
T07TD4091E:203a-6: lhag par rang gi spyod yul lo //
T07TD4091E:203a-8: de ltar na sems bcu drug po de dag gi dmigs par ni chos bcu drug rnam par gzhag par rig nas ji ltar na phra rgyas kyi dgos pa yin par sbyar bar bya ste /
T07TD4091E:203a-9: phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:203a-10: bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i dri ba 'ongs pa la dpyad par bya na bde ba'i dbang po ni rnam pa bdun te /
T07TD4091E:203a-11: 'dod pa na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang /
T07TD4091E:203a-12: gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T07TD4091E:203a-14: de dag kyang mdor bsdu na rnam par shes pa rnam pa bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi dmigs pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:203a-15: 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma gtogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa rnam pa bzhi dang /
T07TD4091E:203a-16: gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T07TD4091E:203a-17: gzugs med pa na spyod pa lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang /
T07TD4091E:203a-18: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang /
T07TD4091E:203a-20: rnam par shes pa rnam pa bcu gnyis po de dag ni bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:203a-21: de la ji ltar srid par 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ris ni bzhi'o //
T07TD4091E:203a-22: gzugs na spyod pa ni 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnams so //
T07TD4091E:203a-23: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni ris gnyis dang /
T07TD4091E:203a-24: phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba rnams kyang rgyas par 'gyur bar rig bar bya'o //
T07TD4091E:203a-25: bde ba'i dbang bo la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la phra rgyas du dag cig rgyas par 'gyur /
T07TD4091E:203a-26: bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnam pa bcu gnyis po de dag kyang rnam par shes pa gang gi dmigs pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:203a-27: rnam pa bcu gnyis po de dag nyid kyi yin la /
T07TD4091E:203a-28: lhag par gzugs med pa na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang /
T07TD4091E:203a-29: kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnam pa gnyis te /
T07TD4091E:203a-30: rnam pa bcu bzhi po 'di dag ni bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:203a-31: de la gzugs med pa na spyad pa la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag gis klags na 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:203b-0: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ris @203b bzhi bzhi dang /
T07TD4091E:203b-1: gzugs na spyod pa 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnams rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:203b-2: lam 'dis gzhan dag la yang rtogs par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:203b-3: phra rgyas gang dag gi sems phra rgyas dang bcas ba phra rgyas de dag gis sems de la rgyas par 'gyur ram zhe na /
T07TD4091E:203b-4: rgyas par 'gyur ba yang yod de /
T07TD4091E:203b-5: phra rgyas gang dag dang sems de dag tu mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma spangs la /
T07TD4091E:203b-6: de la dmigs pa rnams kyang ma spangs pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:203b-7: rgyas par mi 'gyur ba yang yod de phra rgyas gang dag dang sems dag dang mtshungs bar ldan pa rnams spangs ba'o //
T07TD4091E:203b-8: de bas na de ltar bshad na 'di ltar /
T07TD4091E:203b-9: nyon mongs phra rgyas bcas rnam gnyis //
T07TD4091E:203b-10: nyon mongs can min rgyas 'gyur gyis //
T07TD4091E:203b-11: phra rgyas dang bcas pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:203b-12: nyon mongs pa can gyi sems ni de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phra rgyas su gyur pa dang /
T07TD4091E:203b-13: de dmigs pa'i phra rgyas ma spangs pa rnams kyi phra rgyas dang bcas pa dang /
T07TD4091E:203b-14: de dang mtshungs par ldan pa rgyas par mi 'gyur ba rnams kyis kyang phra rgyas dang bcas pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:203b-15: de dang lhan cig pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:203b-16: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems ni de la dmigs pa phra rgyas su 'gyur ba ma spangs pa nyid dag gis phra rgyas dang bcas pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:203b-17: yang phra rgyas bcu po dag ji ltar 'jug ce na /
T07TD4091E:203b-18: re zhig dang po nyid du ma rig pa dang ldan pas bden pa rnams la kun du rmongs la /
T07TD4091E:203b-19: des sdug bsngal mi 'dod cing lam gyi bar du mi 'dod do //
T07TD4091E:203b-20: de nas rmongs pa la the tshom //
T07TD4091E:203b-21: rmongs pas phyogs gnyis thos nas /
T07TD4091E:203b-22: 'di sdug bsngal yin na ma 'di sdug bsngal ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa the tshom skye'o //
T07TD4091E:203b-24: the tshom las log pa'i lta ba 'jug ste /
T07TD4091E:203b-25: the tshom skyes pa log par mnyan pa dang /
T07TD4091E:203b-26: log par bsams pa las sdug bsngal med de zhes bya ba la sogs pa log par nges bar skye'o //
T07TD4091E:203b-28: log par lta ba las 'jig tshogs la lta ba 'jug ste /
T07TD4091E:203b-29: sdug bsngal ba nyid las phung po gsal te bdag tu mngon par zhe na to //
T07TD4091E:203b-31: 'jig tshogs la lta ba las mthar 'dzin bar lta ba 'jug ste /
T07TD4091E:203b-32: bdag rtag pa dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:204a-1: pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis dag par yid ches pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:204a-2: de nas lta ba mchog tu 'dzin //
T07TD4091E:204a-3: ces bya bar sbyar te tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin ba las lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa 'jug ste /
T07TD4091E:204a-4: gang gis dag bar yid ches pa de la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:204a-5: rang gi lta ba chags nga rgyal //
T07TD4091E:204a-6: de la chags pa'i sgo nas des khengs bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:204a-8: lta ba la lhag par zhen pa de'i dgra bor gyur pa gzhan gyi lta ba dag la zhe sdang ba 'jug go //
T07TD4091E:204a-10: phra rgyas bcu po de dag gi 'jug pa'i rim pa ni de lta'o //
T07TD4091E:204a-11: nyon mongs pa skyed pa ni rgyu gsum gyis skye ste /
T07TD4091E:204a-12: phra rgyas spangs pa ma yin ba dang //
T07TD4091E:204a-13: yul dang nye bar gnas pa dang //
T07TD4091E:204a-14: tshul bzhin ma yin byed pa las //
T07TD4091E:204a-15: nyon mongs rgyu ni tshang ba yin //
T07TD4091E:204a-17: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis phra rgyas ma spangs shing yongs su ma shes pa yin la /
T07TD4091E:204a-18: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa dang mthun pa'i chos kyang snang bar 'gyur ba yin zhing /
T07TD4091E:204a-19: de la yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed na de ltar na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skye ste /
T07TD4091E:204a-20: de dag ni rim pa bzhin du rgyu dang yul sbyor ba'i stobs dag yin no //
T07TD4091E:204a-21: nyon mongs pa gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du skye bar rig par bya ste gang zhig / rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin /
T07TD4091E:204a-22: res 'ga' yul gyi stobs 'ba' zhig gis skyes ba yang yod de /
T07TD4091E:204a-24: dgra bcom pa yongs su nyams pa'i chos can lta bu'o //
T07TD4091E:204a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis phra rgyas de dag nyid zag pa gsum du gsungs te /
T07TD4091E:204a-27: 'dod pa'i zag pa dang srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig ba'i zag ba'o //
T07TD4091E:204a-28: chu bo bzhi ste 'dod pa'i chu bo la sogs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:204a-29: sbyor ba bzhi ste de dag nyid do //
T07TD4091E:204a-30: nye bar len pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:204a-31: 'dod pa'i nye bar len ba la sogs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:204a-32: de la re zhig / gti mug ma gtogs 'dod pa yis //
T07TD4091E:204a-33: nyon mongs kun nas dkris bcas rnams //
T07TD4091E:204a-34: 'dod zag / ma rig pa ma gtogs pa gzhan 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pa dang bcas pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i zag pa yin par rig par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:204a-35: ma rig pa rnam pa lnga bor nas phra rgyas sum cu rtsa gcig dang kun nas dkris ba bcu ste /
T07TD4091E:204b-0: rdzas bzhi bcu rtsa @204b gcig go //
T07TD4091E:204b-2: phra rgyas 'ba' zhig srid pa'i zag / gti mug ma gtogs pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4091E:204b-3: ma rig pa ma gtogs pa gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i phra rgyas rnams ni srid pa'i zag pa ma rig pa'i phra rgyas gzugs dang ldan pa lnga dang /
T07TD4091E:204b-4: gzugs med pa dang ldan pa lnga bor nas /
T07TD4091E:204b-5: gzugs na spyod pa nyi shu rtsa drug / gzugs med pa na spyod pa nyi shu rtsa drug ste /
T07TD4091E:204b-6: rdzas lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so //
T07TD4091E:204b-7: ci'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod ba'i phra rgyas rnams bsdus nas gcig tu srid pa'i zag par bshad ce na /
T07TD4091E:204b-8: de lung ma bstan kha nang bltas //
T07TD4091E:204b-9: mnyam gzhags sa pa'i phyir gcig byas //
T07TD4091E:204b-10: de gnyis ka gcig tu byas pa ni lung du ma bstan pa dang /
T07TD4091E:204b-11: kha nang du bltas pa dang /
T07TD4091E:204b-12: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa yin pas chos mthun pa rnam pa gsum gyis gcig du byas so //
T07TD4091E:204b-13: da ni ma rig pa ni khams gsum pa'i ma rig pa zag pa'o zhes bya bar grub ste /
T07TD4091E:204b-15: ci'i phyir 'di logs shig tu rnam par gzhag ce na /
T07TD4091E:204b-17: rtsa ba ma rig yin bas na //
T07TD4091E:204b-18: logs shig dag tu zag par bstan //
T07TD4091E:204b-19: zag pa de dag ji skad du bshad pa /
T07TD4091E:204b-20: de bzhin chu bo sbyor lta rnams /
T07TD4091E:204b-21: gsal phyir logs shig dag tu bstan //
T07TD4091E:204b-22: lta ba las gzhan pa 'dod pa'i zag pa nyid ni 'dod ba'i chu bo dang srid ba'i sbyor ba yin la de bzhin du srid pa'i zag pa yang srid ba'i chu bo dang /
T07TD4091E:204b-23: srid pa'i sbyor ba yin te /
T07TD4091E:204b-24: de ni gsal ba'i phyir chu bo dag las logs shig tu gzhag go //
T07TD4091E:204b-28: grogs med 'jog pa'i rjes mi mthun //
T07TD4091E:204b-29: 'jog par byed pa na zag pa med pas so zhes 'di'i nges pa'i tshig ni 'og nas 'chad na /
T07TD4091E:204b-30: lta ba rnams ni gsal ba'i phyir 'jog pa dang mthun pa yin bas /
T07TD4091E:204b-31: de'i phyir zag pa dag gi nang du logs shig tu ni ma bstan gyi bsres te ni bstan to //
T07TD4091E:204b-32: chu bo dang sbyor ba bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:204b-33: ji skad du bshad pa nyid ma rig ba dang bcas pa dang /
T07TD4091E:204b-34: lta ba rnam pa gnyis su phye ba ni /
T07TD4091E:204b-36: lta ba ma gtogs pa 'dod pa'i sbyor ba ma rig ba dang bcas pa ni 'dod pa'i nye bar len pa'o //
T07TD4091E:205a-0: lta ba ma gtogs pa srid pa'i sbyor ba ma rig pa dang @205a * //
T07TD4091E:205a-1: bcas pa ni bdag tu smra ba'i nye bar len pa'o //
T07TD4091E:205a-2: lta ba'i sbyor ba las tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs phyung ste lta ba'i nye bar len ba dang /
T07TD4091E:205a-3: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin ba ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi nye bar len pa'o //
T07TD4091E:205a-4: ci'i phyir ma rig ba nye bar len pa dag gi nang du ni bsres te bshad kyi tha dad du ma bstan ce na /
T07TD4091E:205a-5: srid pa 'dzin pa'i phyir nye bar len pa yin na /
T07TD4091E:205a-6: ma rig pa 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir bsres so //
T07TD4091E:205a-7: mi mngon pa'i mtshan nyid dang mi gsal ba'i phyir ma rig pa ni 'dzin pa ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:205a-9: phra rgyas nyid dang zag pa dang sbyor ba dang nye bar len pa'i ming du bshad pa /
T07TD4091E:205a-10: yang phra rgyas kyi don ni ci yin /
T07TD4091E:205a-11: nye bar len pa'i bar gyi don ni ci yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:205a-12: gang phyir de dag phra ba dang //
T07TD4091E:205a-14: rjes su 'brel ba de yi phyir //
T07TD4091E:205a-15: phra rgyas dag tu bshad pa yin //
T07TD4091E:205a-16: rgyu phra ba dang rtogs bar dka' ba'i phyir phra ba'o //
T07TD4091E:205a-17: thob pa'i rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang ba'o //
T07TD4091E:205a-18: dmigs pa dang sbyor ba dang rgyu rnam gnyis kyi sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:205a-19: yang dang yang du bzlog kyang sbyor ba med bzhin du yang dang yang du mngon du gyur pa'i phyir rjes su 'brel ba ste /
T07TD4091E:205a-20: rgyu de dag gi phra rgyas zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:205a-21: de dag 'jog dang zag pa dang //
T07TD4091E:205a-23: / nye bar 'dzin pas de ltar na //
T07TD4091E:205a-24: de dag zag sogs nges tshig go //
T07TD4091E:205a-26: srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i bar du skye mched drug gi rmad gnas 'dzag pas na zag pa rnams so //
T07TD4091E:205a-28: 'byar bar byed pas na sbyor ba'o //
T07TD4091E:205a-29: nye bar 'dzin pas na nye bar len pa ste /
T07TD4091E:205a-30: de ltar ni de dag ni zag pa la sogs ba nges pa'i tshig ste /
T07TD4091E:205a-31: tshig nges pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T07TD4091E:205a-32: kun nas sbyor sogs dbye ba yis //
T07TD4091E:205a-33: rnam pa dag ni yang lngar bshad //
T07TD4091E:205a-34: phra rgyas de dag nyid kun du sbyor ba dang /
T07TD4091E:205a-35: 'ching ba dang phra rgyas dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:205a-36: kun nas dkris pa'i dbye bas yang rnam pa lngar phye nas bshad de /
T07TD4091E:205a-37: de la kun du sbyor ba ni rnam pa dgu ste /
T07TD4091E:205b-0: @205b ser sna'i kun du sbyor ba rnams so //
T07TD4091E:205b-1: de la rjes su chags pa'i kun du sbyor ba ni khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags so //
T07TD4091E:205b-2: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ji ltar srid par sbyar bar bya'o //
T07TD4091E:205b-3: lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba ni lta ba gsum mo //
T07TD4091E:205b-4: mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun du sbyor ba ni lta ba gnyis so //
T07TD4091E:205b-5: ci'i phyir kun du sbyor ba dag gi nang du lta ba gsum ni /
T07TD4091E:205b-6: logs shig tu lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba bshad la /
T07TD4091E:205b-7: gnyis ni logs shig tu mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba bshad ce na /
T07TD4091E:205b-8: rdzas dang mchog 'dzin mnyam pa'i phyir //
T07TD4091E:205b-9: lta gnyis kun du sbyor gzhan no //
T07TD4091E:205b-10: lta ba gsum yang rdzas bco brgyad yin la //
T07TD4091E:205b-11: lta ba gnyis kyang rdzas bco brgyad nyid yin pas de'i phyir 'di gnyis rdzas mnyam pas kun du sbyor ba gzhan du byas la /
T07TD4091E:205b-12: 'di gnyis ni mchog tu 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
T07TD4091E:205b-13: lhag ma ni ma yin pas mchog tu 'dzin pa mnyam pa'i phyir yang 'di gnyis logs shig tu bshad de /
T07TD4091E:205b-14: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:205b-15: yang ci'i phyir phrag dog dang /
T07TD4091E:205b-16: ser sna gnyis kun du sbyor ba dag tu ni logs shig tu kun du sbyor bar bshad la /
T07TD4091E:205b-17: kun nas dkris pa gzhan dag tu ni ma yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:205b-18: gang phyir gnyi ga gcig tu ni //
T07TD4091E:205b-19: mi dge ba dang rang dbang phyir //
T07TD4091E:205b-20: phrag dog ser sna de dag tu //
T07TD4091E:205b-21: kun nas logs shig gnyis su bshad //
T07TD4091E:205b-22: gang la gcig tu mi dge dang //
T07TD4091E:205b-23: rang dbang 'di gnyis yod pa de lta bu'i rigs can gyis kun nas dkris pa gzhan ni med do //
T07TD4091E:205b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan dag las kun du sbyor ba tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa lngar gsungs te /
T07TD4091E:205b-25: 'di lta ste 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /
T07TD4091E:205b-26: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /
T07TD4091E:205b-30: ci'i phyir 'di tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa zhes bya zhe na /
T07TD4091E:205b-31: tha ma'i cha dang ldan ba'i phyir te /
T07TD4091E:205b-32: tha ma'i cha ni 'dod pa'i khams so //
T07TD4091E:205b-33: 'di dag ni de'i rjes su mthun pa rnams te 'di ltar /
T07TD4091E:205b-35: gsum gyis kun du 'dren par byed //
T07TD4091E:205b-37: gnod sems dag gi ni 'dod pa'i khams las mi 'da'o //
T07TD4091E:205b-38: 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs ba dag gi ni 'das kyang phyir kun du 'dren par byed de /
T07TD4091E:206a-0: @206a * // sgo ba dang 'khor dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:206a-1: gang gi tshe rgyun du zhugs pas kun du sbyor ba gsum gtan nas spangs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa drug spangs pa yin na /
T07TD4091E:206a-2: ci'i phyir lta ba gsum bor nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /
T07TD4091E:206a-3: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom dang gsum nyid du bshad ce na /
T07TD4091E:206a-4: de dag thams cad kyang brjod par bya ba ni yin mod kyi 'on kyang /
T07TD4091E:206a-5: gtso dang rtsa ba bsdus phyir gsum du bshad de /
T07TD4091E:206a-6: mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4091E:206a-10: de dag gi gtso bo ni 'di gsum gyis bsdus so //
T07TD4091E:206a-11: gzhan yang mthar 'dzin par lta ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta bas rab tu bcug go //
T07TD4091E:206a-12: lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pas rab tu bcug go //
T07TD4091E:206a-13: log par lta ba ni the tshom gyis rab tu bcug ste /
T07TD4091E:206a-14: de'i phyir rtsa ba bsdus pa'i phyir yang gsum du bshad do //
T07TD4091E:206a-17: lam la the tshom de ltar na //
T07TD4091E:206a-18: de dag thar bar 'gro ba la //
T07TD4091E:206a-19: bar chad byed phyir gsum du bshad //
T07TD4091E:206a-20: yul gzhan du 'gro ba la bar chad byed pa ni gsum yin te /
T07TD4091E:206a-22: lam gzhan la yang dag par brten pa'i phyir lam nor ba dang /
T07TD4091E:206a-23: lam la the tshom skye ba'o //
T07TD4091E:206a-24: de bzhin du thar par 'gro ba la yang gsum po 'di dag nyid bar chad byed de /
T07TD4091E:206a-25: de la 'jig tshogs la lta bas ni thar pa la skrag bar gyur nas 'gro mi 'dod pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:206a-26: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pas ni lam gzhan la yang dag par brten pa'i phyir lam nor bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:206a-27: the tshom gyis ni lam la the tshom za ste /
T07TD4091E:206a-28: rgyun du zhugs pas thar bar 'gro ba la bar chad byed pa de dag spangs par ston pa na /
T07TD4091E:206a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa gsum 'ba' zhig spangs so zhes bka' stsal pa yin no zhes lta'o //
T07TD4091E:206a-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lngar bshad pa de bzhin du /
T07TD4091E:206a-31: gong ma'i cha mthun rnam lnga nyid //
T07TD4091E:206a-34: gzugs dang gzugs med las skyes pa //
T07TD4091E:206b-0: 'dod chags gnyis rgod nga rgyal @206b rmongs //
T07TD4091E:206b-1: 'di dag ni gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga yin te /
T07TD4091E:206b-8: de dag ma spangs na khams gong ma las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:206b-9: kun tu sbyor ba'i skabs rdzogs so /
T07TD4091E:206b-17: ci'i phyir gsum po 'di dag 'ching bar bshad ce na /
T07TD4091E:206b-18: tshor ba'i dbang gis 'ching ba gsum ste /
T07TD4091E:206b-19: bde ba'i tshor ba la ni dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas /
T07TD4091E:206b-21: sdug bsngal la ni zhe sdang ngo //
T07TD4091E:206b-23: sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa la ni gti mug ste /
T07TD4091E:206b-24: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang ni de lta ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:206b-25: phra rgyas rnams ni sngar bshad pa nyid do //
T07TD4091E:206b-26: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:206b-27: de la re zhig gang dag nyon mongs pa yin pa de dag ni sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa'i phyir nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang yin la /
T07TD4091E:206b-28: nyon mongs las gzhan sems 'byung gang //
T07TD4091E:206b-29: nyon mongs 'du byed phung zhes pa //
T07TD4091E:206b-30: de dag nye ba'i nyon mongs te //
T07TD4091E:206b-31: de dag nyon mongs ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:206b-32: gang dag nyon mongs pa las gzhan pa nyon mongs pa can gyi chos sems las byung ba 'du byed kyi phung pos yang dag par bsdus pa de dag ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyid yin gyi nyon mongs pa ni ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:206b-33: de dag kyang gzhi phran tshegs las 'byung ba gang yin pa dag go //
T07TD4091E:206b-34: 'dir ni nyon mongs pa'i dri mas kun nas dkris pas yang dag par bsdus pa 'ba' zhig bstan par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:206b-35: kun nas dkris pa rnams kyang gang dag cig ce na /
T07TD4091E:206b-37: kun nas dkris pa rnam brgyad de /
T07TD4091E:206b-38: ngo tsha med dang khrel med dang //
T07TD4091E:206b-39: phrag dog ser sna rgod pa dang //
T07TD4091E:206b-40: 'gyod pa dang ni rmugs dang gnyid //
T07TD4091E:206b-41: 'di ni re zhig rab tu byed pa'i tshul yin no //
T07TD4091E:206b-42: bye brag tu smra ba'i lugs kyi ni bcu ste /
T07TD4091E:206b-45: de la ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa ni bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:206b-46: phrag dog ni gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pas sems khong nas 'khrugs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:206b-47: ser sna ni chos dang zang zing dang /
T07TD4091E:207a-1: pa rab tu sbyin pa dang 'gal bar gnas pa sems kyis kun du 'dzin pa'o //
T07TD4091E:207a-2: rgod pa ni sems rnam par ma zhi ba'o //
T07TD4091E:207a-3: 'gyod pa dang rmugs pa ni bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:207a-4: gnyid ni sems mngon par sdud pa ste /
T07TD4091E:207a-5: lus yang dag par 'dzin mi nus pa'o //
T07TD4091E:207a-6: de dang 'gyod pa ni nyon mongs pa can 'ba' zhig kun nas dkris pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:207a-7: khro ba ni gnod sems dang /
T07TD4091E:207a-8: rnam par 'tshe ba ma gtogs pa sems can dang /
T07TD4091E:207a-9: sems can ma yin pa la kun du gnod pa'o //
T07TD4091E:207a-10: 'chab pa ni kha na ma tho ba mkhyud pa'o //
T07TD4091E:207a-11: kun nas dkris pa de rnams las //
T07TD4091E:207a-13: ngo tsha med rgod ser sna bslang //
T07TD4091E:207a-14: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gsum po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rgyu mthun pa'o //
T07TD4091E:207a-16: kha cig na re srid pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:207a-17: la lan re ma rig pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:207a-18: gzhan dag na re gnyi ga'i yang yin no zhes zer te /
T07TD4091E:207a-19: rim bzhin du shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:207a-20: shes pa ma yin pa rnams kyi yin no //
T07TD4091E:207a-21: ma rig las rmugs gnyid khrel med //
T07TD4091E:207a-22: gsum po de dag ni ma rig pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o //
T07TD4091E:207a-24: 'gyod pa khro dang phrag dog ni //
T07TD4091E:207a-25: khong khro ba yi rgyu las byung //
T07TD4091E:207a-26: khong khro ba'i kun nas bslang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T07TD4091E:207a-27: de ltar na nye ba'i nyon mongs ba bcu po de dag ni nyon mongs pa dang rgyu mthun pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:207a-28: gzhan yang nyon mongs dri ma drug /'di lta ste /
T07TD4091E:207a-29: sgyu dang g-yo dang rgyags pa dang //
T07TD4091E:207a-32: de la rgyu ni gzhan la 'drid pa'o //
T07TD4091E:207a-33: g-yo ni sems gya gyu ba ste /
T07TD4091E:207a-34: gang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi 'chags kyi gtam rlung la bskur ba'am mi gsal bar smras pa'o //
T07TD4091E:207a-35: rgyags pa ni sngar bstan zin to //
T07TD4091E:207a-36: 'tshig pa ni khan ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i dngos po dam du 'dzin pa ste /
T07TD4091E:207a-37: gang gis gzhan gyi rjes su bsgo ba mi nyan pa'o //
T07TD4091E:207a-38: khon du 'dzin pa ni kun du gnod pa'i dngos po lan mang du byed pa'o //
T07TD4091E:207a-39: rnam par 'tshe ba ni rnam par tho 'tshams ba ste /
T07TD4091E:207a-40: gang gis mtshon cha dang tshig rtsub po dag gis gzhan dag la tho 'tshams par byed pa'o //
T07TD4091E:207a-41: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma drug po de dag kyang /
T07TD4091E:207b-0: sgyu @207b rgyags khon du 'dzin pa dang //
T07TD4091E:207b-1: rnam 'tshe khong khro las skyes so //
T07TD4091E:207b-3: g-yo ni lta bas kun nas bslang //
T07TD4091E:207b-4: gya gyu ci zhig sdig to'i lta //
T07TD4091E:207b-5: zhes tshigs su bcad pa las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:207b-6: de dag ci zhig gis spang bar bya ba yin zhe na //
T07TD4091E:207b-7: re zhig kun nas bkris pa bcur bshad pa rnams las /
T07TD4091E:207b-8: de la ngo tsha med pa dang //
T07TD4091E:207b-9: khrel med rmugs gnyid rgod rnam gnyis //
T07TD4091E:207b-10: chos lnga po 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gnyi ga dang ldan pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang /
T07TD4091E:207b-11: rnam pa gnyi ga yin te /
T07TD4091E:207b-12: gang zhig gang mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa de ni de mthong pas spang bar bya ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:207b-13: de las gzhan ni bsgom spang bya //
T07TD4091E:207b-14: de dag las gzhan pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pas bsdus pa phrag dog dang ser sna dang 'gyod pa dang khro ba dang 'chab pa dang /
T07TD4091E:207b-15: nye ba'i nyon mongs ba lnga po de dag ni ma rig ba tsam dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya ba nyid dang /
T07TD4091E:207b-17: ji ltar phrag dog la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa lnga po de dag bsgom pas spang par bya ba dang rang dbang can yang yin pa dang /
T07TD4091E:207b-19: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma drug kyang de bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:207b-20: yang ji skad du bshad pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag ni /
T07TD4091E:207b-22: 'dod pa'i khams dag tu ni mi dge ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:207b-25: rmugs pa dang rgod pa dang gnyid rnams ni mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:207b-27: mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:207b-28: de yi yan chad lung ma bstan //
T07TD4091E:207b-29: 'dod pa'i khams yan chad na ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni ji ltar srid par lung du ma bstan pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:207b-30: yang de dag lus du zhig gang la yod par rig par bya zhe na /
T07TD4091E:207b-31: 'dod dang bsam gtan dang po na //
T07TD4091E:207b-33: 'di gnyis ni 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po dag na yod do //
T07TD4091E:207b-34: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na sgyu ji ltar yod ce na /
T07TD4091E:207b-36: tshangs pa de ni de na bdag nyid log par kun du ston pas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slu bar byed do //
T07TD4091E:208a-2: rmugs rgod rgyags pa khams gsum pa //
T07TD4091E:208a-3: gsum po de dag ni khams gsum pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:208a-4: gzhan dag 'dod khams las skyes pa //
T07TD4091E:208a-5: bcu drug las lnga bor te nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bcu gcig gis 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:208a-6: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:208a-7: yang de rnams las yid kyi sa pa ni du zhig yin /
T07TD4091E:208a-8: rnam par shes pa drug gi sa pa ni du zhig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:208a-10: mthong spang bya gnyid nga rgyal bcas //
T07TD4091E:208a-11: yid rnam shes kyi sa pa yin //
T07TD4091E:208a-12: mthong bas spang bar bya ba thams cad ni yid kyi sa pa yin la /
T07TD4091E:208a-13: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba la yang gnyid dang nga rgyal dang bcas pa de dag thams cad ni /
T07TD4091E:208a-14: yid kyi sa pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:208a-15: nye ba'i nyon mongs rang dbang yang //
T07TD4091E:208a-16: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rang dbang can gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bsgom pas spang par bya ba yang yin mod kyi yid kyi sa pa nyid du blta bar bya'o //
T07TD4091E:208a-17: gzhan ni rnam shes drug rten no //
T07TD4091E:208a-18: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan rnams ni rnam par shes pa drug gi sa pa yin par rig par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:208a-19: gzhan yang gang dag cig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:208a-20: bsgom pas spang par bya ba'i 'dod chags dang /
T07TD4091E:208a-22: ma rig pa dang de dag mtshungs par ldan pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:208a-27: nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa'i nang du bshad pa gang yin pa dag go //
T07TD4091E:208a-28: bde ba la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po gang yin pa de rnams las dbang po du zhig dang /
T07TD4091E:208a-29: nyon mongs pa'am nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan zhig tu mtshungs par ldan zhe na /
T07TD4091E:208a-30: bde ba dag dang 'dod chags su //
T07TD4091E:208a-32: 'dod chags ni bde ba dang yid bde bar mtshungs par ldan no //
T07TD4091E:208a-34: sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07TD4091E:208a-35: gti mug dag ni thams cad dang //
T07TD4091E:208a-36: ma rig pa dang ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir dbang po lnga char yang mtshungs par ldan no //
T07TD4091E:208a-37: med lta yid bde sdug bsngal dang //
T07TD4091E:208a-38: log par lta ba ni yid kyi bde ba dang /
T07TD4091E:208b-0: yid kyi @208b sdug bsngal yid mi bde ba dang /
T07TD4091E:208b-1: 'di gnyis dang mtshungs par ldan te /
T07TD4091E:208b-2: ci rigs par dge ba'i las rnams dang sdig pa'i las rnams kyi yin no //
T07TD4091E:208b-3: yid mi bde dang the tshom ste //
T07TD4091E:208b-4: the tshom zos pa nges pa'i don du gnyer pa na yid mi bde bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:208b-6: phra rgyas gzhan dag ni yid bde ba nyid dang mtshungs par ldan no //
T07TD4091E:208b-7: gzhan yang gang dag cig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:208b-8: lta ba bzhi dang nga rgyal te //
T07TD4091E:208b-9: dga' ba'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:208b-10: phra rgyas mtshungs par ldan pa bshad pa de dag kyang gang zhig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:208b-13: re zhig de ltar mtshungs par ldan pa so sor nges par bshad nas spyi'i smras pa /
T07TD4091E:208b-15: phra rgyas 'di dag thams cad kyang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan te /
T07TD4091E:208b-16: nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rgyun 'chad pa'i dus na gdon mi za bar btang snyoms kyi dbang po kun du gnas so //
T07TD4091E:208b-17: yang gong ma pa rnams dang ji ltar mtshungs par ldan zhe na /
T07TD4091E:208b-20: gong ma'i sa pa ji bzhin /
T07TD4091E:208b-21: sa gong ma pa'i phra rgyas rnams ni sa gang dag na dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa rang rang gi dbang po rnams dang mtshungs par ldan te /
T07TD4091E:208b-22: de dag tu ci rigs par rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhi pa rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhi pa rnams dang mtshungs par ldan no //
T07TD4091E:208b-23: yid kyi sa pa ni yid kyi sa pa rnams dang mtshungs par ldan no //
T07TD4091E:208b-24: nyon mongs pa rnams dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:208b-25: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni /
T07TD4091E:208b-26: yid mi bde dang 'gyod pa dang //
T07TD4091E:208b-27: phrag dog khro dang rnam 'tshe dang //
T07TD4091E:208b-29: mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4091E:208b-30: skyo ba'i rnam par gnas pa dang /
T07TD4091E:208b-31: de dag ni yid kyi sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:208b-32: ser sna dag ni bzlog pa'o //
T07TD4091E:208b-33: yid bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T07TD4091E:208b-34: chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i dga' ba'i rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:208b-35: g-yo dang sgyu dang rgyags 'chab gnyid //
T07TD4091E:208b-37: yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba gnyi ga dang mtshungs par ldan te /
T07TD4091E:208b-38: res 'ga' ni yid bde bas gzhan la slu bar byed do //
T07TD4091E:208b-39: res 'ga' ni yid mi bde bas slu bar byed de /
T07TD4091E:209a-0: @209a * // gnyid kyi bar du yang de bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:209a-3: bsam gtan gsum pa na ni bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan no //
T07TD4091E:209a-4: man chad ni yid bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan no //
T07TD4091E:209a-5: yan chad ni btang snyoms dang mtshungs par ldan te /
T07TD4091E:209a-8: / thams cad btang snyoms dang mtshungs par ldan te /
T07TD4091E:209a-9: de ni ma rig pa bzhin du gang du'ang dgag par byed do //
T07TD4091E:209a-10: bzhi po gzhan ni lnga dag dang //
T07TD4091E:209a-15: kun nas dkris pa bzhi po de dag ni mi dge ba'i sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir ba dang /
T07TD4091E:209a-16: nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir dbang po lnga char dang yang mtshungs par ldan no //
T07TD4091E:209a-19: rmugs pa dang gnyid dang rgod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:209a-21: the tshom dang sgrib ba lnga gsungs pa gang yin pa de la /
T07TD4091E:209a-22: ci khams gsum pa rnams kyi rmugs pa dang rgod pa gzung ngam 'on te 'dod pa dang ldan pa 'ba' zhig gzung zhe na /
T07TD4091E:209a-23: 'di skad du mi dge ba'i phung po ma 'dres pa ni 'di yin te /
T07TD4091E:209a-24: 'di lta ste sgrib pa lnga'o zhes 'byung bas gcig tu mi dge ba 'byung ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i sgrib pa khams gzhan dag na ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:209a-25: ci'i phyir rmugs pa dang gnyid gnyis kyang sgrib pa gcig tu bshad la /
T07TD4091E:209a-26: rgod pa dang 'gyod pa gnyis kyang bshad ce na /
T07TD4091E:209a-28: zas dang bya ba gcig pa'i phyir //
T07TD4091E:209a-29: gnyis gcig / gnyis kyi gcig yin pas na gcig go //
T07TD4091E:209a-30: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po dang zas ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni don gcig go //
T07TD4091E:209a-31: mdo las rmugs pa dang gnyid gnyis kyi ni zas kyang gcig / zas ma yin pa yang gcig tu gsungs te /
T07TD4091E:209a-32: rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sgrib pa'i zas ci zhig ce na /
T07TD4091E:209a-40: gnyid kyi sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa ci zhig yin ce na /
T07TD4091E:209a-41: snang ba yid la byed pa'o //
T07TD4091E:209a-42: 'di gnyis kyi bya ba yang gcig ste /
T07TD4091E:209a-43: 'di gnyis kyang sems zhum par byed pa'o //
T07TD4091E:209a-44: rgod pa dang 'gyod pa gnyis kyang gcig ste /
T07TD4091E:209a-45: rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i zas ni ci zhig ce na /
T07TD4091E:209b-0: @209b gnyen gyi rnam par rtog pa dang /
T07TD4091E:209b-1: yul gyi mi'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
T07TD4091E:209b-2: mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
T07TD4091E:209b-6: dga' ba dang yongs su spyad pa rjes su dran pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:209b-7: rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa ci zhig ce na /
T07TD4091E:209b-9: 'di gnyis kyi bya ba yang gcig ste /
T07TD4091E:209b-10: 'di gnyis kas kyang sems nye bar zhi bar mi byed de /
T07TD4091E:209b-11: de'i phyir mi mthun pa dang zas dang bya ba gcig pa'i phyir gnyi ga gcig nyid du bshad do //
T07TD4091E:209b-12: gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang sgrib pa nyid yin na /
T07TD4091E:209b-13: ci'i phyir na lnga nyid du bshad ce na /
T07TD4091E:209b-15: the tshom phyir na lnga nyid do //
T07TD4091E:209b-17: gnod sems gnyis kyis ni tshul khrims kyi phung po la gegs byed do //
T07TD4091E:209b-18: rmugs pa dang gnyid gnyis kyis ni shes rab kyi phung po la gegs byed do //
T07TD4091E:209b-19: rgod pa dang 'gyod pas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la gegs byed do //
T07TD4091E:209b-20: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab med na /
T07TD4091E:209b-21: bden pa dag la the tshom za bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir lnga nyid du bshad do //
T07TD4091E:209b-23: skal pa mi mnyam pa'i khams su kun du 'gro ba rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:209b-24: 'gog pa dang lam ma thong bas spang bar bya ba zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa rnams gang gi tshe dmigs pa yongs su shes pa de'i tshe ni mi spong la /
T07TD4091E:209b-25: gang gi tshe spong ba de'i tshe ni dmigs pa yongs su mi shes na ji ltar de dag spong ba yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:209b-26: dmigs pa yongs su shes pas gdon mi za bar nyon mongs pa rnams zad pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:209b-27: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4091E:209b-28: rnam pa bzhi bshad pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:209b-29: rnam pa bzhi po gang dag gis she na /
T07TD4091E:209b-30: re zhig mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams ni /
T07TD4091E:209b-31: dmigs pa yongs su shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:209b-32: de la dmigs pa yang dag par //
T07TD4091E:209b-33: zad dang dmigs pa spangs pas so //
T07TD4091E:209b-34: de dmigs pa yongs su shes pas ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba rang gi sa la dmigs pa rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:209b-35: 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba zag pa med pa la dmigs pa rnams zad par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:210a-0: de la dmigs pa yang dag par zad pas ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams su kun du 'gro ba rnams zad @210a * //
T07TD4091E:210a-2: de la dmigs pa ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams su kun du 'gro ba rnams yin pas /
T07TD4091E:210a-3: de dag spangs na de dag kyang spangs pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:210a-4: dmigs pa spangs pas ni 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa rnams zad par 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:210a-5: zag pa med pa la dmigs pa de dag gi dmigs pa yin pas de'i phyir de dag spangs na de dag kyang spangs pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:210a-6: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams ni /
T07TD4091E:210a-7: gnyen po skyes nas zad par 'gyur //
T07TD4091E:210a-8: nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gang gi gnyen po gang yin pa las skyes na des de spong bar byed do /
T07TD4091E:210a-9: gang gi gnyen po yang gang zhig ce na /
T07TD4091E:210a-10: chen po'i chen po ni chung ngu'i chung ngu zhes bya ba ste /
T07TD4091E:210a-11: rgyas par ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:210a-12: gnyen po yang rnam pa du zhig ce na /
T07TD4091E:210a-14: gnyen po rnam bzhi spong ba dang //
T07TD4091E:210a-15: gzhi dang ring pa nyid dang ni //

T07TD4091E:210a-39: mtshan nyid ring ba nyid ni 'di lta ste /

T07TD4091E:210b-3: yul ring ba nyid ni 'di lta ste /

T07TD4091E:210b-19: dbang po rnam par rgyas rnams su //

T07TD4091E:210b-29: spong ba'i yongs su shes pa'o //

T07TD4091E:211a-2: lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i yang gcig go //

T07TD4091E:211a-4: de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spong ba'i yongs su shes pa ni gsum yin te /

T07TD4091E:211a-7: lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spong ba'i yongs su shes pa ni gsum pa ste /

T07TD4091E:211a-9: gzhan yang yongs su shes pa gsum ste /

T07TD4091E:211a-12: tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spong ba la yongs su shes pa gcig go //
T07TD4091E:211a-13: gzugs kyi zag pa spong ba la gcig ste /

T07TD4091E:211a-23: mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa'o //

T07TD4091E:211b-27: shes pa rnams kyi gang yin pa nyid do //

T07TD4091E:213a-0: @213a * // gzugs med pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa'o //

T07TD4091E:213b-2: ci'i phyir bden pa rnams 'di ltar mngon par rtogs she na /
T07TD4091E:213b-4: gang gis gnod par byed pa dang /
T07TD4091E:213b-5: gang las thar par don du gnyer ba dang /
T07TD4091E:213b-6: dang po'i de nyid la rnam par dpyod pa'i gnas skabs su sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la yongs su rtog go //
T07TD4091E:213b-7: phyis 'di'i rgyu ni gang zhig yin zhes kun 'byung gi bden pa dang /
T07TD4091E:213b-8: 'di'i 'gog pa ni gang zhig yin zhes 'gog pa'i bden pa dang /
T07TD4091E:213b-9: 'di'i lam ni gang zhig yin zhes lam gyi bden pa la yongs su rtog ste /
T07TD4091E:213b-10: nad mthong bas de'i gzhi dang zad par bya ba dang /
T07TD4091E:213b-12: mdo las kyang bden ba rnams kyi dpe de ltar bstan te /
T07TD4091E:213b-14: yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa zhes 'byung ba de las bstan to //
T07TD4091E:213b-15: sngar 'phangs pa'i phyir rnam par dpyod pa'i gnas skabs su bden pa rnams la ji ltar yongs su rtog pa bzhin du mngon par rtogs pa'i gnas skabs su yang bden pa rnams de bzhin du mngon par rtogs te /
T07TD4091E:213b-16: sa mthong ba'i rta thags thogs med par rgyug pa bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:213b-17: mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
T07TD4091E:213b-18: mngon par yang dag par byang chub pa'o //
T07TD4091E:213b-19: ci'i phyir zag pa med pa nyid yin gyi zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:213b-20: de ni mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du phyogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:213b-21: yang dag par byang chub ba ste /
T07TD4091E:213b-22: yang dag par zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid du'o //
T07TD4091E:213b-23: gang gi tshe tshor ba'i phyogs gcig sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin yin pa de'i tshe ji ltar na 'du byed zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad sdug bsngal zhes brjod ce na /
T07TD4091E:213b-25: de las gzhan zag bcas rnam nyid //
T07TD4091E:213b-26: sdug bsngal nyid gsum ldan pa'i phyir //
T07TD4091E:213b-27: ci rigs ma lus sdug bsngal lo //
T07TD4091E:213b-29: sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal nyid dang /
T07TD4091E:213b-30: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid dang /
T07TD4091E:213b-31: rnam par 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid de /
T07TD4091E:213b-32: de dag gis ci rigs par 'du byed zag pa dang bcas pa ma lus par sdug bsngal ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:213b-33: de la yid du 'ong ba ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal lo //
T07TD4091E:214a-0: yid du mi 'ong ba ni sdug bsngal gyi @214a * //
T07TD4091E:214a-2: de las gzhan ba ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal lo //
T07TD4091E:214a-3: 'phags pa'i lam ni ma gtogs te /
T07TD4091E:214a-4: mi mthun pa ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid yin ba'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:214a-5: 'phags pa'i lam ni sdug bsngal ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:214a-6: yid du 'ong ba ni gang dag cig yin /
T07TD4091E:214a-7: yid du mi 'ong ba ni gang dag cig yin /
T07TD4091E:214a-8: gnyi ga ma yin ba ni gang dag cig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:214a-9: tshor ba gsum dang rim bzhin te //
T07TD4091E:214a-10: de'i dbang gis bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyang yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa'i ming 'thob bo //
T07TD4091E:214a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa bzhi zhes kyang gsungs /
T07TD4091E:214a-12: don dam pa'i bden pa dang /
T07TD4091E:214a-13: kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
T07TD4091E:214a-14: bden pa gnyis zhes kyang gsungs na de gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
T07TD4091E:214a-15: gang gis bcom dang blo yis gzhan //
T07TD4091E:214a-16: bsal ba de'i blo mi 'jug ba //
T07TD4091E:214a-17: bum chu lta bur kun rdzob tu //
T07TD4091E:214a-18: de yod don dam yod gzhan no //
T07TD4091E:214a-19: gang zhig cha shas su bcom na de'i blo mi 'jug pa de ni kun rdzob tu yod pa ste /
T07TD4091E:214a-20: dper na bum pa lta bu'o //
T07TD4091E:214a-21: de ni gyo mor bcom na bum ba'i blo mi 'jug go //
T07TD4091E:214a-22: gang zhig gis blo chos gzhan bsal na de'i blo mi 'jug pa de yang kun rdzob tu yod par rig par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:214a-24: de la ni blos gzugs la sogs pa'i chos bsal na chu'i blo mi 'jug go //
T07TD4091E:214a-25: de dag nyid la kun rdzob kyis ming der 'dogs pas kun rdzob kyi dbang gis bum pa dang chu yod do zhes brjod pa na /
T07TD4091E:214a-26: bden ba nyid do zhes brjod kyi brdzun pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
T07TD4091E:214a-27: de las gzhan pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
T07TD4091E:214a-28: gang zhig bcom yang rung blo chos gzhan bsal yang rung /
T07TD4091E:214a-29: de'i blo 'jug pa de ni don dam pa nyid du yod de dper na gzugs lta bu'o //
T07TD4091E:214a-30: de na rdul phra rab tu bcom la blos gzugs la sogs pa'i chos bstsal yang /
T07TD4091E:214a-31: gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi blo ni 'jug pa nyid do //
T07TD4091E:214a-32: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya ste /
T07TD4091E:214a-33: de dag ni don dam par yod pas na don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
T07TD4091E:214a-34: bden pa rnams bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:214a-35: ji ltar na de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:214a-36: tshul gnas thos dang bsam ldan pa //
T07TD4091E:214a-37: bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor //
T07TD4091E:214b-0: bden pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pas dang bo nyid du tshul @214b khrims srung bar byed do //
T07TD4091E:214b-1: de nas bden pa mthong ba dang mthun pa'i thos ba 'dzin pa'am don nyan par byed do //
T07TD4091E:214b-2: thos nas phyin ci ma log par sems par byed do //
T07TD4091E:214b-3: bsams nas bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag la rab tu sbyor te /
T07TD4091E:214b-4: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab la brten nas bsams pa las 'byung ba'i shes rab skye'o //
T07TD4091E:214b-5: bsams pa las 'byung ba la brten nas bsgoms pa las byung ba skye'o //
T07TD4091E:214b-6: shes rab de dag gi mtshan nyid kyang ci zhe na /
T07TD4091E:214b-7: thos sogs byung ba blo yi yul //
T07TD4091E:214b-8: ming dang don dang gnyi ga'o //
T07TD4091E:214b-9: ming la dmigs pa ni thos ba las byung ba'i shes rab bo zhes grag go //
T07TD4091E:214b-10: ming dang don gnyi ga la dmigs pa ni bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab ste /
T07TD4091E:214b-11: res 'ga' ni yi ges don 'dren bar byed do //
T07TD4091E:214b-12: res 'ga' ni don gyis yi ge 'dren par byed do //
T07TD4091E:214b-13: bsgoms pa las byung ba ni don la dmigs pa nyid de de ni yi ge la mi brten par don la 'jug go //
T07TD4091E:214b-14: yang de ltar bsgoms pa la rab tu brtson pa de ji ltar na bsgoms pa rdzogs ba yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:214b-17: gal te lus dang sems gnyis kyis bsrings pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:214b-18: 'du 'dzi dang mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thag bsrings pa las so //
T07TD4091E:214b-19: 'o na bsrings pa de gnyis kyang su zhig la bya bar sla ba yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:214b-20: 'dod pa chung ba dang chog shes pas bya bar sla'i chog mi shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:214b-21: 'dod chen can la ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:214b-22: yang chog mi shes pa de ni gang zhig yin /
T07TD4091E:214b-23: 'dod chen che ba de ni gang zhig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:214b-24: rnyed la yang sred chog mi shes //
T07TD4091E:214b-26: chos mngon pa ba dag ni chos gos la sogs pa bzang bo rnyed pa dang /
T07TD4091E:214b-27: yang dang yang du 'dod pa ni chog mi shes pa'o //
T07TD4091E:214b-28: ma rnyed pa de dag 'dod pa ni 'dod chen can no zhes grags go //
T07TD4091E:214b-29: bzlog ba de yi gnyen po ste //
T07TD4091E:214b-30: chog mi shes pa dang 'dod chen las bzlog pa ni de dag gi gnyen por rig par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:214b-31: chog shes pa dang 'dod pa chung ba'o //
T07TD4091E:214b-32: de gnyis khams gsum gtogs dri med //
T07TD4091E:214b-33: de'i gnyen po zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4091E:214b-34: gsum dag dang mi ldan ba na yod do //
T07TD4091E:214b-35: chog mi shes pa dang 'dod chen can ni 'dod pa na spyod pa nyid do //
T07TD4091E:214b-36: yang chog shes pa dang 'dod pa chung ba 'di gnyis kyi rang bzhin ci zhig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:215a-1: gnyis ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yod na /
T07TD4091E:215a-3: ma chags pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4091E:215a-4: 'di la 'phags pa rnams skye bas na 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi yin te /
T07TD4091E:215a-5: de dag kyang ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4091E:215a-7: gsum ni chog shes bdag nyid do //
T07TD4091E:215a-8: dang po'i gsum ni chog shes pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
T07TD4091E:215a-9: chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal stan dag gis chog shes pa dag go //
T07TD4091E:215a-10: 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi ba ni spong ba dang bsgom pa las dga' ba'o //
T07TD4091E:215a-11: de ji ltar ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:215a-12: srid pa dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la rgyab kyis bltas pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:215a-13: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis ci zhig bstan ce na /
T07TD4091E:215a-14: gsum gyis tshul de tha ma las //
T07TD4091E:215a-15: chos kyi mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi tshul dang las kyi mtha' yongs su spangs shing thar pa don du gnyer bas khas 'ches pa'i slob ma dag la tshul dang las kyi mtha' dang gnyis bcas te /
T07TD4091E:215a-16: 'phags pa'i rigs gsum gyis ni tshul gsum bcas so //
T07TD4091E:215a-17: bzhi bas ni las bcas so //
T07TD4091E:215a-18: tshul 'di las 'di byed na ring bo mi thogs par thar ba thob bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4091E:215a-19: ci'i phyir 'ang 'dri ba dang las 'di 'dra ba bcas she na /
T07TD4091E:215a-20: sred pa skye ba'i gnyen po'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:215a-21: mdo las sred pa skye ba ni bzhir gsungs te /
T07TD4091E:215a-22: dge slong sred pa skye ba na chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal stan gyi phyir skye'o //
T07TD4091E:215a-24: mngon par zhen pa na zhen to //
T07TD4091E:215a-25: dge slong sred ba skye ba na skye ba dang 'jig ba la skye'o zhes bya ba rgya cher gsungs so //
T07TD4091E:215a-26: de dag gi gnyen bor 'phags pa'i gnyen po rim bzhin bstan to //
T07TD4091E:215a-27: nga yir bdag 'dzin dngos chags pa //
T07TD4091E:215a-28: de yi dngos dang bzhi bzhi'i phyir //
T07TD4091E:215a-29: don de nyid rnam grangs kyis ston te /
T07TD4091E:215a-30: nga yir 'dzin pa'i dngos po ni chos gos la sogs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:215a-31: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dngos po ni lus so //
T07TD4091E:215a-32: de dag la 'dod pa ni srid pa'o //
T07TD4091E:215a-33: de la nga yir 'dzin pa'i dngos po la 'dod pa de dus su zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i rigs gsum bstan pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:215a-34: gnyi ga shin tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bzhi pa bstan to //
T07TD4091E:215a-36: bsgom pa rdzogs par 'gyur ba 'di bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:215b-0: de ltar snod du gyur pa @215b de ji ltar na bsgom pa de la 'jug pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:215b-1: de la 'jug pa mi sdug dang //
T07TD4091E:215b-2: dbugs rngub 'byung ba dran pa yis //
T07TD4091E:215b-3: gang dag cig ni mi sdug pas 'jug / gang dag cig ni dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran phas 'jug ce na /
T07TD4091E:215b-5: 'dod chags rnam rtog lhag rnams kyis //
T07TD4091E:215b-7: rnam par rtog pa lhag ba na /
T07TD4091E:215b-8: gang zhig 'dod chags spyad pa shin tu nye ba de ni mi sdug pas 'jug go //
T07TD4091E:215b-9: gang zhig rnam par rtog pa dpyod pa de ni dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pas 'jug go //
T07TD4091E:215b-10: kha cig na re sna tshogs la dmigs pa'i phyir de ni rnam par rtog pa gcad pa'i phyir yin gyi /
T07TD4091E:215b-11: mi sdug pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bye brag la dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa skyed do zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:215b-12: gzhan dag na re ni kha nang du bltas pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te /
T07TD4091E:215b-13: mi sdug pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa bzhin du kha phyir bltas pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:215b-14: de'i yul la nye bar rtogs ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:215b-15: de la 'dod chags ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:215b-16: kha dog gi 'dod chags dang dbyibs kyi 'dod chags dang /
T07TD4091E:215b-18: nye bar spyod pa'i 'dod chags so //
T07TD4091E:215b-19: dang po'i gnyen bor ni mi sdug pa rnam par bsngos ba la sogs pa la dmigs pa brjod do //
T07TD4091E:215b-20: gnyis pa ni rnam par zos pa dang /
T07TD4091E:215b-22: gsum ba ni rnam par dbus gzhigs ba dang /
T07TD4091E:215b-23: rgyus bas brang breng du 'brel ba'i keng rus la dmigs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:215b-24: bzhi pa ni shi ba'i ro g-yo ba med pa la dmigs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:215b-26: chags can kun la keng rus so //
T07TD4091E:215b-27: rus pa'i keng rus la ni /
T07TD4091E:215b-28: chags pa'i dngos po 'di bzhi char med do //
T07TD4091E:215b-29: mos pa dang phyogs gcig yid la byed pa'i phyir mi sdug pas nyon mongs pa spong ba ni ma yin gyi rnam par gnon pa ni yin no //
T07TD4091E:215b-30: yang mi sdug pa 'di lta bu bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa de ni rnam pa gsum du brjod do //
T07TD4091E:215b-32: yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang //
T07TD4091E:215b-33: yid la byed pa rdzogs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:215b-35: dang po'i las brgya mtsho'i bar //
T07TD4091E:215b-36: keng rus bsdu zhing spro ba'o //
T07TD4091E:215b-37: mi sdug pa bsgom par 'dod pas rnal 'byor spyod pas mos ba skyed pa'i phyir dang po kho nar rang gi yan lag rkang pa'i mthe bo'am /
T07TD4091E:215b-38: dpral ba'i dbyes sam yang na gar dga' bar sems 'jog par byed la /
T07TD4091E:216a-0: de der sha myags shing zags par mos pa nas rim gyis rus @216a * //
T07TD4091E:216a-1: pa rnam par sbyong ba na thams cad rus pa'i keng rus su blta ste /
T07TD4091E:216a-2: de bzhin du gnyis pa la yang mos par byed cing rim gyis gtsug lag khang dang /
T07TD4091E:216a-5: zhing dang rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i bar gyis gzhi keng rus kyis gang par mos par byed de /
T07TD4091E:216a-6: yang bsdus pa na sems bsdu ba'i don du bdag gcig bu'i bar la rus pa'i keng rus su mos par byed de /
T07TD4091E:216a-7: 'di tsam gyis ni mi sdug pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no zhes grag ste /
T07TD4091E:216a-8: 'di ni las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:216a-9: keng rus nas ni thod phyed bar //
T07TD4091E:216a-10: btang ba sbyang ba byas pas bshad//
T07TD4091E:216a-11: de sems bsdu ba khyad par du bya ba'i phyir de'i rus pa'i keng rus las rkang pa'i rus ba btang nas lhag ma yid la byed cing de bzhin du rim gyis thod pa'i phyed bor nas thod pa phyed yid la byed pa 'di ni yongs su sbyang ba byas pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:216a-12: smin ma'i nang du sems 'dzin pa //
T07TD4091E:216a-13: yid la byed pa rdzogs pa yin //
T07TD4091E:216a-14: de thod pa'i phyed kyang btang nas smin mi'i nang dag tu sems 'dzin par byed pa 'di ni mi sdug ba yid la byed pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa yin no zhes grags go //
T07TD4091E:216a-15: yang mi sdug pa 'di'i rang bzhin ni ci zhig yin /
T07TD4091E:216a-16: sa ni du zhig / dmigs pa ni du zhig yin /
T07TD4091E:216a-17: gang du ni skye bar byed ce na /
T07TD4091E:216a-19: ma chags pa bcu 'dod snang ba //
T07TD4091E:216a-20: dmigs pa mis skyed mi sdug pa'o //
T07TD4091E:216a-21: rang bzhin ni ma chags pa'o //
T07TD4091E:216a-23: bsam gtan bzhi nye bar bsngogs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T07TD4091E:216a-24: bsam gtan khyad par can dang /
T07TD4091E:216a-26: dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i snang ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:216a-27: snang ba zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
T07TD4091E:216a-28: kha dog dang dbyibs yin te /
T07TD4091E:216a-29: de nyid kyi phyir don la dmigs pa'o zhes bya bar grub bo //
T07TD4091E:216a-30: mi'i nang nyid dag tu skyed kyi 'gro ba gzhan dag tu yang ma yin na /
T07TD4091E:216a-31: khams gzhan dag tu lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos /
T07TD4091E:216a-32: de dag tu yang byang gi sgra mi snyan dag tu ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:216a-33: ming nyid kyis mi sdug pa'i rnam pa'o zhes bya bar grub po //
T07TD4091E:216a-34: gang gis dus ma yin pa de de'i dus la dmigs so //
T07TD4091E:216a-35: mi skye ba'i chos can zhig yin na ni dmigs pa dus gsum yin no //
T07TD4091E:216a-36: mos pa yid la byed pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pa'o //
T07TD4091E:216b-0: 'dris ba dang ma @216b 'dris pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa dang /
T07TD4091E:216b-1: sbyor ba las byung ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:216b-2: mi sdug pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba dang bcas par bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:216b-3: dbugs rngub 'byung dran shes rab ste //
T07TD4091E:216b-4: sa lnga spyod yul rlung yin no //
T07TD4091E:216b-6: rngub pa ni dbugs rngub pa ste //
T07TD4091E:216b-7: rlung 'jug pa gang yin pa nyid do //
T07TD4091E:216b-10: de gnyis kyi dran pa ni dbugs rngub pa dang /
T07TD4091E:216b-12: de ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:216b-13: dran pa zhes bya ba'i tshig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhin te /
T07TD4091E:216b-14: de'i stobs bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:216b-15: sa ni lnga ste nyer bsngogs gsum dang /
T07TD4091E:216b-16: bsam gtan khyad par can dang /
T07TD4091E:216b-18: btang snyoms dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:216b-19: de'i dmigs pa ni rlung ngo //
T07TD4091E:216b-20: 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi'i lus dag gis skyed do //
T07TD4091E:216b-21: 'dris pa dar ma 'dris pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa dang sbyor ba las byung ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:216b-22: 'di ni de kho na yid la byed pa yin na ni chos 'di ba rnams nyid kyi yin gyi /
T07TD4091E:216b-25: bdag nyid kyis chos zab mo mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:216b-27: bgrang ba la sogs rnam drug gis //
T07TD4091E:216b-28: bgrang ba dang rjes su 'gro ba dang /
T07TD4091E:216b-33: rgyu drug dang ldan na 'di yongs su rdzogs pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:216b-34: de la bgrang ba zhes bya ba ni dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byin pa dag la sems btang nas mngon par 'du bya ba med par lus dang sems rnal du gzhag ste /
T07TD4091E:216b-35: dran pa tsam gyis gcig gnyis zhes bya ba nas bcu'i bar du bgrang bar byed pa'o //
T07TD4091E:216b-36: sems mngon bar sdud pa dang /
T07TD4091E:216b-37: rnam par g-yeng bar dogs pas mang ba dang nyung ba ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:216b-38: de la skyon ni gsum ste /
T07TD4091E:216b-39: gal te gcig la gnyis su bgrang na ma tshang par bgrang ba'o //
T07TD4091E:216b-40: gal te gnyis la gcig tu bgrang na lhag par bgrang ba'o //
T07TD4091E:216b-41: gal te dbugs rngub ba la dbugs 'byin par 'dzin tam /
T07TD4091E:216b-42: dbugs 'byin pa la dbugs rngub par 'dzin na 'chol ba'o //
T07TD4091E:216b-43: de las gzhan pa ni yang dag pa'i bgrang ba'o //
T07TD4091E:216b-44: bar skabs su g-yengs na dang po nas yang bgrang bar bya ste /
T07TD4091E:217a-0: @217a * // ji srid du ting nge 'dzin ma thob kyi bar du'o //
T07TD4091E:217a-1: rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di 'byung ba 'am mjug pa ni thag ji srid cig / ci lus 'di thams cad la khyab pa zhig gam /
T07TD4091E:217a-2: 'on te phyogs 'ga' zhig na rgyu ba zhig yin zhes mngon par 'du bya ba med par dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byin pa'i 'gros kyi rjes su 'gro zhing /
T07TD4091E:217a-3: 'jug pa na yang rim gyis lkog ma dang /
T07TD4091E:217a-8: byin pa nas rkang ba dag gi bar du 'jug pa'i rjes su 'gro zhing 'byung ba na yang mtho gang dang 'dom gang gi bar thag tsam du rjes su 'gro ba'o //
T07TD4091E:217a-9: kha cig na re rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T07TD4091E:217a-10: rnam par 'thor byed kyi rlung gi bar du'o zhes zer te /
T07TD4091E:217a-11: 'di ni de kho na yid la byed pa yin pa'i phyir de ni rigs pa ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:217a-12: 'jog pa zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i thag pa bzhin du sna'i rtse mo nas rkang pa'i mthe bo'i bar du gnas par lta ba dang /
T07TD4091E:217a-13: ci 'di phan 'dogs pa zhig grang ba'am dro ba zhig ces rtog pa'o //
T07TD4091E:217a-14: nye bar rtog pa 'di ni rlung 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi 'di ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /
T07TD4091E:217a-15: 'byung ba dag las mngon par grub ba rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang /
T07TD4091E:217a-16: de la brten pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba yang yod do zhes phung po lnga la nye bar rtog par byed pa'o //
T07TD4091E:217a-17: bsgyur ba ni rlung la dmigs pa'i blo bsgyur te chos kyi mchog gi bar du gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba las yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
T07TD4091E:217a-18: yongs su dag pa ni mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa la 'jug pa'o //
T07TD4091E:217a-19: gzhan dag na re bsgyur pa ni dran ba nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa nas /
T07TD4091E:217a-20: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar yin la /
T07TD4091E:217a-21: yongs su dag pa ni zad pa shes pa la sogs pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:217a-22: bgrang dang rjes 'gro gnas pa dang //
T07TD4091E:217a-23: rtog pa dang ni bsgyur ba dang //
T07TD4091E:217a-24: yongs dag rnam pa 'di drug ni //
T07TD4091E:217a-26: ces bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:217a-28: dbugs rngub 'byung ba gang gi lus //
T07TD4091E:217a-29: lus kyi phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir //
T07TD4091E:217a-30: sa drug pa'i lus la de gnyis kyang sa de ba yin par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:217a-31: dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba de gnyis kyang /
T07TD4091E:217a-33: sems can du mi bgrang ba ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:217a-35: dbang po dang tha dad pa'i phyir ro//
T07TD4091E:217b-1: lus rgyas pas thung dur 'gyur ba dang /
T07TD4091E:217b-2: tshad nas yang nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i phyir rgyas pa las 'byung ba dang /
T07TD4091E:217b-3: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ni ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:217b-4: 'di rnam par smin pa'i gzugs med do //
T07TD4091E:217b-6: yid kyis de gnyis mi rtogs so //
T07TD4091E:217b-7: rang gi sa dang sa gong ma ste /
T07TD4091E:217b-8: de gnyis kyi sems kyis rtogs kyi /
T07TD4091E:217b-9: sa 'og mas kyang mi rtogs pa spyod lam pa dang sprul pa las kyang mi rtogs so //
T07TD4091E:217b-10: 'jug pa'i sgo gnyis bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:217b-11: de gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin thob nas lhag mthong bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:217b-12: zhi gnas grub par gyur nas ni //
T07TD4091E:217b-13: dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom par bya //
T07TD4091E:217b-15: lus tshor sems dang chos rnams la //
T07TD4091E:217b-16: mtshan nyid gnyis su yongs brtags pas //
T07TD4091E:217b-17: lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos rnams rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid du yongs su brtags te /
T07TD4091E:217b-18: de dag gi rang gi ngo bo nyid ni mtshan nyid do //
T07TD4091E:217b-19: spyi'i mtshan nyid ni 'dus byas rnams ni mi rtag pa nyid /
T07TD4091E:217b-20: zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni sdug bsngal ba nyid /
T07TD4091E:217b-21: chos thams cad ni stong pa dang bdag med pa'o //
T07TD4091E:217b-22: lus kyi rang gi ngo bo ci zhe na /
T07TD4091E:217b-23: 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid do //
T07TD4091E:217b-24: gsum po las gzhan pa dag ni chos so //
T07TD4091E:217b-25: mnyam par bzhag pa lus la rdul phra rab kyi cha dang skad cig mar mthong ba na lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa grub pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:217b-26: yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
T07TD4091E:217b-27: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni rnam par gsum du blta bar bya ste /
T07TD4091E:217b-30: dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
T07TD4091E:217b-31: de la rang bzhin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni shes rab bo //
T07TD4091E:217b-33: shes rab thos sogs las byung ba //
T07TD4091E:217b-34: thos pa las byung ba dang /
T07TD4091E:217b-35: bsams pa las byung ba dang /
T07TD4091E:217b-37: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4091E:217b-38: thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'o //
T07TD4091E:217b-39: gzhan ni 'dres dang dmigs pa las //
T07TD4091E:217b-40: gzhan de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
T07TD4091E:217b-41: de'i dmigs pa lus la sogs pa ni dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
T07TD4091E:218a-1: ming ni dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin yin la /
T07TD4091E:218a-2: rim ni ji ltar skye ba bzhin //
T07TD4091E:218a-3: ci'i phyir de ltar skye zhe na /
T07TD4091E:218a-4: rags pa'i rim pas sngar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:218a-5: 'o na bden pa rnams ci'i phyir grangs bzhi kho nar nges she na /
T07TD4091E:218a-6: phyin ci log gi gnyen por bzhi //
T07TD4091E:218a-10: bdag tu phyin ci log pa rnam pa bzhi'i gnyen por dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rim bzhin du bstan te /
T07TD4091E:218a-12: de dag las gsum ni ma 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:218a-13: bzhi pa ni gnyi ga la dmigs pa ste /
T07TD4091E:218a-14: gal te chos 'ba' zhig la rnam bar lta na ni /
T07TD4091E:218a-15: ma 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:218a-16: 'on te lus la sogs pa gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi'i spyi la lta na ni 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:218a-17: de ltar lus la sogs pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams goms par byas nas /
T07TD4091E:218a-18: de ni chos dran nyer gzhag pa'i //
T07TD4091E:218a-19: spyi yi dmigs pa la gnas te //
T07TD4091E:218a-20: de dag la ni mi rtag dang //
T07TD4091E:218a-21: sdug bsngal stong bdag med par lta //
T07TD4091E:218a-22: de chos dran pa nye bar gzhag par 'dres pa'i dmigs pa la gnas shing /
T07TD4091E:218a-23: lus la sogs pa de dag thams cad la spyir bsdus te mi rtag pa dang /
T07TD4091E:218a-28: de nas dro bar gyur pa skye //
T07TD4091E:218a-29: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de nyid la goms pa las rim gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba dro bar gyur pa zhes bya pa skye'o //
T07TD4091E:218a-30: dro bar gyur pa dang 'dra bas na dro bar gyur pa ste /
T07TD4091E:218a-31: nyon mongs pa'i shing sreg par byed pa 'phags pa'i lam gyi snga ltas yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:218a-32: de ni bden pa bzhi'i spyod yul lo //
T07TD4091E:218a-33: dro bar gyur pa de ni rgyun chags yin pa'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:218a-34: bden pa bzhi la dmigs shing /
T07TD4091E:218a-35: rnam pa bcu drug / sdug bsngal la mi rtag pa dang /
T07TD4091E:218b-0: nges par 'byin pa dang @218b rnam pa bzhir blta ste /
T07TD4091E:218b-1: 'di dag gi bye brag ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:218b-4: 'bring dang chen po'i rim gyis 'phel ba las dge ba'i rtsa ba rtse mo zhes bya ba skye ste /
T07TD4091E:218b-6: dro ba ji lta ba bzhin du bden pa bzhi la dmigs shing rnam pa bcu drug tu yang blta ste /
T07TD4091E:218b-7: khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ming gzhan du btags so //
T07TD4091E:218b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba g-yo ba'i rtse mo yin pa'i phyir rtse mo rnams te /
T07TD4091E:218b-9: 'di las ltung ba'am yang na 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:218b-10: chos kyis gnyi ga rnam pa gtong //
T07TD4091E:218b-11: dro bar gyur pa dang rtse mo 'di gnyi ga ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pas rnam pa la gtod par byed do //
T07TD4091E:218b-12: rnam pa la gtod pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
T07TD4091E:218b-13: bden ba dag gi rnam pa rnams la dang po nyid du 'god do //
T07TD4091E:218b-14: 'phel bar byed pa gzhan gyis kyang //
T07TD4091E:218b-15: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char gyis kyang de dag 'phel bar byed do //
T07TD4091E:218b-16: rnam par 'phel ba ni sngar thob zin pa rnams ni yang mngon sum du mi byed de /
T07TD4091E:218b-17: de dag dga' ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:218b-18: rtse mo chung du dang 'brid dang chen po'i rim gyis 'phel ba na /
T07TD4091E:218b-19: de la bzod pa yang skye ste /
T07TD4091E:218b-20: yongs su mi nyams pa'i sgo nas bden pa la cher bzod pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:218b-22: 'bring dang chen po dang rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4091E:218b-25: rtse mo ji skad du bshad pa de bzhin du bzod pa chung du dang 'bring yang rnam pa rnams la gtod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:218b-26: rnam par 'phel ba la ni khyad par 'di yod de /
T07TD4091E:218b-28: thams cad chos kyis 'phel bar byed //
T07TD4091E:218b-29: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyis 'phel bar byed kyi /
T07TD4091E:218b-30: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:218b-31: chen po 'dod gtogs sdug bsngal yul //
T07TD4091E:218b-32: bzod pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4091E:218b-33: de ni chos kyi mchog dang 'brel ba'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la dmigs pa nyid do //
T07TD4091E:218b-34: de nyid kyi phyir dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa'i nges pa ma smos pa'i phyir khams gsum pa'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa la dmigs pa nyid du grub po //
T07TD4091E:218b-35: gang gi tshe gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i gnyen po la sogs pa'i bden pa'i rnam pa la dmigs pa re re nas 'dor ba nas /
T07TD4091E:219a-0: 'dod pa na spyod pa nyid kyis sdug bsngal la skad cig ma gnyis su yid la byed pa'i bar de dag thams cad ni bzod @219a * //
T07TD4091E:219a-2: skad cig ma gcig gang yin pa de ni chen po yin te /
T07TD4091E:219a-4: de ni skad cig gcig yin gyi rgyun chags pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:219a-6: chos mchog de dag kyang bzod pa chen po ji lta ba bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la dmigs shing skad cig gcig yin no //
T07TD4091E:219a-7: de dag ni 'jig rten pa yang yin chos kyang yin mchog kyang yin la /
T07TD4091E:219a-8: 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi gtso bo yang yin pas 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog ste /
T07TD4091E:219a-9: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu med par de'i rtsal gyis 'phags pa'i lam 'dren par byed pa'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:219a-10: dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi bdag nyid ces bya'o //
T07TD4091E:219a-11: thams cad phung po lnga 'khor dang bcas te /
T07TD4091E:219a-14: thob pa ni dro bar gyur pa la sogs pas ma bsdus te /
T07TD4091E:219a-15: 'phags pas de mngon sum du byas nas dro bar gyur ba la sogs pa yang mngon sum du 'gyur du 'ong ngo //
T07TD4091E:219a-17: nges 'byed cha mthun rnam ba bzhi //
T07TD4091E:219a-23: rnam pa bzhi po de dag ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yin no //
T07TD4091E:219a-24: de dag las gnyis ni yongs su nyams pa'i sgo nas g-yo ba'i phyir chung du yin no //
T07TD4091E:219a-26: chos kyi mchog ni chen po'o //
T07TD4091E:219a-27: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
T07TD4091E:219a-29: nges par 'byed pas na nges par 'byed pa ste /
T07TD4091E:219a-31: des the tshom spong ba'i phyir ba dang /
T07TD4091E:219a-32: 'di ni sdug bsngal zhes bya ba nas 'di ni lam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du bden pa rnams la rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:219a-33: de'i cha ni mthong ba'i lam gyi phyogs gcig yin te /
T07TD4091E:219a-34: de 'dren pa dang ldan pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams so //
T07TD4091E:219a-35: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnam pa 'di bzhi char yang /
T07TD4091E:219a-37: thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:219a-38: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams du pa zhig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:219a-39: mi lcogs pa med pa dang /
T07TD4091E:219b-0: khyad par bsam gtan @219b gyis pa'o //
T07TD4091E:219b-1: mi lcogs pa med pa dang /
T07TD4091E:219b-2: bsam gtan khyad par can dang /
T07TD4091E:219b-3: bsam gtan bzhi rnams kyis pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:219b-4: de dag gis bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:219b-5: mthong ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir gong ma'i sa pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:219b-6: 'dod pa'i khams la mi dmigs pa'i phyir de ni med do //
T07TD4091E:219b-7: de yang sngar yongs su shes par bya zhing spang par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:219b-8: de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni gzugs kyi khams kyi phung po lnga yin no //
T07TD4091E:219b-9: yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dag nyid yin gyi /
T07TD4091E:219b-10: srid pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir 'phel bar byed pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:219b-11: gnyis ni 'og ma na yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bye brag tu rtogs pa'i don te /
T07TD4091E:219b-13: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang po gnyis 'dod pa'i khams na yang yod pas sa bdun pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:219b-14: bzhi po de dag thams cad kyang /
T07TD4091E:219b-15: 'dod lugs gsum ni mi dag gi nang nyid dang /
T07TD4091E:219b-16: gling gsum dag tu skye bar byed do //
T07TD4091E:219b-17: sngar skyes zin pa rnams ni lha dag gi nang du yang mngon sum du byed do //
T07TD4091E:219b-18: bzhi pa ni lha dag gi nang du yang skyed par byed do //
T07TD4091E:219b-19: gsum ni skyes pa dang bud med gnyi ga la brten pa yang gnyi gas thob po //
T07TD4091E:219b-21: gnyi ga la ni brten pa thob //
T07TD4091E:219b-22: chos kyi mchog ni dud med 'ba' zhig gis gnyi ga la brten pa 'thob kyi /
T07TD4091E:219b-23: skyes pas ni skyes pa la brten pa 'ba' zhig 'thob kyi /
T07TD4091E:219b-24: bud med nyid ni so sor ma brtags pa'i 'gog pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:219b-25: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams ji ltar gtong zhe na /
T07TD4091E:219b-26: 'phags pa'i de dag sa bor nas gtong ste /
T07TD4091E:219b-27: 'phags pa des sa gang dag pa'i thob po //
T07TD4091E:219b-28: sa de dag bor nas de dag kyang gtong zhing gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:219b-29: sa bor ba ni sa 'phos pas so //
T07TD4091E:219b-31: so so'i skye bo ni sa 'phos kyang rung ma 'phos kyang rung ste /
T07TD4091E:219b-32: rigs mthun pa gtong ba nyid kyis gtong ngo //
T07TD4091E:219b-33: dang po'i gnyis yongs su nyams pas kyang /
T07TD4091E:219b-34: gtong ba la 'chi bas kyang gtong ste /
T07TD4091E:219b-35: so so'i skye bo nyid yin gyi /
T07TD4091E:219b-36: 'phags pa ni de dag las yongs su nyams pa med do //
T07TD4091E:219b-37: bzod pa dang chos kyi mchog dag las ni so so'i skye bo yongs su nyams pa med do //
T07TD4091E:220a-2: bsam gtan dngos gzhi pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de ni gdon mi za bar tshe 'di nyid la bden pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:220a-3: yid byung ba shas che ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:220a-4: rnam nyams dag gis sngon mi 'thob //
T07TD4091E:220a-5: gang gi tshe rnam par nyams pa dag gis yang 'thob pa de'i tshe ni ma 'dris pa dang 'bad pas bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir sngon gyi ma yin pa nyid cig 'thob kyi /
T07TD4091E:220a-6: sngon btang ba ni mi 'thob ste /
T07TD4091E:220a-7: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:220a-8: mtshams bstan ba zhig yin na ni gong ma dag skyed par byed do //
T07TD4091E:220a-9: ma yin na ni rnam pa bzhi kho nas skyed par byed do //
T07TD4091E:220a-10: rnam par nyams pa dang yongs su nyams pa de dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
T07TD4091E:220a-11: nyams pa gnyi ga mi ldan pa //
T07TD4091E:220a-12: nyams pa de gnyi ga yang mi ldan pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
T07TD4091E:220a-13: yongs su nyams pa ni nyes pa byas pa'o //
T07TD4091E:220a-14: rnam par nyams pa ni yon tan gyi bye brag tu yang byas pa'i phyir nges pa med do //
T07TD4091E:220a-15: de la dro bar gyur pa las yongs su nyams kyang nges par mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:220a-16: thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag las khyad par ci zhugs she na /
T07TD4091E:220a-17: bar chad med par bden pa mthong ba la ches nye ba nyid do //
T07TD4091E:220a-18: rtse mo thob pa rtsa mi 'chad //
T07TD4091E:220a-19: rtse mo thob pa las yongs su nyams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni kun du mi 'chad kyi /
T07TD4091E:220a-20: ngan song dag tu yang 'gro la mtshams med pa dag kyang byed do //
T07TD4091E:220a-22: bzod pa dag las rnam par nyams kyang yang ngan song du mi 'gro ste /
T07TD4091E:220a-23: der 'gro ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa thag bsrings pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:220a-24: bzod pa thob pa nyid kyis 'gro ba dang /
T07TD4091E:220a-29: nyon mongs pa rnams las kha cig gis mi skye ba'i chos nyid 'thob ste /
T07TD4091E:220a-30: ngan song gi 'gro ba rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:220a-31: sgo nga las skyes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:220a-32: drod gsher las skyes pa'i skye gnas dang /
T07TD4091E:220a-33: 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /
T07TD4091E:220a-34: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /
T07TD4091E:220a-35: tshangs pa chen por skyes pa rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:220a-36: za ma dang ma ning dang /
T07TD4091E:220a-37: mtshan gnyis pa'i lus rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:220a-38: srid pa brgyad la sogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:220a-39: mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams so //
T07TD4091E:220b-0: de dag las ci rigs par chung dus ni ngan song rnams su mi @220b skye ba thob la /
T07TD4091E:220b-1: chen pos ni gzhan dag tu yang mi skye ba 'thob bo //
T07TD4091E:220b-2: nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs tha dad pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams ni rigs gsum mo //
T07TD4091E:220b-3: de la slob pa'i rigs gnyis bzlog nas ni //
T07TD4091E:220b-5: nyan thos kyi rigs las 'byung ba'i dro bar gyur pa dang /
T07TD4091E:220b-7: sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar ni srid kyi bzod pa thob pa dag tu ni de lta bu mi srid de /
T07TD4091E:220b-9: ngan song rnams bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:220b-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang gis ngan song dag tu yang 'gro'o zhes grag go //
T07TD4091E:220b-11: yang na de'i rigs nyid mi zlogs pa'i phyir mi srid do //
T07TD4091E:220b-13: bzlog nas 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4091E:220b-14: nyan thos kyi rigs kyi nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gsum yang bzlog nas /
T07TD4091E:220b-15: sangs rgyas las gzhan par 'gyur te rang sangs rgyas su zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07TD4091E:220b-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs rnams ni bzlog par mi nus te 'di ltar /
T07TD4091E:220b-17: ston dang bse ru byang chub bar //
T07TD4091E:220b-18: bsam gtan mtha' brten gcig la kun //
T07TD4091E:220b-19: ston pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
T07TD4091E:220b-20: bse ru lta bu ni rang sangs rgyas te /
T07TD4091E:220b-21: de gnyis ni bsam gtan bzhi pa nyid la brten nas nges par 'byed ba'i cha dang mthun pa rnams nas brtsams te /
T07TD4091E:220b-22: byang chub kyi bar du stan gcig la 'dug cing skyed par byed de /
T07TD4091E:220b-23: ting nge 'dzin mi g-yo ba dang /
T07TD4091E:220b-25: zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes ni byang chub bo zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:220b-26: kha cig na re mi sdug pa nas brtsams te byang chub kyi bar ro zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:220b-27: gang dag gi bse ru lta bu las gzhan pa'i rang sangs rgyas yod pa de'i rigs rnams bzlog par dgag pa med pa'o //
T07TD4091E:220b-28: yang ci tshe dang po nyid la sbyor bar byas te /
T07TD4091E:220b-29: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams skyed dam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:220b-30: de lta bu med kyi nges par /
T07TD4091E:220b-31: de yi sngon du thar cha mthun //
T07TD4091E:220b-33: thams cad bas na shin tu myur ba srid pa gsum gyis thar /
T07TD4091E:220b-34: tshe gcig la thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skyed do //
T07TD4091E:220b-35: gnyis pa la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skyed do //
T07TD4091E:221a-2: sa bon 'debs pa dang 'bru skye ba dang 'bras bu 'chags pa bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:221a-3: 'di ni chos nyid kyis rgyud ni rim gyis 'jug pa dang /
T07TD4091E:221a-5: rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:221a-6: thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa de yang /
T07TD4091E:221a-7: thos bsams las byung zhes bya ste /
T07TD4091E:221a-8: bsgoms pa las byung ba ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:221a-9: lam du dag cig ce na /
T07TD4091E:221a-11: gtso bor ni yid kyi las so //
T07TD4091E:221a-12: de'i smon lam gyis yongs su zin pa'i lus dang ngag gi las kyang thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:221a-13: zas 'ga' tsam byin pa'am bslab pa 'ga' tsam yang mnos te /
T07TD4091E:221a-14: thar pa 'dod pa'i stobs bskyed pa las thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa 'phen par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:221a-16: mi yi nang nas 'phen par byed //
T07TD4091E:221a-18: gling gsum dag nas 'phen par byed kyi gzhan dag tu ni ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:221a-19: ci rigs par skyo ba dang /
T07TD4091E:221a-20: shes rab med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:221a-21: thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa zla la bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:221a-22: da ni dkyus ma mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa bshad par brtsam mo //
T07TD4091E:221a-23: de la yang chos kyi mchog gi bar du bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:221a-24: lhag ma brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:221a-26: 'jig rten pa yi chos mchog las //
T07TD4091E:221a-27: chos shes bzod pa zag pa med //
T07TD4091E:221a-28: 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi mjug thogs su chos shes pa'i bzod pa zag pa med pa skye'o //
T07TD4091E:221a-29: dmigs pa gang skye zhe na /
T07TD4091E:221a-31: de'i dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod ba'i sdug bsngal yin te /
T07TD4091E:221a-32: de ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:221a-33: zag pa med pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pas bye brag tu byas pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:221a-34: chos shes par bya ba'i phyir bzod pa ni chos shes pa'i bzod pa ste /
T07TD4091E:221a-35: me tog dang 'bras bu'i ljon shing bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:221a-36: de nyid nges par zhugs pa zhes pa'o //
T07TD4091E:221a-38: de nyid la ni chos shes pa //
T07TD4091E:221a-39: de nas sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i mjug thogs su /
T07TD4091E:221a-40: 'dir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal nyid la chos shes pa skye ste /
T07TD4091E:221a-41: de ni sdug bsngal la chos shes ba zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:221a-42: thams cad du zag pa med pa'i dbang du byas par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:221b-0: ji ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la @221b chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:221b-1: chos shes pa skye ba de bzhin du /
T07TD4091E:221b-2: sdug bsngal lhag par rjes bzod dang //
T07TD4091E:221b-4: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i mjug thogs su gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dmigs pa spyi la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa skye ste /
T07TD4091E:221b-5: de ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:221b-6: de nas ni rjes su shes pa skye ste /
T07TD4091E:221b-7: de ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:221b-8: dang po kho nar chos kyi de kho na nyid shes pa'i phyir chos shes pa'o //
T07TD4091E:221b-9: de dang mthun pa'i phyir gong ma'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa la dmigs pa ni rjes su shes pa ste de bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:221b-10: ji ltar sdug bsngal la bzod pa dang shes pa bzhi po de dag skye ba ltar /
T07TD4091E:221b-12: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa na spyod pa'i kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa skye zhing /
T07TD4091E:221b-13: de nas ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa skye la /
T07TD4091E:221b-14: de bzhin du mjug thogs su skye ba'i rim pas kun 'byung lhag ma la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:221b-15: kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa skye'o //
T07TD4091E:221b-16: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:221b-17: 'gog pa la chos shes pa skye la /
T07TD4091E:221b-18: 'gog pa lhag ma la yang rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang rjes su shes pa skye'o //
T07TD4091E:221b-19: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:221b-20: lam la chos shes pa skye la lam lhag ma la yang rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang rjes su shes pa skye ste /
T07TD4091E:221b-21: de ltar bden pa mngon rtogs la //
T07TD4091E:221b-22: sems de bcu drug / de ltar ni rim pa des na bden pa rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa de ni sems bcu drug tu 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:221b-23: sde pa gzhan gang dag bden pa rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa gcig go zhes brjod pa ltar na /
T07TD4091E:221b-24: de dag gi bsam pa brtag par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:221b-25: bye brag med pa ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:221b-26: bye brag tu dbye na ni de rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4091E:221b-28: mthong dmigs bya ba zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:221b-29: mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa ni zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyi bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:221b-30: dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni de dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:222a-1: rtogs pa ni mi ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang skye ba la sogs pas mngon par rtogs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:222a-2: sdug bsngal mthong ba na de'i mngon par rtogs pa rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4091E:222a-3: spang ba dang mngon du bya ba dang bsgom par bya ba'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:222a-4: kun 'byung la sogs pa ni bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:222a-5: de gal te bden pa rnams mthong bas mngon par rtogs par bya ba la mngon par rtogs pa gcig go zhes smra na ni rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir mi rigs par smra ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:222a-6: de ltar mngon par rtogs pa sems bcu drug par bshad pa gang yin pa /
T07TD4091E:222a-7: de ni chos mchog dang sa gcig //
T07TD4091E:222a-8: chos kyi mchog sa gang yin pa sems bcu drug pa de dag kyang sa de pa ste /
T07TD4091E:222a-9: de dag ni sa drug pa'o zhes sngar bshad zin to //
