T07TD4091E:238b-0: de spangs nas ni mi slob pa'i sems de yang @238b skyes pa dang rnam par grol ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:238b-1: skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang /
T07TD4091E:238b-2: 'jig rten pa'i sems gang yin pa de yang rnam par grol bar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
T07TD4091E:238b-3: nges par skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de nyid bshad do //
T07TD4091E:238b-4: gang las 'jig rten pa'i sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhe na /
T07TD4091E:238b-5: skye ba'i sgrib pa de nyid las /
T07TD4091E:238b-7: / rnam par grol ba la yang 'jig rten pa skye ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:238b-9: ci 'dra ba zhig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:238b-10: de ni nyon mongs pa'i rnyed pa dang bcas pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:238b-11: gnas skabs gang dag tu de skye ba'i sgrib pa spong zhe na /
T07TD4091E:238b-13: de yi sgrib pa rab tu spong //
T07TD4091E:238b-14: de ltar gyi zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07TD4091E:238b-15: rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas su bshad pa gang yin pa dang /
T07TD4091E:238b-16: khams gsum po spong ba'i khams dang /
T07TD4091E:238b-17: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams dang /
T07TD4091E:238b-18: 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag la khyad par ci yod ce na /
T07TD4091E:238b-19: 'dus ma byas nyid khams zhes bya //
T07TD4091E:238b-20: rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas de nyid khams gsum yin no //
T07TD4091E:238b-23: 'dod chags kyi spong ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams yin no //
T07TD4091E:238b-24: spong ba'i khams ni gzhan dag gi / yang dag par zad pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4091E:238b-25: 'dod chags las gzhan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi spong ba ni spong ba'i khams yin no //
T07TD4091E:238b-26: 'gog khams zhes bya ba bzhi rnams kyi /
T07TD4091E:238b-27: yang dag par zang pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4091E:238b-28: nyon mongs pa la ma gtogs pa bzhi rnams kyi spong ba ni 'gog pa'i khams yin no //
T07TD4091E:238b-29: dngos po gang gis yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po des 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ram zhe na /
T07TD4091E:238b-32: sdug bsngal rgyu bzod shes rnams kyis //
T07TD4091E:238b-34: sdug bsngal dang rgyu la bzod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:238b-35: shes pa nyid kyis yid 'byung bar 'gyur gyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:238b-38: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam la /
T07TD4091E:238b-39: bzod pa dang shes pa gang dag gis nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyis kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:238b-40: de ltar mu bzhi par 'grub ste /
T07TD4091E:239a-1: 'byung ba nyid ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la bzod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:239a-2: shes pa rnams kyis nyon mongs mi spong ba ste /
T07TD4091E:239a-3: yid 'byung ba'i dngos po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:239a-4: 'dod chags dang ma bral ba nyid ni 'gog pa dang lam la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa spong ba ste /
T07TD4091E:239a-5: mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:239a-6: gnyi ga ni snga ma dag gis nyon mongs pa spong ba'o //
T07TD4091E:239a-7: gnyi ga ma yin pa ni phyi ma dag gis nyon mongs pa spong ba'o //
T07TD4091E:239a-8: de la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig bden pa rnams la lta ba na /
T07TD4091E:239a-9: chos shes pa dang bzod pa dag gis nyon mongs pa mi spang ngo //
T07TD4091E:239a-10: ye shes rnams kyis ni sbyor ba dang rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam gyis bsdus pa dag gis mi spong ngo //
T07TD4091E:239a-11: chos mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel ba mdo dang mthun pa las lam dang gang zag bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas drug pa'o /
T07TD4091E:239a-13: // / bzod pa rnams zhes kyang 'byung shes pa rnams zhes kyang 'byung /
T07TD4091E:239a-14: yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes kyang 'byung /
T07TD4091E:239a-15: yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes kyang 'byung na /
T07TD4091E:239a-16: ci bzod pa dag yin la shes pa ma yin nam yang dag pa'i ye shes yin la yang dag pa'i lta ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:239a-17: dri med bzod rnams shes pa min //
T07TD4091E:239a-18: des spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas the tshom ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:239a-19: de dag yang dag par rtog pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir lta ba ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:239a-20: ji ltar bzod pa rnams lta ba yin gyi shes pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /
T07TD4091E:239a-21: zad dang mi skye'i blo lta min //
T07TD4091E:239a-22: zad pa'i ye shes dang mi skye ba'i ye shes kyang yang dag par rtog pa ma yin pa dang /
T07TD4091E:239a-23: yongs su tshol ba'i bsam pa can ma yin pa'i phyir lta ba ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:239a-24: de las gzhan 'phags blo gnyi ga / bzod pa zad pa'i ye shes dang mi skye ba'i ye shes dag las gzhan pa zag pa med pa'i shes rab ni lta ba yang yin ye shes kyang yin no //
T07TD4091E:239a-26: 'jig rten pa'i shes rab thams cad ni shes pa kho na yin no //
T07TD4091E:239a-27: lta ba drug / lta ba lnga dang 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba ste /
T07TD4091E:239a-28: 'jig rten pa'i shes rab rnam pa drug ni lta ba yin gyi gzhan ni lta ba ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:239a-29: shes pa ni de dang gzhan dag kyang yin no //
T07TD4091E:239a-30: ji snyed cig gis shes pa thams cad bsdus she na /
T07TD4091E:239b-2: shes pa zag bcas zag med ni //
T07TD4091E:239b-4: dang po kun rdzob ces bya'o //
T07TD4091E:239b-5: zag pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni /
T07TD4091E:239b-6: phal cher bum pa dang snam bu dang skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa kun rdzob la 'dzin pa'i phyir kun rdzob shes pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:239b-7: zag med rnams ni gnyis chos dang /
T07TD4091E:239b-8: rjes su shes pa nyid yin no //
T07TD4091E:239b-9: zag pa med pa'i shes pa ni chos shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:239b-10: rjes su shes pa rnam pa gnyis su dbye'o //
T07TD4091E:239b-11: shes pa de gnyis ni gsum du 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:239b-12: kun rdzob kyi shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:239b-13: chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:239b-14: kun rdzob yul ni thams cad do //
T07TD4091E:239b-15: kun rdzob shes pa'i dmigs pa ni ji ltar srid par 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad yin no //
T07TD4091E:239b-16: chos shes pa'i spyod yul ni /
T07TD4091E:239b-18: chos shes pa'i dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang de kun 'byung dang /
T07TD4091E:239b-19: 'gog pa dang lam rnams yin no //
T07TD4091E:239b-20: rjes su shes pa'i spyod yul gong ma'i sdug bsngal sogs /
T07TD4091E:239b-21: rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang de kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam rnams yin no //
T07TD4091E:239b-22: de dag nyid bden bye brag gis //
T07TD4091E:239b-24: chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa de dag nyid bden pa'i bye brag gis /
T07TD4091E:239b-25: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:239b-27: de dag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:239b-29: mi skye ba dang zad ye shes //
T07TD4091E:239b-30: chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa rnam pa bzhi bzhi po de dag ni lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin ba ni zad pa'i ye shes dang mi skye ba'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:239b-31: de gnyis dang po skyes pa ni //
T07TD4091E:239b-32: sdug bsngal rgyu shes zhes pa'o //
T07TD4091E:239b-33: zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes dang po skyes pa ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:239b-34: srid pa'i rtse mo'i phung po la sdug bsngal ba dad kun 'byung ba'i rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:239b-35: bzhi las gzhan gyi sems rig pa //
T07TD4091E:239b-36: rig pas na rig pa ste shes pa'o //
T07TD4091E:239b-37: gzhan gyi sems shes pa ni chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:239b-39: kun rdzob shes pa dang shes pa bzhi las skye bar blta'o //
T07TD4091E:239b-40: de'i nges pa ni 'di yin te /
T07TD4091E:239b-41: de ni sa dbang gang zag 'das //
T07TD4091E:240a-2: sa 'das pa ni bsam gtan gong ma'i sa pas bsam gtan gong ma'i sa pa mi shes pa'o //
T07TD4091E:240a-3: dbang po 'das pa ni dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam mi shes pa'o //
T07TD4091E:240a-4: gang zag 'das pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba dang /
T07TD4091E:240a-5: dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang /
T07TD4091E:240a-6: sangs rgyas rnams 'og mas gong ma mi shes pa'o //
T07TD4091E:240a-7: zhig pa dang ma skyes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa mi shes pa ste /
T07TD4091E:240a-8: yul da ltar yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:240a-10: chos rjes phyogs blo phan tshun min /
T07TD4091E:240a-11: chos shes pa'i phyogs kyi sems ni rjes su shes pas mi shes la rjes su shes pa'i phyogs kyang chos shes pas mi shes te /
T07TD4091E:240a-12: de gnyis ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /
T07TD4091E:240a-13: khams gong ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa'i phyir phan tshun rgyab kyis bltas pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:240a-14: mthong ba'i lam la gzhan gyi sems shes pa med do //
T07TD4091E:240a-15: de'i dmigs pa ni yod de /
T07TD4091E:240a-16: de la pha rol gyi sems shes pas mthong ba'i lam shes par 'dod pas sbyor ba byas na dang po'i /
T07TD4091E:240a-17: mthong ba'i skad cig gnyis nyan thos //
T07TD4091E:240a-18: rigs ste bse ru lta bu gsum //
T07TD4091E:240a-19: sangs rgyas sbyor ba med pa kun //
T07TD4091E:240a-20: nyan thos kyis pha rol gyi sems shes pas ni mthong ba'i lam las /
T07TD4091E:240a-21: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:240a-23: skad cig ma gnyis shes so //
T07TD4091E:240a-24: rjes su shes pa'i phyogs kyang dmigs pa ni sbyor ba gzhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ji srid du de la sbyor ba rtsom pa de srid du sems bcu drug rjes su 'thob par 'gyur gyi bar ma dor ni mi shes so //
T07TD4091E:240a-25: rang sangs rgyas kyis ni dang po'i gnyis dang brgyad pa kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:240a-26: skad cig ma gsum shes te sbyor ba chung ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:240a-27: kha cig na re dang po dang gnyis pa dang bco lnga pa rnams shes so zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:240a-28: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sbyor ba med par mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma thams cad mkhyen to //
T07TD4091E:240a-29: yang zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes gnyis la khyad par ci yod ce na /
T07TD4091E:240a-30: zad pa'i ye shes bden rnams la //
T07TD4091E:240a-31: yongs shes la sogs nges pa'o //
T07TD4091E:240a-32: yongs shes byar med ces la sogs //
T07TD4091E:240b-0: mi skye ba yi blor @240b 'dod do //
T07TD4091E:240b-1: zad pa'i ye shes gang zhe na /
T07TD4091E:240b-2: bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes so zhes bya ba dang /
T07TD4091E:240b-5: lam bsgoms so zhes bya bar shes pa de'i rgyu las 'byung ba'i shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:240b-10: mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa ste /
T07TD4091E:240b-11: de ni zad pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:240b-12: mi skye ba'i ye shes gang zhe na /
T07TD4091E:240b-13: bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa yang shes par byar med do zhes bya bar shes pa nas /
T07TD4091E:240b-14: bdag gis lam yongs su bsgoms pas yongs su sgom par byar med do zhes bya ba'i bar du shes pa de'i rgyu las byung ba'i zhes bya ba bstan bcos las rgyas par 'byung ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:240b-15: ji ltar na zag pa med pa'i shes pas de ltar shes she na /
T07TD4091E:240b-16: kha che ba rnams na re bstan bcos las 'di skad du /
T07TD4091E:240b-17: langs pa'i rjes la thob pas de ltar shes te /
T07TD4091E:240b-18: de'i phyir de'i bye brag gis de gnyis ni khyad par du bstan to zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:240b-19: de ltar na de dag ni shes pa bcur 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:240b-20: 'di lta ste chos shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:240b-23: gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:240b-30: de la kun rdzob shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la /
T07TD4091E:240b-32: chos shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bdun gyi phyogs yin te /
T07TD4091E:240b-33: rjes su shes pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4091E:240b-34: sdug bsngal shes pa ni shes ba gcig yin la /
T07TD4091E:240b-37: 'gog pa shes pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4091E:240b-38: lam shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la lnga'i phyogs yin no //
T07TD4091E:240b-39: gzhan gyi sems shes pa ni gcig yin la bzhi'i phyogs yin no //
T07TD4091E:240b-40: zad pa shes pa ni gcig yin la drug gi cha yin te /
T07TD4091E:240b-41: mi skye ba shes pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4091E:240b-42: ci'i phyir de dag gsum yod la bcur rnam par gzhag ce na /
T07TD4091E:240b-43: rang bzhin dang ni gnyen po dang //
T07TD4091E:240b-44: rnam pa rnams dang spyod yul dang //
T07TD4091E:240b-45: rab sbyor bya ba byas nyid dang //
T07TD4091E:240b-46: rgyu rgyas pa las bcu yin te //
T07TD4091E:241a-1: rnam par gzhag go zhes grag ste /
T07TD4091E:241a-2: rang bzhin las kun rdzob kyi shes pa yin gyi /
T07TD4091E:241a-3: don dam pa shes pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:241a-4: gnyen po las ni chos dang rjes su shes pa dag yin te /
T07TD4091E:241a-6: khams gong ma'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:241a-7: rnam pa las ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung shes pa dag yin te /
T07TD4091E:241a-8: dmigs pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:241a-9: rnam pa dang dmigs pa las ni 'gog pa dang lam shes pa dag yin te /
T07TD4091E:241a-10: rnam pa dang dmigs pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:241a-11: rab tu sbyor ba las ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa yin te ;
T07TD4091E:241a-12: des ni pha rol gyi sems las byung ba yang mi shes pa ma yin mdo [*mod?] kyi /
T07TD4091E:241a-13: sems shes par bya ba rab tu brtson pa la mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:241a-14: bya ba byas pa las ni zad pa shes pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:241a-15: bya ba byas pa'i rgyud la dang po kho nar skye ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:241a-16: rgyu rgyas pa las ni mi skye ba'i ye shes yin te /
T07TD4091E:241a-17: zag pa med pa thams cad kyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:241a-18: thams cad kyi gnyen po thams cad yin pa'i phyir chos shes pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen por bshad mod kyi /
T07TD4091E:241a-20: bsgom pa'i lam la 'gog pa dang //
T07TD4091E:241a-21: lam la chos shes gang yin te //
T07TD4091E:241a-22: khams gsum gyi ni gnyen po yin //
T07TD4091E:241a-23: 'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa bsgom pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa ni khams gsum char gyi gnyen po yin no //
T07TD4091E:241a-24: 'dod pa'i khams kyi rjes ma yin //
T07TD4091E:241a-25: thams cad du yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen po ni rjes su shes pa med do //
T07TD4091E:241a-26: shes pa bcu po de dag las //
T07TD4091E:241a-27: chos shes pa dang rjes su shes //
T07TD4091E:241a-28: rnam pa bcu drug / de dag mdun nas bshad par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:241a-29: kun rdzob kyi de bzhin gzhan du yang /
T07TD4091E:241a-30: kun rdzob shes pa ni rnam pa bcu drug kyang yin la /
T07TD4091E:241a-31: chos shes pa thams cad kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir rnam pa gzhan dag kyang yin no //
T07TD4091E:241a-32: bden pa'i rang rang gi ni rnam pa bzhi sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams ni rang rang gi rnam par 'jug pa yin pas /
T07TD4091E:241a-33: re re zhing yang rnam pa bzhi bzhi yin no //
T07TD4091E:241b-0: @241b de bzhin gzhan gyi sems shes pa //
T07TD4091E:241b-1: dri med gzhan gyi sems shes pa zag pa med pa yang de bzhin du rang gi bden pa rnam pa bzhi yin pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhi yin te /
T07TD4091E:241b-2: lam shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:241b-4: shes bya'i rang gi mtshan nyid rnams /
T07TD4091E:241b-5: gzhan gyi sems shes pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:241b-6: shes par bya ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par gcod do //
T07TD4091E:241b-8: rdzas re re zhig spyod yul lo //
T07TD4091E:241b-9: gang gi tshe sems 'dzin pa de'i tshe sems las byung ba mi 'dzin pa gang gi tshe tshor ba 'dzin pa de'i tshe 'du shes mi 'dzin ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:241b-10: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bka' stsal pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4091E:241b-11: de gnyis cig car du 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:241b-12: gos dang dri ma gnyis cig car du mi 'dzin pa bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:241b-13: gzhan gyi sems shes pa bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:241b-14: lhag ma'i rnam pa bcu bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:241b-15: stong dang bdag med ma gtogs so //
T07TD4091E:241b-16: lhag ma zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes de gnyis ni stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam pa dag ma gtogs pa rnam pa bcu bzhi yin no //
T07TD4091E:241b-17: don dam pa yin yang bdag ni skye ba zad do //
T07TD4091E:241b-18: 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes 'di'i stobs kyis rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:241b-19: ci zag pa med pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa gzhan yang yod dam 'on te med ce na /
T07TD4091E:241b-20: re zhig kha che ba rnams na re /
T07TD4091E:241b-21: dri med bcu drug las gzhan rnams /
T07TD4091E:241b-23: zag pa med pa'i rnam pa bcu drug la ma gtogs pa ni med do zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:241b-24: gzhan yod ces bstan bcos las gzhan nyi 'og pa rnams na re ni yod do zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:241b-25: ji ltar rtogs she na bstan bcos las te /
T07TD4091E:241b-26: bstan bcos las 'di skad du mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa'i sems kyi 'dod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos dag shes sam zhe na shes te /
T07TD4091E:241b-27: rigs pas bskyed pa'i shes rab kyis mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal dang stong pa dang bdag med pa dang /
T07TD4091E:242a-0: rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab @242a * //
T07TD4091E:242a-1: tu skye ba dang rkyen dang de ni gnas yod do //
T07TD4091E:242a-2: de ni gzhi yod do zhes bya bar shes so zhes 'byung ngo //
T07TD4091E:242a-3: ci rnam pa bcu drug po de dag ming gi sgo nas yin nam /
T07TD4091E:242a-4: 'on te rdzas kyi sgo nas yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:242a-5: kha cig na re ni ming gi sgo nas bcu drug yin no //
T07TD4091E:242a-6: rdzas kyi sgo nas ni sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa ni bzhi yin la /
T07TD4091E:242a-7: kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam rnams la ni /
T07TD4091E:242a-8: rdzas re re yin pa'i phyir bdun yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:242a-10: rdzas kyi sgo nas rnam pa bcu drug / ces brjod do //
T07TD4091E:242a-11: de la rkyen la rag lus pas mi rtag pa'o //
T07TD4091E:242a-12: gnod pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal lo //
T07TD4091E:242a-13: bdag gir lta ba'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir stong pa'o //
T07TD4091E:242a-14: bdag du lta ba'i gnyen po yin pas bdag med pa'o //
T07TD4091E:242a-15: sa bon gyi tshul gyis na rgyu'o //
T07TD4091E:242a-16: 'byung ba'i tshul gyis na kun 'byung ba'o //
T07TD4091E:242a-17: rgyun chags pa'i tshul gyis na rab tu skye ba'o //
T07TD4091E:242a-18: mngon par grub pa'i don gyis na rkyen te /
T07TD4091E:242a-19: dper na 'jim pa'i gong bu dang 'khor lo dang the gu dang chu rnams 'dus pa las bum pa mngon par grub par 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
T07TD4091E:242a-21: me gsum zhi bar byed pa'i phyir zhi ba'o //
T07TD4091E:242a-22: gnod pa med pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o //
T07TD4091E:242a-23: skyon thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o //
T07TD4091E:242a-24: 'gro ba'i don gyi na lam mo //
T07TD4091E:242a-25: rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir rigs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:242a-26: yang dag par grub pa'i don gyis ni bsgrub pa'o //
T07TD4091E:242a-27: shin tu yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir nges par 'byin pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:242a-28: rnam pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
T07TD4091E:242a-29: shes rab rnam pa yang ci shes rab 'ba' zhig gis rnam pa gcod par byed dam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:242a-33: dmigs bcas bcas pas rnam pa gcod //
T07TD4091E:242a-34: shes rab dang gzhan dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gcod par byed do //
T07TD4091E:242a-35: yod do cog gi rnam pa gcod //
T07TD4091E:242a-36: gang cung zad yod pa de thams cad kyi rnam pa gcod do //
T07TD4091E:242a-37: de ltar bshad na shes rab ni rnam pa yang yin rnam par gcod par byed pa yin /
T07TD4091E:242a-38: gcad par bya ba'i rnam pa gang yang yin /
T07TD4091E:242a-39: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i gzhan ni rnam pa gcod par byed pa dang /
T07TD4091E:242a-40: gcad par bya ba'i rnam pa yin /
T07TD4091E:242b-0: dmigs pa @242b med pa ni bcad par bya ba'i rnam pa 'ba' zhig yin par grub po //
T07TD4091E:242b-1: gzhan yang shes pa bcu po de dag gi dge ba la sogs pa'i bye brag bstan par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:242b-2: dang po rnam gsum gzhan rnams dge //
T07TD4091E:242b-3: kun rdzob kyi shes pa ni tshigs su bcad pa'i dang bor 'don pa'i phyir dang po ste /
T07TD4091E:242b-4: de yang dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang rnam pa gsum yin no //
T07TD4091E:242b-5: gzhan ye shes dgu ni dge ba kho na yin no //
T07TD4091E:242b-6: dang po sa rnams thams cad dang //
T07TD4091E:242b-7: 'dod pa'i khams dag nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar dag na yod do //
T07TD4091E:242b-8: drug na chos shes bya chos shes pa ni bsam gtan bzhi dang /
T07TD4091E:242b-9: mi lcogs pa med pa dang /
T07TD4091E:242b-10: bsam gtan khyad par can dag na yod do //
T07TD4091E:242b-13: rjes su shes pa ni sa drug pa de dag nyid dang gzugs med pa gsum dag na yod do //
T07TD4091E:242b-14: de bzhin drug sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa rnams kyang bye brag med par ni sa dgu po de dag nyid na yod do //
T07TD4091E:242b-15: dbye na ni chos shes pas bsdus pa rnams ni drug na yod do //
T07TD4091E:242b-16: rjes su shes pas bsdus pa rnams ni dgu na yod do //
T07TD4091E:242b-17: gzhan yid shes pa bsam gtan na //
T07TD4091E:242b-18: gzhan gyi sems shes pa ni bsam gtan bzhi po kho na na yod kyi gzhan dag na ni med do //
T07TD4091E:242b-19: de ni 'dod dang gzugs lus la //
T07TD4091E:242b-20: gzhan gyi sems shes pa de ni 'dod ba dang gzugs kyi khams dag du mngon du byed do //
T07TD4091E:242b-21: chos shes bya ba 'dod lus la //
T07TD4091E:242b-22: chos shes pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi lus kho na la brten nas mngon du byed kyi gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag du ni mngon du mi byed do //
T07TD4091E:242b-23: gzhan ni khams gsum pa yi lus //
T07TD4091E:242b-24: gzhan yang gang dag cig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:242b-25: gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang chos shes pa ma gtogs pa rnams so //
T07TD4091E:242b-26: sa dang lus bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:242b-27: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsdu ba brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:242b-29: dran pa nye bar gzhag gcig ni //
T07TD4091E:242b-31: blo dang shes rab dang shes pa zhes bya ba de ni rnam grangs yin no //
T07TD4091E:242b-33: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-0: gzhan gyi sems shes pa ni tshor ba dang sems dang chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang gsum yin @243a * //
T07TD4091E:243a-2: / lhag ma rnams bzhi yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-3: 'gog pa shes pa dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa dag las gzhan pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-4: shes pa gang gis dmigs pa ni /
T07TD4091E:243a-5: shes pa du dag cig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:243a-6: chos blo'i spyod yul dgu yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-7: chos shes pa'i dmigs pa ni rjes su shes pa ma gtogs pa shes pa dgu yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-8: lam rjes blo yi dgu yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-9: lam shes pa'i dmigs pa yang kun rdzob shes pa ma gtogs pa shes pa dgu yin la /
T07TD4091E:243a-10: rjes su shes pa'i dmigs pa yang chos shes pa ma gtogs pa dgu yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-11: sdug bsngal dang ni rgyu blo gnyis //
T07TD4091E:243a-12: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung shes pa gnyis kyis dmigs pa ni kun rdzob dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang gnyis yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-15: gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang zad pa shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:243a-16: mi skye ba shes pa rnams kyi dmigs pa ni shes pa bcu char yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-18: 'gog pa shes pa ste gcig gis dmigs pa ni shes pa med do //
T07TD4091E:243a-19: chos bcu dag ni sbyar bar bya //
T07TD4091E:243a-21: khams gsum pa dang dri med chos //
T07TD4091E:243a-22: ma byas rnam gnyis rnam gnyis so //
T07TD4091E:243a-23: 'dus byas kyi chos 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dag dang /
T07TD4091E:243a-24: zag pa med pa rnams las mtshungs par ldan pa dang /
T07TD4091E:243a-25: ldan pa ma yin par dbye ba'i sgo nas rnam pa brgyad du bya'o //
T07TD4091E:243a-26: 'dus ma byas la dge ba dang lung du ma bstan par dbye ba'i sgo nas rnam pa gnyis su byas te /
T07TD4091E:243a-27: de ltar na chos bcu yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-28: chos bcu po de dag ji ltar sbyar bar bya zhe na /
T07TD4091E:243a-29: shes pa gang gis dmigs pa ni chos du zhig yin zhes sbyar bar bya ste /
T07TD4091E:243a-30: de la kun rdzob shes pa'i dmigs pa ni chos bcu po thams cad yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-31: chos shes pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa dang bzhi dang 'dus ma byas dge ba dang lnga yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-32: rjes su shes pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa drug dang 'dus ma byas dge ba dang bdun yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-33: sdug bsngal kun 'byung shes pa gnyis kyi ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dag dang drug yin no //
T07TD4091E:243a-34: 'gog pa shes pa'i ni 'dus ma byas dge ba gcig kho na yin no //
T07TD4091E:243b-0: @243b lam shes pa'i ni zag pa med pa gnyis yin no //
T07TD4091E:243b-1: gzhan gyi sems shes pa ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa mtshungs par ldan pa gsum yin no //
T07TD4091E:243b-2: zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa gnyis kyi dmigs pa ni 'dus ma byas lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs pa chos dgu yin no //
T07TD4091E:243b-3: chos shes pa gcig gis chos thams cad shes pa yod dam zhe na med do //
T07TD4091E:243b-4: 'on kyang kun rdzob gcig ste rang chogs las /
T07TD4091E:243b-5: gzhan ni bdag med nyid du rig / kun rdzob shes pa ni rang gi tshogs las gzhan pa'i chos thams cad bdag med par shes so //
T07TD4091E:243b-6: rang gi ngo bo dang de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni de'i rang dang tshogs yin la /
T07TD4091E:243b-7: yul dang yul can tha dad pa dang /
T07TD4091E:243b-8: dmigs pa de gcig pa dang shin tu nye ba'i phyir de dag la ni mi 'dzin to //
T07TD4091E:243b-9: de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa ni mnyam pa dang bsams pa las byung ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:243b-10: gzugs na spyod pa ni mnyam pa las byung ba yin gyi /
T07TD4091E:243b-11: bsgoms pa las byung ba ni ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:243b-12: de ni sa rnam par chad pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:243b-16: gang zhig shes pa du dang ldan //
T07TD4091E:243b-17: zhes bya ba brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:243b-18: re zhig so so'i skye bo ni kun rdzob shes pa gcig kho na dang ldan no //
T07TD4091E:243b-19: 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang yang ldan no //
T07TD4091E:243b-21: zag med skad cig dang po la //
T07TD4091E:243b-22: chags can shes pa gcig dang ldan //
T07TD4091E:243b-23: 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang ma bral ba zhig yin na /
T07TD4091E:243b-24: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dag la kun rdzob shes pa gcig kho na dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:243b-26: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa la ni kun rdzob shes pa dang chos shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:243b-27: sdug bsngal shes pa dang gsum dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:243b-29: bzhi la re re 'phel dang ldan //
T07TD4091E:243b-30: de yan chad skad cig ma bzhi la ni de la shes pa re re 'phel bar shes par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:243b-31: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa la ni rjes su shes pa 'phel la /
T07TD4091E:243b-32: kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa rnams 'phel bas /
T07TD4091E:243b-33: de ltar na lam la chos shes pa la shes pa bdun dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:244a-0: 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni thams cad du lhag par gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang ldan par rig @244a * //
T07TD4091E:244a-2: yang gnas skabs gang dag tu shes pa du dag cig gi thob pa skye zhe na /
T07TD4091E:244a-3: mthong la bzod pa ye shes rnams //
T07TD4091E:244a-5: mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa 'am shes pa gang dang gang skyes pa de'i rigs can ma 'ongs pa de'i rnam pa bzhi kho na'i thob pa skye'o //
T07TD4091E:244a-6: ci'i phyir mthong ba'i lam la shes pa ris mthun pa'i rnam pa kho na'i thob pa skye zhe na /
T07TD4091E:244a-7: rigs rnams ma thob pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:244a-8: de nyid la ni kun rdzob kyang /
T07TD4091E:244a-10: mthong ba'i lam de nyid la kun rdzob shes pa yang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa gsum dag la thob pa skye'o //
T07TD4091E:244a-11: bden pa zad par ma rtogs pa'i phyir chos shes pa dag la ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:244a-13: mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes zhes bya //
T07TD4091E:244a-14: de nyid phyir de ni bden pa re re mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes la thob pa skye ba'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes las thob pa'i shes pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:244a-15: ci'i phyir lam la rjes su shes pa la thob pa mi skye zhe na /
T07TD4091E:244a-16: lam gyi bde ba ni sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis mngon par rtogs pa ma yin pa dang /
T07TD4091E:244a-17: zad par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:244a-18: sdug bsngal ril gyis yongs su shes par bya ba dang /
T07TD4091E:244a-19: kun 'byung spang bar bya ba dang /
T07TD4091E:244a-20: 'gog pa la mngon du bya bar mi nus kyi lam ni zad par bsgom par mi nus par mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir de la mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes las thob pa'i thob pa mi skye'o //
T07TD4091E:244a-21: ji mngon par rtogs pa'i las thob pa kun rdzob shes pa de /
T07TD4091E:244a-22: res 'ga' zhig na mngon du byed dam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:244a-25: de ni mi skye'i chos can yin //
T07TD4091E:244a-26: ji ltar na de'i thob pa skyes pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:244a-27: ma thob pa las thob pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:244a-28: sa du ba'i shes pa de'i thob pa skye zhe na /
T07TD4091E:244a-30: mthong ba'i lam sa gang pa'i yin //
T07TD4091E:244a-31: sa de ba dang sa 'og ma pa'i kun rdzob shes pa'i thob pa skye ste gal te mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa zhig yin na ni /
T07TD4091E:244a-32: mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa dang /
T07TD4091E:244a-34: sa gnyis pa'i thob pa skye la /
T07TD4091E:244a-35: de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi pa'i mthong ba'i lam yin na ni /
T07TD4091E:244a-36: sa bdun pa'i kun rdzob shes pa'i thob pa skye ba'i bar du'o //
T07TD4091E:244a-37: yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni du dag cig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:244b-1: 'gog pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i kun rdzob shes pa yang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tha ma ste /
T07TD4091E:244b-2: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:244b-3: gcig yongs su brtags pas lhag ma ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char yin no zhes bya bar grub po //
T07TD4091E:244b-4: mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes las thob pa kun rdzob shes pa de ni /
T07TD4091E:244b-6: bden pa gang zhig mngon par rtogs nas thob pa de ni bden pa de nyid kyi rnam pa yin la /
T07TD4091E:244b-7: de'i rnam pa'o zhes smos pas de'i dmigs pa yang bden pa de nyid yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:244b-8: de ni mthong ba'i lam thob pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:244b-10: sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T07TD4091E:244b-11: 'khor dang bcas par smos na ni 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i phung po bzhi dang lnga'i rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4091E:244b-12: chags bcas bcu drug pa las drug /'thob pa skye zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4091E:244b-13: 'dod chags dang ma bral ba zhig yin na bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa la /
T07TD4091E:244b-14: lam shes pa dang lam la rjes su shes pa gnyis ni da ltar byung ba yin la /
T07TD4091E:244b-15: chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:244b-16: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:244b-17: ma 'ongs pa drug gi ni thob pa skye'o //
T07TD4091E:244b-18: 'dod la chags dang bral la bdun /
T07TD4091E:244b-19: 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni bdun pa gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i thob pa yang skye'o //
T07TD4091E:244b-20: de yi gong ma sgom lam la //

T07TD4091E:245a-2: shes pa bdun gyi thob pa skye'o //

T07TD4091E:245a-14: sa bdun las 'dod chags dang bral ba las kyang gong ma srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad pa dag la ni /
