T07TD4091E:248a-22: gzhan dag na re rgyur byas pa'i gzugs bdun las don gzhan du gyur pa zhig yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:248a-24: mi 'jigs pa ni rnam bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:248a-25: mdo las ji skad du 'byung ba bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:248a-26: mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag kyang /
T07TD4091E:248a-27: ci ltar dang po bcu pa dang /
T07TD4091E:248a-28: gnyis pa bdun pa'i stobs yin no //
T07TD4091E:248a-29: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa stobs ji lta bar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa de yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:248a-30: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar zag pa zad par gyur pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa de yang de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4091E:248a-31: las bdag gir bya ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar /
T07TD4091E:248a-32: ngas gang dag nyan thos rnams la bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos su gsungs pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs ba de dang 'dra'o //
T07TD4091E:248a-33: kun du 'gor ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar ngas gang nyan thos rnams kyi nges par 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:248b-0: @248b ji ltar na mkhyen pa nyid mi 'jigs pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:248b-1: mi skrag pa ni mi 'jigs pa yin la /
T07TD4091E:248b-2: de dag gi ni mi skrag par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:248b-3: shes par byas pa ni mi 'jigs pa yin par rigs kyi shes pa nyid ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:248b-4: 'khor gyi bye brag las dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum du 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:248b-5: mdo las ji skad du 'byung ba bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:248b-7: dran dang shes rab bdag nyid gsum //
T07TD4091E:248b-8: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum po de dag gis ni dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi rang bzhin te /
T07TD4091E:248b-9: gang gi tshe nyan thos gus par nyan pa'am mi nyan pa'am gnyi ga la kun tu dgyes pa'am /
T07TD4091E:248b-10: kun nas mnar sems su yang mi 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:248b-11: ci'i phyir de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zhes bya zhe na /
T07TD4091E:248b-12: sngon gyi gnas bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:248b-13: yang na nyan thos rnams gang gi yin pa de la gus par nyan pa'am gus par mi nyan pa'am /
T07TD4091E:248b-14: gnyi ga la ni shin tu yang yid bde ba la sogs pa'i go skabs su 'gyur gyi gzhan dag la ni de lta ma yin na /
T07TD4091E:248b-15: de la de mi skye ba ya mtshan du rnam par gzhag gi /
T07TD4091E:248b-16: gzhan dag la ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:248b-17: de ni thugs rje chen po la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:248b-19: thugs rje chen po kun rdzob blo /
T07TD4091E:248b-20: thugs rje chen po ni kun rdzob shes pa'i bdag nyid yin no //
T07TD4091E:248b-21: gzhan du na sems can thams cad la dmigs pa yang mi 'grub pa /
T07TD4091E:248b-22: snying rje bzhin du sdug bsngal gsum gyi rnam pa yang ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:248b-23: 'di ci'i phyir thugs rje chen po zhes bya zhe na /
T07TD4091E:248b-24: tshogs dang rnam pa spyod yul dang //
T07TD4091E:248b-25: mnyam pa'i phyir dang ches che'i phyir //
T07TD4091E:248b-26: tshogs kyi ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen pos yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:248b-27: rnam pas ni sdug bsngal gsum gyi rnam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:248b-28: dmigs pas ni khams gsum pa'i sems can la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:248b-29: mnyam pa nyid kyis ni sems can thams cad la 'dra bar 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:248b-30: ches che ba nyid kyis ni de las ches che ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:248b-31: snying rje dang thugs rje chen po gnyis tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na /
T07TD4091E:248b-32: tha dad bya ba rnam pa brgyad //
T07TD4091E:248b-33: rang bzhin las ni zhe mi sdang ba dang /
T07TD4091E:248b-34: gti mi mug pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:248b-35: rnam pa las ni sdug bsngal gcig dang gsum gyi rnam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:249a-1: gcig dang khams gsum pa'i sems can la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:249a-2: sa las ni bsam gtan bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:249a-3: rgyud las ni nyan thos la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:249a-4: thob pa las ni 'dod pa'i khams dang srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:249a-5: yongs su mi skyob pa dang yongs su skyob pa yin pa'i phyir ba dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-6: mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs pa las thugs rje mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:249a-7: ci sangs rgyas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mnyam pa nyid yin nam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:249a-8: tshogs dang chos sku 'gro ba'i don //
T07TD4091E:249a-9: spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad dag /
T07TD4091E:249a-10: mnyam pa nyid de sku tshe dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-11: rigs dang tshad kyis ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:249a-12: sangs rgyas thams cad ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-13: chos kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-14: 'jig rten gyi don spyod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-15: rgyu gsum gyis mnyam pa nyid yin no //
T07TD4091E:249a-16: sku tshe dang cho rigs dang tshad du byas pa ni bye brag yod de /
T07TD4091E:249a-17: yun ring po dang thung dur 'tsho ba dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-19: bram ze'i rigs tha dad pa dang //
T07TD4091E:249a-20: 'od srungs dang sh'akya la sogs pa'i rigs tha dad pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-21: dus ji lta ba zhin du sku'i bod tshod che chung tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:249a-22: 'di lta ste phun sum tshogs pa gsum po //
T07TD4091E:249a-23: rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-24: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-25: phan pa phun sum tshogs pa de dag kho na yid la byed pa'i mkhas pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la /
T07TD4091E:249a-26: dga' ba dang bkur sti chen po bskyed par nus so //
T07TD4091E:249a-27: de la rgyu phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:249a-28: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la goms pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-29: yun ring po nas goms pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-30: bar chad med par goms pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-31: gus par byas te goms pa'o //
T07TD4091E:249a-32: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa la yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:249a-33: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-34: spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-35: mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249a-36: gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:249a-37: phan pa phun sum tshogs pa la yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:249a-38: ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba las shin tu nges par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa'am /
T07TD4091E:249a-39: theg pa gsum dang bde 'gro la 'god par byed pas phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:249b-0: de la ye shes phun sum tshogs @249b pa la yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:249b-1: ma bstan par mkhyen pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249b-3: thams cad du mkhyen pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249b-5: spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:249b-6: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249b-8: bag chags dang bcas te spangs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249b-9: ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:249b-10: mthu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:249b-12: yongs su bsgyur ba yin gyis rlob pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249b-13: sku tshe gtong bar byin gyis brlab pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249b-15: nam mkha' dang shin tu ring ba la yang myur du gshegs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249b-16: chung ngu chen por 'jug par mdzad pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249b-17: bdag nyid kyi ya mtshan gyi chos rnam pa du ma phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:249b-18: gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:249b-19: mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249b-20: dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:249b-22: sku rdo rje ltar sra ba nyid phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T07TD4091E:249b-23: de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid mdor bsdus pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:249b-24: de ni dbye na rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:249b-25: de yang gal te bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sku tshe bskal pa grangs med pa du mar byin gyis brlabs na ni mtha' dag brjod pa dang mkhyen par spyod do //
T07TD4091E:249b-26: de ltar na re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni ye shes dang mthu dang phan pa'i yon tan mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba rin po che chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no //
T07TD4091E:249b-27: 'on kyang byis pa rang gi yon tan dbul bas mos pa bcom pa rnams ni yon tan gyi 'byor pa de lta bu thob kyang sangs rgyas dang de'i chos la gus par mi byed kyi /
T07TD4091E:249b-28: mkhas pa rnams ni rkang yan chad nas /
T07TD4091E:249b-29: bcom ldan 'das de dang de'i chos la yid ches par 'gyur te /
T07TD4091E:249b-30: de dag ni de la dad pa tsam gyis gcig tu mngon par rab tu zhugs pas kyang rnam par smin par ma nges pa'i sdig pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan te /
T07TD4091E:249b-31: lha dang mi'i legs pa nyams su myong zhing mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:249b-32: de nyid kyi phyir 'bras bu med pa ma yin pa dang /
T07TD4091E:250a-0: @250a * // mtha' bzang bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:250a-2: gang dag rgyal ba rnams 'dren la //
T07TD4091E:250a-3: cung zad bya ba byed pa 'gyur ba'ang //
T07TD4091E:250a-4: mtho ris sna tshogs bgrod nas ni //
T07TD4091E:250a-7: re zhig de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya'o //
T07TD4091E:250a-8: chos gzhan slob ma dang thun mong sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gzhan rnams ni nyan thos dang yang thun mong yin la /
T07TD4091E:250a-9: kha cig so so'i skye bo dang /
T07TD4091E:250a-10: de dag kyang gang zhe na ci rigs par /
T07TD4091E:250a-11: nyon mongs med dang smon nas shes //
T07TD4091E:250a-12: so so yang dag rig mngon sogs //
T07TD4091E:250a-13: nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T07TD4091E:250a-15: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T07TD4091E:250a-21: zil gyis mnan pa'i skye mched dang zad par gyi skye mched la sogs pa'o ;
T07TD4091E:250a-22: / de la nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni /
T07TD4091E:250a-23: dgra bcom pa la la zhig sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni nyon mongs pa la rab tu skye ba dang /
T07TD4091E:250a-24: bdag nyid kyang yon gnas kyi khyad par yin par rig nas gzhan dag de la dmigs nas nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba yongs su spangs par 'dod de /
T07TD4091E:250a-25: ci nas gang gis gzhan dag thams cad kyi thams cad du nyon mongs pa skye bar mi byed cing /
T07TD4091E:250a-26: 'ga' yang de la dmigs nas 'dod chags sam /
T07TD4091E:250a-28: nga rgyal skye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes skyed par byed pa ste /
T07TD4091E:250a-29: lam de ni cung zad kyang nyon mongs par mi byed pas na nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:250a-31: nyon mongs med pa kun rdzob shes //
T07TD4091E:250a-32: de ni de'i rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4091E:250a-34: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:250a-35: bde ba bsgrub pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:250a-36: mi g-yo chos dgra bcom pa gzhan gyis ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:250a-37: gzhan dag ni res 'ga' bdag gi rgyud las kyang nyon mongs pa yongs su spong bar mi nus so //
T07TD4091E:250a-39: mi rnams kyi nang nyid dang /
T07TD4091E:250a-40: gling gsum dag tu skye bar byed do //
T07TD4091E:250a-42: ma skyes gzhir bcas spyod yul lo //
T07TD4091E:250b-0: de'i dmigs pa ni nyon mongs pa 'dod par gtogs @250b pa ma 'ongs pa gzhi dang bcas pa rnams yin te /
T07TD4091E:250b-1: ci nas kyang gzhan dag nyon mongs pa skye par mi 'gyur ba de ltar zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:250b-2: thams cad du 'gro ba rnams ni rang gi mtha' dag la dmigs pa'i phyir gzhi med pa'i nyon mongs pa ni spang bar mi nus so //
T07TD4091E:250b-3: nyon mongs pa med pa ji skad du bshad pa /
T07TD4091E:250b-4: smon nas shes pa de bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:250b-5: kun rdzob shes pa de yang bsam gtan tha ma pa dang /
T07TD4091E:250b-6: mi g-yo ba'i chos can rnams kyi dang /
T07TD4091E:250b-7: mi'i lus la brten pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:250b-8: de yi dmigs pa thams cad do //
T07TD4091E:250b-9: smon nas shes pa'i dmigs ba ni chos thams cad yin te /
T07TD4091E:250b-10: de ltar na de ni bye brag yin no //
T07TD4091E:250b-11: bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re //
T07TD4091E:250b-12: smon nas shes pa gzugs med par gtogs pa rnams ni mngon sum du mi shes kyi /
T07TD4091E:250b-14: rgyu mthun pa dang spyod pa'i bye brag gi sgo nas shes te /
T07TD4091E:250b-15: 'dir dpe ni zhing pa lta bu zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:250b-16: smon pa sngar btang nas shes pa ni smon nas shes pa ste gang zhig 'di shes par bya'o zhes smon nas rab kyi mtha'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug cing /
T07TD4091E:250b-17: ting nge 'dzin de'i spyod yul du ji tsam zhig gyur pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'o //
T07TD4091E:250b-18: de bzhin chos don nges tshig dang //
T07TD4091E:250b-19: spobs pa so so yang dag rig / so so yang dag par rig pa ni bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:250b-20: chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T07TD4091E:250b-21: don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T07TD4091E:250b-22: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T07TD4091E:250b-23: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
T07TD4091E:250b-24: de dag kyang nyon mongs pa med pa ji lta ba de bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:250b-25: de dag gi de bzhin zhes bya ba yang gang zhig ce na /
T07TD4091E:250b-26: mi g-yo ba'i chos can rnams kyi yin pa dang /
T07TD4091E:250b-27: mi'i lus la brten pa nyid yin gyi /
T07TD4091E:250b-28: de dag gi dmigs pa dang sa'i bye brag ni tha dad par brjod do //
T07TD4091E:250b-29: ming tshig don la thogs med shes //
T07TD4091E:250b-30: gsum po dag dang rim bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:250b-31: ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams dang don dang tshig la thogs pa med par shes pa ni rim pa bzhin du chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:250b-32: bzhi pa rig pa thogs med bar //
T07TD4091E:250b-33: brjod dang lam la dbang nyid la //
T07TD4091E:250b-34: thogs pa med par shes pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4091E:250b-35: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni rig pa dang /
T07TD4091E:250b-36: thags thogs med par brjod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:251a-2: rab tu gsal bar bya ba la thogs pa med par shes pa'o //
T07TD4091E:251a-3: de yi dmigs pa dag dang lam //
T07TD4091E:251a-4: de'i dmigs pa dag dang lam yin no //
T07TD4091E:251a-6: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'gog pa shes pa ma gtogs pa dgu'i rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4091E:251a-8: de ni ngag dang lam gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig la dmigs pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyis thams cad pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:251a-9: yang dag don rig bcu 'am drug / don so so yang dag par rig pa ni /
T07TD4091E:251a-10: gal te don chos thams cad yin na ni shes pa bcu yin no //
T07TD4091E:251a-11: gal te don mya ngan las 'das pa yin na ni chos shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:251a-14: zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:251a-15: kun rdzob shes pa rnams te /
T07TD4091E:251a-18: don so so yang dag par rig pa ni sa thams cad pa'o //
T07TD4091E:251a-20: gzhan chos dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa gnyis ni ming gi tshogs la sogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:251a-21: ngag la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir kun rdzob shes pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4091E:251a-22: chos rig 'dod dang bsam gtan na //
T07TD4091E:251a-23: chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni sa lnga po 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan bzhis bsdus pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:251a-24: de'i gong na ming gi tshogs med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:251a-25: ngag ni 'dod dang dang po na //
T07TD4091E:251a-26: ngag dang nges pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni don gcig go //
T07TD4091E:251a-27: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:251a-28: de'i gong na rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:251a-29: btags pa las ni so so yang dag par rig pa dag ni 'di skad du ston te /
T07TD4091E:251a-30: tshig dang yi ge dang de nyid kyi don dang /
T07TD4091E:251a-31: de nyid kyi gcig dang gnyis dang /
T07TD4091E:251a-33: pho mo la sogs pa'i tshig bla dags de dag la thogs pa med par bya ba'i phyir thogs pa med par shes pa ni chos la sogs pa so so yang dag par rig pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo //
T07TD4091E:251a-34: de nyid kyi phyir de dag gi rim pa ni de ltar grub bo //
T07TD4091E:251a-35: tshig nges pa ni nges pa'i tshig ste /
T07TD4091E:251a-36: dper na gzugs su rung bas na gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:251a-37: gzhan dag na re lan dang lan la spobs pas na spobs pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:251b-0: so so yang dag @251b par reg pa de dag gi sngar sbyor ba ni rim bzhin du rtsis dang /
T07TD4091E:251b-3: gtan tshigs rig pa dag yin te /
T07TD4091E:251b-4: de dag la mkhas par ma byas par de dag bskyed par mi nus so zhes grag go //
T07TD4091E:251b-5: de dag thams cad kyi sbyor ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' kho na yin no zhes brjod do //
T07TD4091E:251b-6: gang gis so so yang dag par rig pa gcig thob pa des gdon mi za bar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi char yang 'thob ste /
T07TD4091E:251b-7: ma tshang bar ni de thob med //
T07TD4091E:251b-8: so so yang dag rig pa de dag ma tshang bar thob pa can ni med do //
T07TD4091E:251b-9: de ltar na nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan bstan pa gang yin pa /
T07TD4091E:251b-10: drug po de dag rab mtha' yis //
T07TD4091E:251b-11: de dag ni rab gyi [*kyi] mtha' ba'i bsam gtan gyi stobs kyis 'thob bo //
T07TD4091E:251b-12: de ni rnam drug / rab kyi mtha' pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa de yang /
T07TD4091E:251b-13: nyon mongs pa med pa dang smon nas shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:251b-14: so so yang dag par rig pa gsum dang /
T07TD4091E:251b-15: rab kyi mtha' pa de nyid dang /
T07TD4091E:251b-16: drug gi bdag nyid yin no //
T07TD4091E:251b-17: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni /
T07TD4091E:251b-18: de'i stobs kyis thob pa yin gyi /
T07TD4091E:251b-19: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:251b-20: rab kyi mtha' zhes bya ba de ci zhe na /
T07TD4091E:251b-22: bsam gtan bzhi pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:251b-23: de ni sa kun rjes mthun zhing //
T07TD4091E:251b-25: ji ltar na sa thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:251b-26: 'dod pa las spyod pa'i sems las bsam gtan dang po yin la /
T07TD4091E:251b-27: de las ni gnyis pa ste /
T07TD4091E:251b-28: de bzhin du rim gyis 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar yin no //
T07TD4091E:251b-29: mi mthun pa ni yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can gyi bar du yin no //
T07TD4091E:251b-30: yang rjes su mthun pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar yin te /
T07TD4091E:251b-31: de ltar nas thams cad rjes su mthun pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:251b-32: ji ltar na 'phel ba'i mthar phyin pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:251b-33: de ltar bsgoms pa chung ngu las 'bring /
T07TD4091E:251b-34: 'bring las chen por snyoms par 'jug cing 'phel ba'i mchog tu byung ba ni /
T07TD4091E:251b-36: bsam gtan de lta bu ni rab kyi mtha' yin no //
T07TD4091E:251b-37: 'di ni mtha'i tha mar rab tu phyin pa tsam yin pa'i phyir te /
T07TD4091E:251b-38: 'dir mtha' zhes bya ba ni 'phel ba'am rnam pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:251b-39: mu bzhi zhes bya ba bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:251b-40: yon tan drug po de dag kyang /
T07TD4091E:251b-41: sangs rgyas las gzhan sbyor las skye //
T07TD4091E:252a-1: pa'i ni sbyor ba las byung ba yin gyi 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:252a-2: sangs rgyas kyis ni sbyor ba las byung ba cung zad kyang med do //
T07TD4091E:252a-3: de ni chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug yin pa'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:252a-4: yon tan mngon du bya ba thams cad ni bzhed pa tsam la rag lus pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:252a-5: de dag ni re zhig nyan thos dang thun mong ba'i yon tan yin no //
T07TD4091E:252a-6: mngon par shes pa la sogs pa ni so so'i skye bo dag dang thun mong yin te /
T07TD4091E:252a-7: mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba de yang ji ltar zhe na /
T07TD4091E:252a-8: mngon shes rnam drug rdzu 'phrul dang //
T07TD4091E:252a-9: rna ba yid dang sngon tshe dang //
T07TD4091E:252a-10: shi 'pho skye dang zad shes pa //
T07TD4091E:252a-12: rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:252a-18: zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'o //
T07TD4091E:252a-19: de ltar mngon par shes pa drug po de dag las lnga ni so so'i skye bo dang thun mong yin no //
T07TD4091E:252a-22: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhin du rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi /
T07TD4091E:252a-23: shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4091E:252a-24: bzhi ni kun rdzob shes pa ste /
T07TD4091E:252a-26: zag pa zad par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ma gtogs so //
T07TD4091E:252a-27: sems shes pa ni lnga yin no //
T07TD4091E:252a-28: sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ni chos dang /
T07TD4091E:252a-32: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang lnga yin no //
T07TD4091E:252a-33: zad pa'i mngon shes stobs bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:252a-34: 'di ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji skad du shes pa drug gam /
T07TD4091E:252a-35: bcu yin pa zhes bshad pa de bzhin du rig par bya la /
T07TD4091E:252a-36: de bzhin dus thams cad pa yin par yang shes par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:252a-38: lnga ni bsam gtan bzhi dag gi /
T07TD4091E:252a-39: mngon par shes pa lnga ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:252a-40: mngon par shes pa lnga po dag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa gang yin pa des sa de'am sa 'og mar 'gro zhing sprul par byed kyi gong du ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:252a-41: de bzhin du lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pas kyang rang gis pa kho na'am /
T07TD4091E:252a-42: sa 'og ma pa'i sgra thos kyi sa gong ma pa'i ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:252a-43: sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa'i mngon par shes pas kyang sa gong ma'i sems mi shes so //
T07TD4091E:252a-44: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas kyang mi dran no //
T07TD4091E:252b-0: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pas @252b kyang mthong ste /
T07TD4091E:252b-1: de gnyis kyi phyir gzugs med pa'i sa pa'i sems ni sa gong ma yin pa'i phyir sems kyi rnam pa dang sngon gyi gnas mngon par shes pa gnyis kyis mi 'dzin to //
T07TD4091E:252b-2: de dag ji ltar 'thob ce na /
T07TD4091E:252b-3: ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sbyor bas //
T07TD4091E:252b-4: thob ste 'dres pa chags bral bas //
T07TD4091E:252b-5: mngon par shes pa tshe rabs gzhan na goms pa zhig yin na ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob bo //
T07TD4091E:252b-6: bye brag can na ni sbyor bas 'thob po //
T07TD4091E:252b-7: de dag thams cad kyang sbyor bas bskyed par bya ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:252b-9: gsum pa dran pa nyer gzhag gsum //
T07TD4091E:252b-10: sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir tshor ba dang sems dang chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang gsum gyi rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4091E:252b-11: dang po rna ba rdzu 'phrul mig / mngon par shes pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4091E:252b-14: mig gi mngon par shes pa rnams ni gzugs la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i dngos po yin te /
T07TD4091E:252b-15: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T07TD4091E:252b-16: rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa'i dmigs pa ni sgra ma gtogs pa'i phyir skye mched bzhi yin no //
T07TD4091E:252b-17: lha'i rna ba dang mig gi mngon par shes pa'i dmigs pa ni sgra dang gzugs kyi skye mched yin no //
T07TD4091E:252b-18: ji ltar na 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pas 'di ltar sems can 'di ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan no zhes bya ba la sogs par shes she na /
T07TD4091E:252b-19: de ni des mi shes kyi 'phags pa rnams la de las gzhan pa gang gis de lta bu shes par 'gyur ba /
T07TD4091E:252b-20: mngon par shes pa'i 'khor du gyur pa'i shes pa skye'o ;
T07TD4091E:252b-21: / lhag ma dag ni nges par ma gzung ba'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:252b-22: dran pa nye par gzhag pa bzhi char gyi rang bzhin yin no zhes bya bar grub bo //
T07TD4091E:252b-23: mig dang rna ba'i mngon shes ni //
T07TD4091E:252b-24: lung du ma bstan lhag rnams dge / lha'i mig dang rna ba'i mngon par shes pa ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:252b-25: de dag ni mig dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes pa ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:252b-26: ji ltar de dag bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa par grub ce na /
T07TD4091E:252b-27: gnas kyi dbang gis de'i sa par bshad par zad pa'i phyir te /
T07TD4091E:252b-28: de'i mig dang rna ba ni bsam gtan bzhi char gyi sa pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:253a-0: yang na bar chad med pa'i @253a * //
T07TD4091E:253a-2: gzhan bzhi po dag ni dge ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:253a-3: mngon par shes pa de rnams las /
T07TD4091E:253a-8: zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba rnams ni mi slob pa'i rig pa gsum zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:253a-9: ci'i phyir de dag 'ba' zhig yin gyi gzhan dag ni ma yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:253a-11: ma rig pa rnams bzlog pa'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:253a-12: de dag ni rim bzhin du sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang bar dag la rmongs pa zlog par byed do //
T07TD4091E:253a-13: de dag las kyang don dam par /
T07TD4091E:253a-15: zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon du bya ba kho na mi slob pa'i rig pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:253a-17: rgyud las skyes phyir de zhes bya //
T07TD4091E:253a-18: gzhan gnyis ni mi slob pa'i rgyud las skyes pa'i phyir mi slob pa zhes bya ba'i mi slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa ma yin pa yang ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:253a-20: mngon par shes pa de dag slob pa'i yin par mi 'dod /
T07TD4091E:253a-21: gang gi phyir na ni slob pa'i rig pa zhes mi bya zhe na /
T07TD4091E:253a-22: slob pa 'dod de ma rig dang //
T07TD4091E:253a-23: bcas rgyud phyir na rig mi brjod //
T07TD4091E:253a-24: rgyud ma rig pa dang bcas pa bzhin du rig par rnam par gzhag pa rig pa ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:253a-25: yang nyon mongs pas zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:253a-26: mngon par shes pa de dag gi / dang po gsum pa drug pa ni //
T07TD4091E:253a-28: rdzu 'phrul dang sems kyi rnam grangs dang zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ni rim bzhin du rdzu 'phrul dang /
T07TD4091E:253a-30: rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang //
T07TD4091E:253a-32: dang po kho nar 'dul ba'i sems shin tu 'phrog par byed pa'i phyir cho 'phrul rnams yin pa'am /
T07TD4091E:253a-34: bar mar gnas pa rnams kyi yid yang dang yang du 'phrog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir na cho 'phrul rnams yin no //
T07TD4091E:253a-36: bstan pa mchog / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni mchog yin no //
T07TD4091E:253a-37: mi 'khrul phyir dang phan pa dang //
T07TD4091E:253a-39: rdzu 'phrul dang kun rdzob pa ni rig sngags kyis kyang byed de /
T07TD4091E:253a-40: sa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags gang gis nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang rtog byed ces bya ba'i rig sngags gang gis na gzhan gyi sems shes pa yang yod kyi /
T07TD4091E:253b-0: @253b yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su bstan pa ni gzhan du bya bar mi nus te /
T07TD4091E:253b-1: mi 'khrul pa'i phyir na de ni gtso bo yin no //
T07TD4091E:253b-2: de gnyis kyis ni gtod pa tsam du byed la /
T07TD4091E:253b-3: rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis ni phan pa dang yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i thabs ston pa'i phyir de nyid mchog yin no //
T07TD4091E:253b-4: rdzu 'phrul zhes bya brdzu 'phrul de ci yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:253b-5: bye brag tu smra ba'i lugs kyis ni /
T07TD4091E:253b-6: rdzu 'phrul ting nge 'dzin 'dis 'grub bar 'gyur bas ni zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T07TD4091E:253b-10: de las 'gro ba ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4091E:253b-11: lus mgyogs pa can dang mos pa can dang yid myur ba'o //
T07TD4091E:253b-14: yid bzhin du myur ba'i phyir te /
T07TD4091E:253b-15: yid myur gyis 'gro ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig gi yin gyi /
T07TD4091E:253b-16: gzhan dag gi ni ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:253b-17: yul shin tu thag ring por yang thugs bskyed pa tsam gyis byon pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:253b-18: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bka' stsal to //
T07TD4091E:253b-19: gzhan 'gro ba gnyis ni ma bshad kyang sangs rgyas la mnga' bar grub pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:253b-21: mgyogs pa can dang mos can yang /
T07TD4091E:253b-22: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lus mgyogs pa can gyis 'gro ba ni /
T07TD4091E:253b-23: bya ba bzhin du rim gyis lus mgyogs par 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:253b-24: mos pa can ni thag ring po la nye bar mos nas 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:253b-25: sprul pa rnam pa gnyis te 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:253b-27: de la re zhig /'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul pa ni /
T07TD4091E:253b-29: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa ni sgra'i skye mched ma gtogs pa gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4091E:253b-31: de yang bdag dang gzhan gyi lus dang 'brel ba'o //
T07TD4091E:253b-33: gzugs su gtogs pa'i sprul pa ni /
T07TD4091E:253b-34: de ni dri dang ro med pa'i phyir gzugs dang reg bya'i skye mched gnyis yin no //
T07TD4091E:253b-35: de yang de bzhin du rnam pa gnyis yin no //
T07TD4091E:253b-36: ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams dag gi sprul pa de rnam pa bzhi yin pa ltar /
T07TD4091E:253b-37: gzugs kyi khams dag gi yang de bzhin te /
T07TD4091E:254a-0: de ltar na mdor bsdu na @254a * //
T07TD4091E:254a-1: sprul pa ni rnam pa brgyad yin no //
T07TD4091E:254a-2: ji ltar na gzugs kyi khams su skyes pa 'dod ba'i khams na spyod pa sprul par byed pa na /
T07TD4091E:254a-3: dri dang ro dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhe na /
T07TD4091E:254a-4: gos dang rgyan bzhin du mi ldan no //
T07TD4091E:254a-5: kha cig na re skye mched gnyis sprul par byed do zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:254a-6: yang ci mngon par shes pa kho nas sprul pa sprul par byed dam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:254a-12: de dag rnams ni bcu bzhi'o //
T07TD4091E:254a-13: sprul pa'i sems bcu bzhi po de dag ni /
T07TD4091E:254a-14: bsam gtan 'bras gnyis nas lnga'i bar //
T07TD4091E:254a-15: rim bzhin bsam gtan dang po'i 'bras bu ni 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i sprul pa'i sems dang gnyis yin no //
T07TD4091E:254a-16: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i ni gsum yin no //
T07TD4091E:254a-17: de bzhin du bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi'i sa dag la yang bzhi dang lngar sbyor ro //
T07TD4091E:254a-18: bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu sprul pa'i sems ni ;
T07TD4091E:254a-19: rang gis pa dang sa 'og ma pa'i yin par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:254a-20: rim bzhin gong ma las skye min //
T07TD4091E:254a-21: bsam gtan 'og ma'i 'bras bu sa gong ma pa'i sprul pa'i sems ni med do //
T07TD4091E:254a-22: bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa dang /
T07TD4091E:254a-23: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa las 'gro ba'i sgo nas khyad par du 'phags so //
T07TD4091E:254a-25: sprul pa'i sems de dag gi rnyed pa ni bsam gtan bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:254a-26: yang ci sprul pa'i sems kho na las ldang bar 'gyur ram zhe na /
T07TD4091E:254a-30: skye ste sprul pa'i sems ni bsam gtan dag pa'am /
T07TD4091E:254a-31: sprul pa'i sems ni mjug thogs shig las skye'i gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:254a-33: sprul pa'i sems la skyang bsam gtan dag pa dang sprul pa'i sems skye ste /
T07TD4091E:254a-34: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:254a-35: ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu la gnas pa yang /
T07TD4091E:254a-36: ting nge 'dzin la ma zhugs par de las ldang ba ni med do //
T07TD4091E:254a-38: rang gis pas sprul bar byed /
T07TD4091E:254a-39: sa gzhan pa'i sprul pa'i sems kyis gzhan pa'i sprul pa ni sprul bar mi byed do //
T07TD4091E:254b-0: kyang gi sgras ni sa pas kyang smrar 'jug go zhes bya ba'i @254b tha tshig go //
T07TD4091E:254b-1: 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sprul pa ni /
T07TD4091E:254b-2: rang gi sa pa'i sems nyid kyis smrar 'jug go //
T07TD4091E:254b-3: de'i gong na rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pa'i phyir sa gong ma pa rnams ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pas smrar 'jug go //
T07TD4091E:254b-4: sprul pa mang po rnams smar 'jug go //
T07TD4091E:254b-5: ston min sprul ba bo nyid bcas //
T07TD4091E:254b-6: sangs rgyas las gzhan pa'i sprul pa ni sprul pa bo dang bcas te smras pa /
T07TD4091E:254b-7: gang gi tshe sprul pa mang po yin pa de'i tshe gang cig car du smra'o //
T07TD4091E:254b-8: tshigs su bcad pa las kyang /
T07TD4091E:254b-9: gcig gis smra bar byed pa na /
T07TD4091E:254b-10: sprul ba thams cad smra bar byed //
T07TD4091E:254b-11: gcig mi smra bar gyur pa dang /
T07TD4091E:254b-12: thams cad smra bar mi 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:254b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa ni snga phyi ji ltar bzhed bar smra'o //
T07TD4091E:254b-15: gang gi tshe smrar 'jug pa'i sems yin pa de'i tshe /
T07TD4091E:254b-16: sprul pa'i sems med na ji ltar na de smrar 'jug ce na /
T07TD4091E:254b-17: byin gyis brlabs nas gzhan 'jug phyir ;
T07TD4091E:254b-18: sprul pa gnas par 'dod pas byin gyis brlabs te /
T07TD4091E:254b-19: rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar /
T07TD4091E:254b-20: byed pa'i sems gzhan gyi ngag 'jug par byed do //
T07TD4091E:254b-21: ja gson po 'ba' zhig la byin rlabs rjes su 'jug gam 'on te shi ba la yang yod ce na /
T07TD4091E:254b-22: shi ba la yang byin rlabs yod //
T07TD4091E:254b-23: 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i rus pa'i rus gong gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:254b-25: mi bstan pa'i dngos po la ni byin gyi rlabs med de /
T07TD4091E:254b-26: 'phags pa 'od srungs chen pos sha la sogs pa la byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:254b-27: gzhan min gzhan dag na re de ni shi ba la byin gyi rlabs med kyi /
T07TD4091E:254b-28: rus ba'i rus gong gnas pa ni //
T07TD4091E:254b-29: lhas byin gyis brlabs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:254b-30: ci sems gcig gis sprul pa gcig kho nar sprul par byed dam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:254b-31: dbang po gcig ni du ma ste //
T07TD4091E:254b-32: byang bar gyur nas bzlog pa'o //
T07TD4091E:254b-33: dang po kho na'i sprul pa gcig ni sprul pa'i sems du mas sprul bar byed do //
T07TD4091E:254b-34: mngon par shes pa byang nas ni sems gcig gis kyang ji srid du sprul par 'dod par sprul pa du ma sprul par byed do //
T07TD4091E:254b-35: yang ci sprul pa'i sems thams cad lung dum bstan pa yin nam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:255a-2: bsgom pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de ni nges par lung du ma bstan pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:255a-3: skye ba las skyes rnam gsum mo //
T07TD4091E:255a-4: skye bas thob pa lha dang klu dang sha za la sogs pa'i sems ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:255a-5: de dag gis byas pa'i sprul pa /
T07TD4091E:255a-6: bdag dang gzhan gyi lus dang 'brel pa ni /
T07TD4091E:255a-7: sgra med pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched yin pa'i phyir skye mched dgu pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:255a-8: dbang po dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:255a-9: dbang po ni sprul par mi byed do //
T07TD4091E:255a-10: ci bsgoms pa las byung ba dang /
T07TD4091E:255a-11: skye bas thob pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam gnyis kho nar zad dam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:255a-13: sngags sman las las skyes pa dang //
T07TD4091E:255a-14: rdzu 'phrul rnam pa lnga yin no //
T07TD4091E:255a-15: rdzu 'phrul ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa lnga'o zhes brjod de /
T07TD4091E:255a-16: bsgom pa'i 'bras bu dang skye bas thob pa dang /
T07TD4091E:255a-17: gsang sngags las skyes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:255a-20: dper na nga las nu dang /
T07TD4091E:255a-21: srid pa bar ma pa rnams kyi lta bu'o //
T07TD4091E:255a-22: lha'i mig dang rna ba bshad pa gang yin pa de dag ci lha'i kho na yin no //
T07TD4091E:255a-23: 'on te byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T07TD4091E:255a-24: 'khor los sgyur ba'i khyim bdag rin po che rnams kyi bzhin du lha'i dang 'dra bas na lha'i zhes bya zhe na /
T07TD4091E:255a-25: lha yi mig dang rna ba ste /
T07TD4091E:255a-27: bsam gtan sa pa'i gzugs dang /
T07TD4091E:255a-28: bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa sgra dang snang ba la gtod pa'i sbyor bas bsam gtan gyis pa'i 'byung ba rnams rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang ba /
T07TD4091E:255a-29: gzugs dang sgra dag mthong ba dang thos pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i mig dang rna ba'i nyen kor du mngon par grub ste /
T07TD4091E:255a-30: de lta bas na bsam gtan gyis pa yin pa'i phyir mig dang rnam ba de dag ni lha'i kho na yin no //
T07TD4091E:255a-32: rtag dang brten bcas ma tshang med /
T07TD4091E:255a-33: thag ring phral sogs spyod yul //
T07TD4091E:255a-34: lha'i mig dang rna ba ni rtag tu rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir de'i brten pa dang bcas pa med do //
T07TD4091E:255a-35: nor ba med pa'i phyir dbang po ma tshang ba yang ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:255a-36: gzugs na spyod pa'i sems can bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:255a-37: de gnyis kyi yul ni gzugs dang sgra thar ring ba dang phra ba dang /
T07TD4091E:255a-38: bsgribs pa rnams kyang yin no //
T07TD4091E:255b-1: gang phyir sha yi mig gis gzugs //
T07TD4091E:255b-2: thag ring ba dang bsgribs pa dang //
T07TD4091E:255b-3: phra dang thams cad mi mthong la //
T07TD4091E:255b-4: lha yis mthong bar 'dod phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:255b-5: lha'i mig gis thag ji srid cig mthong zhe na /
T07TD4091E:255b-6: gang gi mig ji lta bu yin pa ste /
T07TD4091E:255b-7: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa med par stong gcig dang /
T07TD4091E:255b-9: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag mthong ngo //
T07TD4091E:255b-11: dgra bcom bse ru ston pa yis //
T07TD4091E:255b-12: stong gnyis gsum dang grangs med mthong //
T07TD4091E:255b-13: mngon par 'du byas na nyan thos chen pos ni stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag mthong ngo //
T07TD4091E:255b-14: bse ru lta bus ni stong gsum mthong ngo //
T07TD4091E:255b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ji tsam bzhed par 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag gzigs so //
T07TD4091E:255b-16: ci rdzu 'phrul 'ba' zhig skye bas 'thob pa yin nam /
T07TD4091E:255b-17: 'on te gzhan dag kyang yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:255b-19: lha'i rna ba la sogs pa bzhi yang skye bas 'thob pa yang yod mod kyi /
T07TD4091E:255b-20: skye bas thob pa'i ni cung zad kyang mngon par shes pa'i ming mi 'thob po //
T07TD4091E:255b-21: skye bas thob pa'i lha'i mig gang yin pa /
T07TD4091E:255b-23: srid pa bar ma mi mthong ngo //
T07TD4091E:255b-24: srid pa bar ma ni mngon par shes pa'i mig kho nas mthong gi skye bas thob pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:255b-25: sems shes de ni rnam pa gsum //
T07TD4091E:255b-26: skye bas thob ces bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4091E:255b-27: gzhan gyi sems shes pa skye bas thob pa ni /
T07TD4091E:255b-28: dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:255b-29: rtog dang rig sngags byas gang spang //
T07TD4091E:255b-30: gang dag rtog pa po'i pha rol gyi sems shes pa mtshan ma can rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:255b-31: rig sngags kyis byas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:255b-32: ji ltar bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu dge ba kho na yin pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:255b-33: gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /
T07TD4091E:255b-34: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa skye bas thob pa dag gis ni /
T07TD4091E:255b-35: dmyal ba pas ni dang po shes //
T07TD4091E:255b-36: ji srid du sdug bsngal gyis mnyen pa de sred du shes so //
T07TD4091E:255b-37: 'gro ba gzhan dag na gnas pas ni rtag tu shes so //
T07TD4091E:255b-38: mi las skye bas thob pa med //
T07TD4091E:256a-1: la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa rnams skye bas 'thob pa med do //
T07TD4091E:256a-2: 'o na rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran pa gang yin pa de ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4091E:256a-3: de dag gi ni las kyi khyad par las skyes pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:256a-4: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa ni /
T07TD4091E:256a-9: ye shes kyi dbang du byas nas /
T07TD4091E:256a-10: ye shes kyi rgyu las byung ba'i yon tan rnams ni bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:256a-11: chos mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel pa mdo dang mthun pa las ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas bdun pa'o /
T07TD4091E:256a-13: // / da ni rang bzhin gzhan rnams brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:256a-14: dang po nyid du yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir bsam gtan rnams las brtsams te /
T07TD4091E:256a-15: bsam gtan rnams ni rnam pa gnyis //
T07TD4091E:256a-16: bsam gtam rnams ni mdor bsdu na /
T07TD4091E:256a-17: skye ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis so //
T07TD4091E:256a-19: bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar ro //
T07TD4091E:256a-20: de la skye ba'i bsam gtan brjod //
T07TD4091E:256a-21: de 'jig rten pa'i mdzod kyi gnas su ji skad du bshad ce na /
T07TD4091E:256a-23: bsam gtan la ni sa gsum pa //
T07TD4091E:256a-24: bzhi pa la ni sa brgyad pa //
T07TD4091E:256a-26: snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan brjod par bya ste /
T07TD4091E:256a-28: snyoms 'jug dge ba rtse gcig ste /
T07TD4091E:256a-29: bye brag med par na dge ba'i sems rtse gcig par ni bsam gtan yin te /
T07TD4091E:256a-30: ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:256a-31: rjes su 'brang bcas phung po lnga //
T07TD4091E:256a-32: 'khor dang bcas pa ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:256a-33: yang dge ba'i sems rtse gcig pa'i bsam gtan dang po ni ji lta bu /
T07TD4091E:256a-34: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar ni ji lta bu zhe na /
T07TD4091E:256a-36: dpyod dang dga' dang bde dang ldan //
T07TD4091E:256a-37: dge ba'i sems rtse gcig pa'i bsam gtan dang po ni dpyod pa dang /
T07TD4091E:256a-39: bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan no //
T07TD4091E:256a-40: dpyod pa zhes smos pas rtog pa yang bshad pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:256a-41: lhan cig dpyod pa'i phyir du ba dang me bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:256a-42: rtog pa med par ni dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa med do //
T07TD4091E:256b-0: @256b yan lag lnga lnga spangs pa ni //
T07TD4091E:256b-1: dge ba'i sems rtse gcig pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T07TD4091E:256b-2: bsam gtan gnyis pa ni dpyod pa spangs pa la dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan no //
T07TD4091E:256b-3: gsum pa ni dga' ba spangs la dge ba dang ldan no //
T07TD4091E:256b-4: bzhi pa ni dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba spangs pa'o //
T07TD4091E:256b-5: bsam gtan rnams ni ji lta bar /
T07TD4091E:256b-8: de dag ni skye ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams pa gnyis kyang yin la /
T07TD4091E:256b-9: bzhi yang yin te de dag gi yang skye ba ni bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:256b-10: snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzugs med pa ni bye brag med par dge ba'i sems rtse gcig pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
T07TD4091E:256b-11: de ltar na rnam pa de dag gis so //
T07TD4091E:256b-12: 'khor dang bcas na ni phung po bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:256b-13: rjes su 'brang ba'i gzugs med pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:256b-14: 'og ma'i sa las dben las skyes //
T07TD4091E:256b-15: bsam gtan bzhi pa las dben pa las skyes pa ni nam mkha' yas skye mched yin no //
T07TD4091E:256b-16: de las dben pa las skyes pa ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched yin no //
T07TD4091E:256b-17: de las dben pa las skyes pa ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched yin no //
T07TD4091E:256b-18: de las dben pa las skyes pa ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched yin no //
T07TD4091E:256b-19: de ltar na gzugs med pa bzhi yin no //
T07TD4091E:256b-20: dben pa zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
T07TD4091E:256b-21: lam gang gis sa 'og ma las yid 'byung ba ste /
T07TD4091E:256b-22: 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:256b-23: gzugs med pa de dag kyang /
T07TD4091E:256b-24: gzugs dang bral ba zhes bya ste /
T07TD4091E:256b-25: nye bar bsdogs pa gsum dang bcas //
T07TD4091E:256b-26: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la dmigs pa'i phyir de ni gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral ba ma yin pas /
T07TD4091E:256b-27: gzugs dang bral pa zhes bya ba'i ming mi 'thob ste /
T07TD4091E:256b-28: ma bral zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T07TD4091E:256b-29: kha cig na re gzugs med pa dag na yang gzugs cung zad yod de /
T07TD4091E:256b-30: chung zad ser ba bzhin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:256b-31: phung po bzhi zhes bshad pa gnag yin pa de ni re zhig gzugs med pa dag na gzugs med do zhes bya ba'i bsgrubs pa bya ba yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:256b-32: gal te yod na ji ltar na gzugs med pa zhes brjod do //
T07TD4091E:256b-34: gzugs med ba na gzugs med do //
T07TD4091E:257a-0: da ni ji ltar na de nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi @257a * //
T07TD4091E:257a-1: gzugs bskal pa mi nyung ba zhig du gzugs rgyun chad pa las yang skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
T07TD4091E:257a-3: gzugs ni de'i rnam par smin pa'i rgyus yongs su bsgos pa'i sems 'du 'phrod rnyed pa las skye'o //
T07TD4091E:257a-6: ci nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa de dag nam mkha' la sogs pa nyid la dmigs pas de'i phyir ming de skad ces bya'am zhen ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:257a-10: spyir phyir nam mkha' mtha' yas dang //
T07TD4091E:257a-11: rnam shes mtha' yas ci yang med //
T07TD4091E:257a-12: ces bya nam mkha' mtha' yas so //
T07TD4091E:257a-14: chung [*cung] zad kyang med do zhes de ltar yid la byed cing de dag la rab tu sbyor bas de'i phyir de dag gi ming grangs bzhin du de skad ces bya'o //
T07TD4091E:257a-15: dman phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa'o //
T07TD4091E:257a-16: 'du shes dman pa'i phyir 'du shes med /
T07TD4091E:257a-17: 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya ba ste /
T07TD4091E:257a-18: 'du shes de ni gsal ba'ang ma yin la med pa kho na'ang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:257a-19: de ltar snyoms 'jug dngos gzhi'i rdzas //
T07TD4091E:257a-21: de ltar na snyoms par 'jug la dngos gzhi'i rdzas de dag ni 'di lta ste /
T07TD4091E:257a-22: bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:257a-25: bdun ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4091E:257a-26: srid pa'i rtse mo las gzhan pa bdun ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4091E:257a-27: ro myang ba dang dag pa dang /
T07TD4091E:257a-28: zag med rnams dang ldan pa'o //
T07TD4091E:257a-31: zag pa med pa rnams dang mtshungs par ldan pa'o //
T07TD4091E:257a-32: brgyad pa srid pa'i rtse mo ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T07TD4091E:257a-33: ro myang ba dang dag pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'o //
T07TD4091E:257a-34: zag pa med pa ni med pa nyid do //
T07TD4091E:257a-36: ro myang mtshungs ldan sred bcas te //
T07TD4091E:257a-37: ro myang ba ni sred pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:257a-38: 'jig rten pa yid dge ba ni //
T07TD4091E:257a-40: 'jig rten pa'i dge ba snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas ni dag pa zhes bya ste /
T07TD4091E:257a-41: ma chags pa la sogs pa dkar po'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:257a-42: yang ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems des ci zhig ro myang zhe na /
T07TD4091E:257a-44: snyoms par 'jugs pa dag la 'das ma thag pa de ni des ro myong bar byed de /
T07TD4091E:257a-45: ro myang bar bya ba gang yin pa de las ni langs pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:257a-46: gang gis ro myong bar byed pa de la ni snyoms par zhugs pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:257b-0: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas gang yin pa de ni zag pa @257b med pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:257b-1: snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas de dag las bsam gtan rnams ni yan lag dang ldan pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:257b-2: gzugs med pa rnams ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:257b-5: bsam gtan dang po la yan lag lnga ste /
T07TD4091E:257b-7: dga' bde ting nge 'dzin dang ldan //
T07TD4091E:257b-14: ting nge 'dzin ni yan lag kyang yin /
T07TD4091E:257b-16: lhag ma rnams ni yan lag kho na yin te /
T07TD4091E:257b-17: dmag gi yan lag bzhi ji lta bar bsam gtan gyi yan lag lnga yang de dang 'dra'o zhes grag go //
T07TD4091E:257b-18: gnyis pa'i yan lag dag dang ldan //
T07TD4091E:257b-19: dga' la sogs dang bzhi yin no //
T07TD4091E:257b-20: bsam gtan gnyis pa la ni yan lag bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:257b-21: nang rab tu dang ba dang /
T07TD4091E:257b-24: sems rtse gcig pa dang bzhi'o //
T07TD4091E:257b-25: gsum pa'i btang snyoms dran pa dang //
T07TD4091E:257b-26: shes bzhin bde dang gnas dang lnga //
T07TD4091E:257b-27: bsam gtan gsum pa'i yan lag ni btang snyoms dang /
T07TD4091E:257b-29: shes bzhin dang bde ba dang /
T07TD4091E:257b-31: gnas pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam grangs yin te /
T07TD4091E:257b-32: mdo las yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
T07TD4091E:257b-33: gang sems dang sems byung ba yang dag par gnas pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T07TD4091E:257b-34: tha ma'i bde min sdug bsngal min //
T07TD4091E:257b-35: btang snyoms dran dang ting 'dzin bzhi //
T07TD4091E:257b-36: tha ma ni bsam gtan bzhi pa ste /
T07TD4091E:257b-37: de'i yan lag ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang /
T07TD4091E:257b-38: btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang /
T07TD4091E:257b-39: rnam pa yongs su dag pa dang /
T07TD4091E:257b-40: ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa dang bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:257b-41: de ltar bsam gtan dang po dang gsum pa'i yan lag ni lnga yin la /
T07TD4091E:257b-42: gnyis pa dang bzhi ba'i yan lag ni bzhi yin pa'i phyir de dag ni bsam gtan gyi yan lag bco brgyad yin te /
T07TD4091E:257b-43: ming gi sgo nas de lta'o //
T07TD4091E:257b-44: rdzas kyi sgo nas bcu gcig go //
T07TD4091E:257b-45: rdzas kyi sgo nas ni bsam gtan dang po la ni lnga'o //
T07TD4091E:257b-46: gnyis pa la ni nang rab tu dang ba 'phel lo //
T07TD4091E:257b-47: gsum pa la ni btang snyoms dang /
T07TD4091E:257b-51: bzhi pa la ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'phel te /
T07TD4091E:257b-52: de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag gang dag yin pa de nyid gnyis pa'i yan lag yin nam zhes bya ba brjod na mu bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:258a-0: mu dang po ni rtog pa dang dpyod @258a * //
T07TD4091E:258a-2: / mu gnyis pa ni nang rab tu dang ba'o //
T07TD4091E:258a-3: mu gsum pa ni dga' ba dang /
T07TD4091E:258a-6: mu bzhi pa ni bshad pa lam gtogs pa'i chos rnams te /
T07TD4091E:258a-7: de bzhin du bsam gtan thams cad kyi yan lag rnams kyang phan tshun du sbyar bar bya'o //
T07TD4091E:258a-8: de'i phyir bsam gtan gsum po'i bde ba rdzas gzhan du brjod ce na /
T07TD4091E:258a-9: gang gi phyir de'i bde ba ni tshor ba yin la bsam gtan dang po gnyis kyis rab sbyangs te /
T07TD4091E:258a-10: bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i bde ba ni rab tu sbyangs pa zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:258a-11: nang rab tu dang ba zhes bya ba'i chos de ci zhe na /
T07TD4091E:258a-12: dad pa rab tu dang ba'o //
T07TD4091E:258a-13: de bas bsam gtan gnyis pa thob pa las snyoms par 'jug pa'i sa las kyang nges par 'byung bar yod par yid ches pa skye ba de ni 'dir nang rab tu dang ba zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:258a-14: dga' ba ni yid bde ba yin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de ji ltar rtogs gzhan ci zhig yin par 'gyur ji ltar sde pa gzhan dag 'dod pa rnams te /
T07TD4091E:258a-15: sde pa gzhan dag kyang ji ltar 'dod ce na ;
T07TD4091E:258a-16: dga' ba ni sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan khon na yin la /
T07TD4091E:258a-17: yid bde ba ni bsam gtan gsum pa dag gi bde ba yin par 'dod do //
T07TD4091E:258a-18: bsam gtan gyi bde ba yid bde ba yin par mi rigs te /
T07TD4091E:258a-19: lus rnam gnyis phyir dga' yin bde /
T07TD4091E:258a-20: rnam par bsgyur ba'i mdo las /
T07TD4091E:258a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan gsum pa bka' stsal te /
T07TD4091E:258a-22: 'dir 'di'i yid bde ba'i dbang po yongs su ma lus par dga' bar 'gyur zhes bka' stsal to //
T07TD4091E:258a-23: bsam gtan bzhi par ni bde ba'i dbang po 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to //
T07TD4091E:258a-24: yang 'di skad du bde ba yang spangs te /
T07TD4091E:258a-25: snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir yang bsam gtan gsum pa yid bde ba'i dbang po med de /
T07TD4091E:258a-26: de bas na dga' ba nyid yid bde ba yin gyi bde ba ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:258a-27: yang ci nyon mongs pa can gyi bsam gtan dag la yang 'di skad du bshad pa'i yan lag de dag yod dam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:258a-29: de dag la gang zhig med ce na /
T07TD4091E:258a-30: nyon mongs pa can la dga' ba de dang /
T07TD4091E:258a-31: rab dang shes bzhin dran pa dang //
T07TD4091E:258a-32: btang snyoms dran pa dag pa med //
T07TD4091E:258a-33: bsam gtan dang po la ni dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
T07TD4091E:258a-35: nyon mongs pa las dben pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:258a-36: gnyis pa la ni nang rab tu dang ba med de /
T07TD4091E:258b-0: nyon mongs pas rnyog pa'i phyir @258b ro ;

T07TD4091E:259a-39: nyams dang skye bas nyon mongs can //

T07TD4091E:259b-4: zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang po'i mjug thogs su ni rang gi sa pa dang /

T07TD4091E:259b-17: zag pa med pa dag dang brgyad skye'o //

T07TD4091E:259b-20: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /

T07TD4091E:261b-0: gzugs med dngos gzhi dge @261b rnams kyi //

T07TD4091E:261b-12: de nyid kyi gnyen po de nyid ma yin pa'i phyir rang gi sa pa yang ma yin khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir gong ma yang ma yin pas /
T07TD4091E:261b-13: dag pas kyang ma yin na nyon mongs pa can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T07TD4091E:261b-15: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i nyer bsdogs ni dag pas kyang nyon mongs pa rnams spong ste /
T07TD4091E:261b-16: sa 'og ma pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:261b-17: nyer bsdogs rnams kyang du zhig ce na /
T07TD4091E:261b-18: de dag la ni nyer bsdogs brgyad //
T07TD4091E:261b-19: re re la yang nyer bsdogs gang gis de la 'jug pa re re yin no //
T07TD4091E:261b-20: ci de dag kyang rnam pa gsum yin la //
T07TD4091E:261b-21: de dag gi tshor ba yang de dag 'dra'am zhe na /
T07TD4091E:261b-23: dag pa bde min sdug bsngal min //
T07TD4091E:261b-24: de dag ni dag pa yin zhing 'bad de dran par bya ba yin pa dang /
T07TD4091E:261b-25: sa 'og ma pa la yid 'byung ba dang ma bral ba yin pa'i phyir btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang ldan pa yin la /
T07TD4091E:261b-26: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:261b-27: ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni ma yin no ;
T07TD4091E:261b-29: nyer bsdogs kyi dang po mi lcogs pa med pa de ni dag pa 'di yin la zag pa med pa yang yin no //
T07TD4091E:261b-30: gal te nyer bsdogs kyi sems kyis nyid mtshams sbyor ba na /
T07TD4091E:261b-31: nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur yang mnyam par gzhag pa la ni nyon mongs pa can nyid dgag go //
T07TD4091E:261b-34: la la ni mi lcogs pa med par ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang yod do //
T07TD4091E:261b-36: bsam gtan khyad par can zhes kyang 'byung na /
T07TD4091E:261b-37: ci don gcig pa zhig yin nam 'on te don tha dad ca na /
T07TD4091E:261b-38: don tha dad de nyer bsdogs ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin la /
T07TD4091E:262a-2: bsam gtan la khyad par 'phags shing rtog pa dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa ni bsam gtan khyad par can yin te /
T07TD4091E:262a-3: de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa na khyad par du 'phags pa med pa'i phyir rnam par ma gzhag go //
T07TD4091E:262a-4: bsam gtan khyad par can de yang /
T07TD4091E:262a-6: ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang zag pa dang zag pa med pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:262a-9: sdug bsngal yang med pas na /
T07TD4091E:262a-10: bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa ste /
T07TD4091E:262a-11: btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07TD4091E:262a-12: mngon par 'du bya ba dang bcas pas dran par bya ba yin ba'i phyir dga' ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:262a-13: de nyid kyi phyir bsgrub par dka' ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:262a-14: bsam gtan khyad par can de'i 'bras bu khyad par can de gang zhig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:262a-15: 'bras bu tshangs pa chen po yin //
T07TD4091E:262a-16: bsam gtan khyad par can de bsgoms nas tshangs pa chen por 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:262a-17: yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mdor bsdus te /
T07TD4091E:262a-18: mdo las rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T07TD4091E:262a-19: rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T07TD4091E:262a-20: rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ting nge 'dzin gsum du bka' stsal te /
T07TD4091E:262a-21: de la re zhig bsam gtan khyad par can gyi rtog pa tsam zhig bkag pa'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:262a-22: rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin yin no //
T07TD4091E:262a-23: de man chad rtog dpyod bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin /
T07TD4091E:262a-24: bsam gtan dang po dang mi lcogs pa med pa ni /
T07TD4091E:262a-25: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:262a-27: de na gnyis po med pas na gnyi ga med pa ste /
T07TD4091E:262a-28: bsam gtan khyad pa can yan chad bsam gtan gnyis pa'i nyer bsdogs nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi ting nge 'dzin ni rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa'o //
T07TD4091E:262a-29: yang mdo las stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T07TD4091E:262a-30: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T07TD4091E:262a-31: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs te /
T07TD4091E:262a-32: mtshan med zhi ba'i rnam pa dang //
T07TD4091E:262a-33: 'gog pa'i bden pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan ma med pa ste /
T07TD4091E:262a-35: mya ngan las 'das pa ni mtshan ma bcu dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yin la /
T07TD4091E:262a-36: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
T07TD4091E:262b-0: mtshan ma bcu ni @262b yul lnga dang pho dang mo dang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid rnams so //
T07TD4091E:262b-1: stong zhing mtshan nyid stong nyid la //
T07TD4091E:262b-2: 'jug ste bdag med pa dang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin te /
T07TD4091E:262b-5: de las gzhan bden rnam dag dang //
T07TD4091E:262b-6: bden pa lhag ma'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te rnam pa bcu yin no //
T07TD4091E:262b-7: mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang de'i rgyu dag gis yid byung ba dang /
T07TD4091E:262b-8: lam yang gzings lta bur gdon mi za bar dor bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir la de'i rnam par dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T07TD4091E:262b-9: de dag las 'da' bar mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:262b-10: mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir stong pa dang bdag med pa dag gi ni yid 'byung ba ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:262b-11: ting nge 'dzin gsum po de dag ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T07TD4091E:262b-13: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yin pa'i phyir dag pa dag dri ma med pa dag yin te /
T07TD4091E:262b-14: 'jig rten pa ni sa bcu gcig na yod do //
T07TD4091E:262b-15: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang la lam yod pa dag na yod do //
T07TD4091E:262b-17: dri med rnam thar sgo gsum mo //
T07TD4091E:262b-18: ting nge 'dzin gsum po de dag dri ma med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo yin pa'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:262b-19: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
T07TD4091E:262b-20: rnam bar thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang /
T07TD4091E:262b-21: rnam par thar ba'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ste /
T07TD4091E:262b-22: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum zhes bya'o //
T07TD4091E:262b-24: stong nyid stong nyid zhes la sogs //
T07TD4091E:262b-25: gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gsum mo //
T07TD4091E:262b-27: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T07TD4091E:262b-28: smon pa med pa smon pa med pa dang /
T07TD4091E:262b-29: mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa ste /
T07TD4091E:262b-30: de dag ni stong pa nyid la sogs pa la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T07TD4091E:262b-31: gnyis ni stong dang mi rtag par //
T07TD4091E:262b-32: mi slob pa la dmigs pa yin //
T07TD4091E:262b-33: ting nge 'dzin gzhan gnyis ni mi slob pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dmigs te ;
T07TD4091E:262b-34: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mi slob pa'i ting nge 'dzin la stong pa'i rnam par dmigs so //
T07TD4091E:262b-35: smon pa med pa smon pa med pa yang mi slob pa'i smon pa med pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam par dmigs so //
T07TD4091E:262b-36: zag pa med pa'i ni de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal nyid du yang ma yin la /
T07TD4091E:263a-1: sogs par yang ma yin la /
T07TD4091E:263a-2: sun dbyung bar bya ba yin pa de'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa dag tu yang ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:263a-3: mtshan ma med pa mtshan med ni //
T07TD4091E:263a-4: zhi bar ma brtags zad pa la //
T07TD4091E:263a-5: mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa ni /
T07TD4091E:263a-6: zag pa med pa la so sor brtags te 'gog pa med pa'i phyir mi slob pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i so sor ma brtags par 'gog pa la zhi ba'i rnam par dmigs so //
T07TD4091E:263a-7: mi rtag pa dang 'gog pa thun mong yin pa'i phyir ba dang /
T07TD4091E:263a-8: lung du ma bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ba dang /
T07TD4091E:263a-9: bral ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'gog pa dang /
T07TD4091E:263a-11: nges par 'byung ba rnam pa dag tu ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:263a-12: ting nge 'dzin gzhan de dag ni gcig tu /
T07TD4091E:263a-14: 'phags pa'i lam la sdang ba yin pa'i phyir te /
T07TD4091E:263a-15: zag pa med pa ni de lta ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:263a-16: gang du skyed par byed ce na /
T07TD4091E:263a-18: mi dag gi nang kho nar skyed kyi /
T07TD4091E:263a-19: lha dag gi nang du ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:263a-22: dgra bcom pa gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:263a-23: sa du pa cig ce na /
T07TD4091E:263a-25: nyer bsdogs bdun ma gtogs pa gzhan 'dod pa'i khams dang mi lcogs pa med pa dang /
T07TD4091E:263a-26: bsam gtan khyad par can dang /
T07TD4091E:263a-27: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnams te /
T07TD4091E:263a-28: sa bcu gcig na yod do //
T07TD4091E:263a-29: yang ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa bzhi ste /
T07TD4091E:263a-30: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten cing goms par byas la /
T07TD4091E:263a-31: lan mang du byas pa mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba yang yod ces bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par 'byung ba'o //
T07TD4091E:263a-33: bde bar bya phyir ting 'dzin bsgom //
T07TD4091E:263a-34: dge ba'i bsam gtan dang po yin //
T07TD4091E:263a-35: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas bar bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ni dge ba'i bsam gtan dang po ste /
T07TD4091E:263a-36: dag pa'am zag pa med pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:263a-37: de dang po pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan dag kyang yin par shes par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:263a-38: yongs su nyams pa dag gong mar skye ba yang /
T07TD4091E:263a-39: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la /
T07TD4091E:263a-40: de med pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar tshe phyi ma la bde bar gnas bar bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:263a-41: mthong bya mig gi mngon shes 'dod //
T07TD4091E:263a-42: mthong bar bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ni lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:263a-43: blo bskyed bya phyir sbyor las skyes //
T07TD4091E:263b-0: shes rab rab tu bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ni khams @263b gsum pa'i yon tan zag pa med pa thams cad yin no //
T07TD4091E:263b-1: zag pa zad pa bsgom pa ni //
T07TD4091E:263b-2: rdo rje lta bu bsam gtan mtha' //
T07TD4091E:263b-3: zag pa dang bcas pa zad par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'o //
T07TD4091E:263b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos bstan pa 'di ni bdag nyid la nye bar gtong pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:263b-5: de'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi pa kho nar bka' stsal to zhes grag go //
T07TD4091E:263b-6: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi skabs su bab pa bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:263b-7: da ni ting nge 'dzin la brten pa'i yon tan rnams kyi skabs yin pas de dag bshad par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:263b-8: tshad med pa ni bzhi yin no //
T07TD4091E:263b-9: byams pa dang snying rje dang /
T07TD4091E:263b-10: dga' ba dang btang snyoms te /
T07TD4091E:263b-11: sems can tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:263b-12: ci'i phyir bzhi kho na yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:263b-13: gnod sems la sogs gnyen po'i phyir //
T07TD4091E:263b-14: gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba dang /
T07TD4091E:263b-16: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems mang ba de dag spang ba'i phyir bzhi po dang grangs bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:263b-18: byams pa ni zhe sdang med pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4091E:263b-19: snying rje yang de bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:263b-20: yid bde ba ni dga' ba yin //
T07TD4091E:263b-21: dga' ba ni yid bde ba'i rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4091E:263b-22: btang snyoms ni ma chags pa'i bdag nyid yin no //
T07TD4091E:263b-23: ci ltar na gnod sems kyi gnyen po yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:263b-24: de ni chags pas drangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:263b-25: byams pa la sogs pa de dag gi / rnam pa ni /
T07TD4091E:263b-26: kye ma bde dang sdug bsngal dang //
T07TD4091E:263b-27: mgu dang sems can zhes bya ba'o //
T07TD4091E:263b-28: kye ma sems can bde bar gyur cig snyam du yid la byed cing byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go //
T07TD4091E:263b-29: kye ma sems can sdug bsngal lo snyam pa ni snying rje'o //
T07TD4091E:263b-30: kye ma sems can mgu bar gyur cig snyam pa ni dga' ba'o //
T07TD4091E:263b-31: sems can no snyam du de ltar yid la byed cing btang snyoms par 'jug ste bar mar gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:263b-32: de dag gi rnam pa ni bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:263b-33: spyod yul 'dod pa'i sems can rnams //
T07TD4091E:263b-34: de dag gi dmigs pa ni /
T07TD4091E:263b-35: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can rnams yin te /
T07TD4091E:263b-36: de la dmigs pa gnod sems la sogs pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:263b-37: de dag sa du pa zhig yin zhe na /
T07TD4091E:263b-38: dga' ba bsam gtan gnyis dag na //
T07TD4091E:263b-39: dga' ba ni yid bde ba yin pa'i phyir bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dag na yod do //
T07TD4091E:264a-1: tshad med pa gsum ni sa drug po mi lcogs pa med pa dang /
T07TD4091E:264a-2: bsam gtan dang bsam gtan khyad par can dag na yod do /
T07TD4091E:264a-4: kha cig ni mi lcogs pa med pa ma gtogs pa sa lnga po de dag na yod par 'dod do //
T07TD4091E:264a-5: gnod sems la sogs pa'i gnyen po zhes bshad pa gang yin pa ci tshad med pa dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ram zhe na /
T07TD4091E:264a-6: de yis mi spong bsam gtan dngos gzhi'i sa pa yin pa mos pa yid la byed pa yin pa dang /
T07TD4091E:264a-7: sems can la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T07TD4091E:264a-8: de sbyor bas ni gnod sems la sogs pa rnam par gnon pa dang /
T07TD4091E:264a-9: spangs zin pa thag srid par byed pa'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:264a-10: de dag gi gnyen por bshad do //
T07TD4091E:264a-11: tshad med pa bzhi po de dag ni /
T07TD4091E:264a-12: mi dag gi / nang du bskyed de /
T07TD4091E:264a-13: mi dag gi nang kho nar bskyed kyi gzhan dag tu ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:264a-14: ci tshad med pa gcig dang ldan pa gang yin pa dag gdon mi za bar thams cad dang ldan nam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:264a-16: bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi par skyes pa dag / dga' ba dang ni mi ldan la //
T07TD4091E:264a-17: tshad med pa gsum gyi rnyed pa dang ni rtag tu ldan par 'gyur ro //
T07TD4091E:264a-19: gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa dad po yin no //
T07TD4091E:264a-20: nad gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:264a-21: sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te /
T07TD4091E:264a-22: rdzogs par byas nas gnas zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:264a-23: de dag dang gzugs med pa bzhi dang /
T07TD4091E:264a-24: brgyad pa 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'o //
T07TD4091E:264a-29: dang po gnyis ni rnam par bsngos pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir mi sdug pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
T07TD4091E:264a-30: de'i phyir de gnyis kyi tshul ni mi sdug pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:264a-33: bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dag yod kyi sa gzhan dag na ni med do //
T07TD4091E:264a-34: 'dod pa na spyod ba dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags dag gi gnyen por grangs bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:264a-36: sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa na yod do //
T07TD4091E:264b-0: de yang ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin la sdug pa'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir mi sdug pa'i rang @264b bzhin ni ma yin no //
T07TD4091E:264b-1: de dag 'khor dang bcas pa ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4091E:264b-2: gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams ni /
T07TD4091E:264b-3: gzugs med mnyam gzhag dge rnams so //
T07TD4091E:264b-4: gzugs med pa dag mnyam par gzhag pa dge pa nyid rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob kyi /
T07TD4091E:264b-5: nyon mongs pa can yang ma yin la mnyam par ma gzhag pa yang ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:264b-9: gzhan dag na yang mnyam par ma gzhag pa yod do zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:264b-10: nyer bsdogs kyi rnam par grol ba'i lam dag kyang rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo //
T07TD4091E:264b-11: 'og ma la dmigs pa'i phyir bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni ma yin te /
T07TD4091E:264b-12: rnam par thar pa'i don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i don yin no //
T07TD4091E:264b-14: rnam par thar pa 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:264b-15: de ni sngar bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:264b-16: 'du shes dang tshor ba'am 'du byed thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:264b-18: snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:264b-20: phra ba phra ba'i mjug thogs su /
T07TD4091E:264b-22: srid pa'i rtse mo'i 'du shes ni phra ba yin la /
T07TD4091E:264b-23: de bas kyang shin tu phra bar byas nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug go //
T07TD4091E:264b-24: snyoms par zhugs pa rnams ni /
T07TD4091E:264b-25: rang gi dag kyang 'og ma yin //
T07TD4091E:264b-26: 'phags pa'i sems kyis de las ldang //
T07TD4091E:264b-27: srid pa'i rtse mo'i sems dag pa'am /
T07TD4091E:264b-28: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyis pa'i sems zag pa med pa'i sems las ldang ste /
T07TD4091E:264b-29: de ltar na de dag gi snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems ni zag pa dang bcas pa yin la /
T07TD4091E:264b-30: ldang ba'i sems ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:264b-31: rnam par thar pa de dag /'dod gtogs snang ba dang po'i yul //
T07TD4091E:264b-32: de dag gi dmigs pa ni ci rigs par 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:264b-33: gang dag gzugs can min de dag / spyod yul rang dang gong sa yi //
T07TD4091E:264b-34: sdug bsngal la sogs rjes shes phyogs //
T07TD4091E:264b-35: gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams kyi dmigs pa ni rang gis pa dang /
T07TD4091E:264b-36: sa gong ma pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang de'i rgyu dang 'gog pa dang rjes su shes pa'i phyogs thams cad yin no //
T07TD4091E:264b-37: rnal 'byor ba rnams ni nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa dang /
T07TD4091E:265a-1: pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sbrul pa'i don du nyon mongs pa thag bsring bar bya ba dang /
T07TD4091E:265a-2: skye ba la dbang thob par bya ba dang /
T07TD4091E:265a-3: rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis rnam par thar pa la sogs pa skyed par byed de /
T07TD4091E:265a-4: de yang gang gi dngos po yongs su bsgyur bar byin gyis rlob pa dang /
T07TD4091E:265a-5: tshe stong ba la sogs pa byed pa'o //
T07TD4091E:265a-6: zil gnon skye mched gzhan brgyad de //
T07TD4091E:265a-7: nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung du kha dog bzang po dang /
T07TD4091E:265a-8: kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing /
T07TD4091E:265a-9: gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes zil gyi mnan nas mthong ste /
T07TD4091E:265a-10: de lta bur 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o //
T07TD4091E:265a-11: de bzhin du gzugs med par 'du shes pa rnams dang /
T07TD4091E:265a-12: chen po rnams te bzhi po de dag dang /
T07TD4091E:265a-13: nang gzugs med par 'du shes pa nyid kyi /
T07TD4091E:265a-17: dkar po dang dag tu lta ba ste /
T07TD4091E:265a-20: gnyis ni rnam thar dang po bzhin //
T07TD4091E:265a-21: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis //
T07TD4091E:265a-22: dang po dang gnyis pa ni rnam par thar pa dang po ji lta ba de bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:265a-23: gnyis pa ni gnyis pa bzhin /
T07TD4091E:265a-24: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis po gsum po dang bzhi pa ni rnam par thar pa ji lta ba de bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:265a-26: sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa bzhin //
T07TD4091E:265a-27: gzhan dag ni rnam par thar pa ji lta ba de bzhin la /
T07TD4091E:265a-29: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mos pa dang /
T07TD4091E:265a-30: nyon mongs pa mi skye bar byed pa'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:265a-31: de dag gis ni rgyab kyis phyogs pa tsam yin la /
T07TD4091E:265a-32: yid dag gis ni dmigs pa zil gyis gnon to //
T07TD4091E:265a-34: rgyun du zad par khyab par byed pa'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched ni bcu ste /
T07TD4091E:265a-46: de rnams las dang po brgyad ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin no //
T07TD4091E:265a-48: bsam gtan bzhi pa kho na yod do //
T07TD4091E:265a-51: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched la dmigs so /
T07TD4091E:265a-52: kha cig na re rlung ni reg bya'i skye mched yin no zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:265a-53: gnyis ni gzugs med dag / zad par gyi skye mched tham gnyis ni gzugs med dag pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
T07TD4091E:265a-54: spyod yul rang gi phung po bzhi //
T07TD4091E:265b-0: de gnyis kyi dmigs pa ni rang gis pa'i phung po @265b bzhi yin no //
T07TD4091E:265b-1: gong nas gong du khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa dag ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams la 'jug par byed pa yin la /
T07TD4091E:265b-2: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dag ni zad par gyi skye mched rnams la 'jug par byed pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:265b-3: 'gog pa'i rnam par thar pa la ma gtogs pa /
T07TD4091E:265b-4: rnam par thar pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad ni so so'i skye bo dang /
T07TD4091E:265b-5: 'phags pa'i rgyud la yod pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:265b-6: ci'i rnam par thar pa la sogs pa de dag sbyor ba las byung ba yin no //
T07TD4091E:265b-7: 'dod chags dang bral bas thob par bya ba yin zhes dri ba de la /
T07TD4091E:265b-8: 'gog pa bshad zin 'gog pa ni rnam pa thams cad du bshad zin to //
T07TD4091E:265b-11: 'gog pa las gzhan pa'i rnam par thar pa la sogs pa ni 'dris pa dang ma 'dris pa las 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob pa yang yin la sbyor ba las byung ba yang yin no //
T07TD4091E:265b-12: gzugs med zhes bya khams gsum lus //
T07TD4091E:265b-13: lhag ma dag ni mi las skye //
T07TD4091E:265b-14: gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang /
T07TD4091E:265b-15: gzugs med pa'i zad par gyi skye mched rnams ni khams gsum pa'i lus la brten pa yin la /
T07TD4091E:265b-16: lhag ma ni lus kyi mthus mis bskyed par bya ba'i phyir mi'i lus kho na la brten pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:265b-17: ji ltar na gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu gzugs med pa dang bsam gtan gyi khyad bar dag skyed par byed ce na /
T07TD4091E:265b-18: rgyu dang las dang chos nyid dang rgyu gsum gyis bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag bskyed de de la /
T07TD4091E:265b-19: khams gnyis dag tu gzugs med pa //
T07TD4091E:265b-20: rgyu dang las kyi stobs kyis skye //
T07TD4091E:265b-21: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu skyed pa rgyu'i stobs kyis ni nye ba dang yang dang yang du goms pa las so //
T07TD4091E:265b-22: las kyi stobs kyis ni khams gong ma'o //
T07TD4091E:265b-23: lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4091E:265b-24: 'og ma las 'dod chags dang ma bral bar gong mar skye bar ni mi nus so //
T07TD4091E:265b-25: gzugs kyi khams su bsam gtan rnams //
T07TD4091E:265b-26: de dang chos nyid dag gis kyang //
T07TD4091E:265b-27: gzugs kyi khams dag ru ni /
T07TD4091E:265b-28: bsam gtan rgyu dang las kyi stobs gnyis po dag dang /
T07TD4091E:265b-29: chos nyid kyis kyang bskyed de /
T07TD4091E:265b-30: 'jig pa'i tshe de'i dus na sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos rnams la 'phel ba'i phyir /
T07TD4091E:265b-31: sa 'og ma pa rnams kyang bsam gtan de dag skyed par byed do //
T07TD4091E:266a-1: rnams kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu de dag mngon pa dam pa'i chos 'di ji srid du gnas she na /
T07TD4091E:266a-2: ston pa'i dam chos rnam gnyis te //
T07TD4091E:266a-3: lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid do //
T07TD4091E:266a-4: de la lung ni mdo sde dang chos mngon pa dang 'dul ba'o //
T07TD4091E:266a-5: rtogs pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs te /
T07TD4091E:266a-6: de lta na dam pa'i chos ni rnam pa de gnyis yin la /
T07TD4091E:266a-7: de 'dzin byed dang smra byed dang //
T07TD4091E:266a-8: sgrub par byed pa nyid yin no //
T07TD4091E:266a-9: lung 'dzin par byed pa ni smra bar byed pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:266a-10: rtogs pa 'dzin par byed pa ni //
T07TD4091E:266a-11: sgrub par byed pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:266a-12: de'i phyir de gnyis ci srid du gnas pa de srid du //
T07TD4091E:266a-13: dam pa'i chos gnas par rig par bya'o //
T07TD4091E:266a-14: de dag kyang lo stong du gnas so zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:266a-15: gzhan dag na re ni rtogs pa'i chos kho na yin gyi /
T07TD4091E:266a-16: lung ni de bas yun ring ngo zhes zer ro //
T07TD4091E:266a-17: ci bstan bcos chos mngon pa 'di las bshad pa gang yin pa /
T07TD4091E:266a-18: bstan bcos mngon pa las kyang 'di kho na bzhin du bshad dam zhe na /
T07TD4091E:266a-20: bdag gis mngon pa'i chos 'di phal cher ni //
T07TD4091E:266a-21: kha che bye brag smra pa'i tshul grub bshad //
T07TD4091E:266a-22: ngan par zin gang de 'dir bdag gis nyes //
T07TD4091E:266a-23: dam chos tshul gyi tshad ma thub rnams yin //
T07TD4091E:266a-24: bdag gis chos mngon pa 'di ni phal cher kha che bye brag tu smra ba dag gi tshul du grub par bshad pa yin no //
T07TD4091E:266a-25: 'di la bdag gis nyes par zin pa gang yin pa de ni bdag gi nyes pa yin te /
T07TD4091E:266a-26: dam pa'i chos kyi tshul dag gi tshang ma ni sangs rgyas dang /
T07TD4091E:266a-27: sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams kho na yin no //
T07TD4091E:266a-28: ston pa 'jig rten mig ni zum gyur cing //
T07TD4091E:266a-29: mngon sum skye bo phal cher zad pa na //
T07TD4091E:266a-30: de nyid ma mthong rang dgar gyur pa yi //
T07TD4091E:266a-31: ngan rtogs rnams kyis bstan pa 'di dag dkrugs //
T07TD4091E:266a-32: rang 'byung rang 'byung bstan mchog gnas 'dzin rnams //
T07TD4091E:266a-33: mchog tu zhir gshegs 'gro mgon med pa na //
T07TD4091E:266a-34: gdams med yon tan 'joms par byed pa yi //
T07TD4091E:266a-35: dri mas dga' dgur deng sang 'di na spyod //
T07TD4091E:266a-36: de ltar thub pa dag gi bstan pa ni //
T07TD4091E:266a-37: lkog mar srog phyin 'dra zhing nyon mongs rnams //
T07TD4091E:266a-38: stobs dang ldan pa'i dus su rigs nas ni //
T07TD4091E:266a-39: thar pa 'dod pa dag gis bag yod gyis [*kyis] //
T07TD4091E:266a-40: chos mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel pa mdo dang mthun pa las snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas brgyad pa'o //
T07TD4091E:266a-41: chos mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel pa mdo dang mthun pa zhes bya ba slob dpon 'dus bzang gis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
